78 static const char* ACTOR_ID_TOKEN = "@Actor_"; // Appended to material name, followed by actor ID (aka 'trucknum')
79 
80 using namespace RoR;
81 
82 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
83 /* Prepare for loading
84 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
85 
86 void RigSpawner::Setup(
87  Beam *rig,
88  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::File> file,
89  Ogre::SceneNode *parent,
90  Ogre::Vector3 const & spawn_position,
91  int cache_entry_number
92 )
93 {
94  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
95 
96  m_rig = rig;
97  m_file = file;
98  m_cache_entry_number = cache_entry_number;
99  m_parent_scene_node = parent;
100  m_spawn_position = spawn_position;
101  m_current_keyword = RigDef::File::KEYWORD_INVALID;
102  m_enable_background_loading = BSETTING("Background Loading", false);
103  m_wing_area = 0.f;
104  m_fuse_z_min = 1000.0f;
105  m_fuse_z_max = -1000.0f;
106  m_fuse_y_min = 1000.0f;
107  m_fuse_y_max = -1000.0f;
108  m_first_wing_index = -1;
109 
110  m_generate_wing_position_lights = true;
111  // TODO: Handle modules
112  if (file->root_module->engine.get() != nullptr) // Engine present => it's a land vehicle.
113  {
114  m_generate_wing_position_lights = false; // Disable aerial pos. lights for land vehicles.
115  }
116 
117  // add custom include path
118  if (!SSETTING("resourceIncludePath", "").empty())
119  {
120  Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation(
121  SSETTING("resourceIncludePath", ""),
122  "FileSystem",
123  "customInclude"
124  );
125  }
126 
127  // initialize custom include path
128  if (!SSETTING("resourceIncludePath", "").empty())
129  {
130  Ogre::ResourceBackgroundQueue::getSingleton().initialiseResourceGroup("customInclude");
131  }
132 
133  m_messages_num_errors = 0;
134  m_messages_num_warnings = 0;
135  m_messages_num_other = 0;
136 }
137 
138 void RigSpawner::CalcMemoryRequirements(ActorMemoryRequirements& req, RigDef::File::Module* module_def)
139 {
140  // 'nodes'
141  req.num_nodes += module_def->nodes.size();
142  for (auto& def: module_def->nodes)
143  {
144  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_h_HOOK_POINT))
145  {
146  req.num_beams += 1;
147  }
148  }
149 
150  // 'beams'
151  req.num_beams += module_def->beams.size();
152 
153  // 'ties'
154  req.num_beams += module_def->ties.size();
155 
156  // 'ropes'
157  req.num_beams += module_def->ropes.size();
158 
159  // 'hydros'
160  req.num_beams += module_def->hydros.size();
161 
162  // 'triggers'
163  req.num_beams += module_def->triggers.size();
164  req.num_shocks += module_def->triggers.size();
165 
166  // 'animators'
167  req.num_beams += module_def->animators.size();
168 
169  // 'cinecam'
170  req.num_nodes += module_def->cinecam.size();
171  req.num_beams += module_def->cinecam.size() * 8;
172 
173  // 'shocks' and 'shocks2'
174  req.num_beams += module_def->shocks.size();
175  req.num_shocks += module_def->shocks.size();
176  req.num_beams += module_def->shocks_2.size();
177  req.num_shocks += module_def->shocks_2.size();
178 
179  // 'commands' and 'commands2' (unified)
180  req.num_beams += module_def->commands_2.size();
181 
182  // 'rotators'
183  req.num_rotators += module_def->rotators.size();
184  req.num_rotators += module_def->rotators_2.size();
185 
186  // 'wings'
187  req.num_wings += module_def->wings.size();
188 
189  // 'wheels'
190  for (RigDef::Wheel& wheel: module_def->wheels)
191  {
192  req.num_nodes += wheel.num_rays * 2; // BuildWheelObjectAndNodes()
193  req.num_beams += wheel.num_rays * ((wheel.rigidity_node.IsValidAnyState()) ? 9 : 8); // BuildWheelBeams()
194  }
195 
196  // 'wheels2'
197  for (RigDef::Wheel2& wheel2: module_def->wheels_2)
198  {
199  req.num_nodes += wheel2.num_rays * 4;
200  // Rim beams: num_rays*10 (*11 with valid rigidity_node)
201  // Tyre beams: num_rays*14
202  req.num_beams += wheel2.num_rays * ((wheel2.rigidity_node.IsValidAnyState()) ? 25 : 24);
203  }
204 
205  // 'meshwheels' & 'meshwheels2' (unified)
206  for (RigDef::MeshWheel& meshwheel: module_def->mesh_wheels)
207  {
208  req.num_nodes += meshwheel.num_rays * 2; // BuildWheelObjectAndNodes()
209  req.num_beams += meshwheel.num_rays * ((meshwheel.rigidity_node.IsValidAnyState()) ? 9 : 8); // BuildWheelBeams()
210  }
211 
212  // 'flexbodywheels'
213  for (RigDef::FlexBodyWheel& flexwheel: module_def->flex_body_wheels)
214  {
215  req.num_nodes += flexwheel.num_rays * 4;
216  // Rim beams: num_rays*8
217  // Tyre beams: num_rays*10 (num_rays*11 with valid rigidity_node)
218  // Support beams: num_rays*2
219  req.num_beams += flexwheel.num_rays * ((flexwheel.rigidity_node.IsValidAnyState()) ? 21 : 20);
220  }
221 }
222 
223 void RigSpawner::InitializeRig()
224 {
225  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
226 
227  m_rig->mCamera = nullptr;
228 
229  ActorMemoryRequirements req;
230  for (auto module: m_selected_modules) // _Root_ module is included
231  {
232  this->CalcMemoryRequirements(req, module.get());
233  }
234 
235  // Allocate memory as needed
236  m_rig->beams = new beam_t[req.num_beams];
237  m_rig->nodes = new node_t[req.num_nodes];
238 
239  if (req.num_shocks > 0)
240  m_rig->shocks = new shock_t[req.num_shocks];
241 
242  if (req.num_rotators > 0)
243  m_rig->rotators = new rotator_t[req.num_rotators];
244 
245  if (req.num_wings > 0)
246  m_rig->wings = new wing_t[req.num_wings];
247 
248  // clear rig parent structure
249  memset(m_rig->contacters, 0, sizeof(contacter_t) * MAX_CONTACTERS);
250  m_rig->free_contacter = 0;
251  memset(m_rig->wheels, 0, sizeof(wheel_t) * MAX_WHEELS);
252  m_rig->free_wheel = 0;
253  memset(m_rig->vwheels, 0, sizeof(vwheel_t) * MAX_WHEELS);
254  m_rig->ropes.clear();
255  m_rig->ropables.clear();
256  m_rig->ties.clear();
257  m_rig->hooks.clear();
258 
259  // commands contain complex data structures, do not memset them ...
260  for (int i=0;i<MAX_COMMANDS+1;i++)
261  {
262  m_rig->commandkey[i].commandValue=0;
263  m_rig->commandkey[i].beams.clear();
264  m_rig->commandkey[i].rotators.clear();
265  m_rig->commandkey[i].description="";
266  }
267 
268  memset(m_rig->props, 0, sizeof(prop_t) * MAX_PROPS);
269  m_rig->free_prop = 0;
270  m_rig->exhausts.clear();
271  memset(m_rig->cparticles, 0, sizeof(cparticle_t) * MAX_CPARTICLES);
272  m_rig->free_cparticle = 0;
273  m_rig->nodes_debug.clear();
274  m_rig->beams_debug.clear();
275  memset(m_rig->soundsources, 0, sizeof(soundsource_t) * MAX_SOUNDSCRIPTS_PER_TRUCK);
276  m_rig->free_soundsource = 0;
277  memset(m_rig->pressure_beams, 0, sizeof(int) * MAX_PRESSURE_BEAMS);
278  m_rig->free_pressure_beam = 0;
279  memset(m_rig->aeroengines, 0, sizeof(AeroEngine *) * MAX_AEROENGINES);
280  m_rig->free_aeroengine = 0;
281  memset(m_rig->cabs, 0, sizeof(int) * (MAX_CABS*3));
282  m_rig->free_cab = 0;
283  memset(m_rig->hydro, 0, sizeof(int) * MAX_HYDROS);
284  m_rig->free_hydro = 0;
285  memset(m_rig->collcabs, 0, sizeof(int) * MAX_CABS);
286  memset(m_rig->inter_collcabrate, 0, sizeof(collcab_rate_t) * MAX_CABS);
287  m_rig->free_collcab = 0;
288  memset(m_rig->intra_collcabrate, 0, sizeof(collcab_rate_t) * MAX_CABS);
289  memset(m_rig->buoycabs, 0, sizeof(int) * MAX_CABS);
290  m_rig->free_buoycab = 0;
291  memset(m_rig->buoycabtypes, 0, sizeof(int) * MAX_CABS);
292  memset(m_rig->airbrakes, 0, sizeof(Airbrake *) * MAX_AIRBRAKES);
293  m_rig->free_airbrake = 0;
294  memset(m_rig->skidtrails, 0, sizeof(Skidmark *) * (MAX_WHEELS*2));
295  memset(m_rig->flexbodies, 0, sizeof(FlexBody *) * MAX_FLEXBODIES);
296  m_rig->free_flexbody = 0;
297  m_rig->description.clear();
298  m_rig->free_axle = 0;
299  m_rig->free_camerarail = 0;
300  m_rig->free_screwprop = 0;
301 
302  m_rig->realtruckname = "";
303  m_rig->forwardcommands=false;
304 
305  m_rig->wheel_contact_requested = false;
306  m_rig->rescuer = false;
307  m_rig->disable_default_sounds=false;
308  m_rig->has_slope_brake=false;
309  m_rig->categoryid=-1;
310  m_rig->truckversion=-1;
311  m_rig->externalcameramode=0;
312  m_rig->externalcameranode=-1;
313  m_rig->authors.clear();
314  m_rig->slideNodesConnectInstantly=false;
315 
316  m_rig->odometerTotal = 0;
317  m_rig->odometerUser = 0;
318  m_rig->dashBoardLayouts.clear();
319 
320  memset(m_rig->helpmat, 0, 255);
321 
322  m_rig->collrange=DEFAULT_COLLISION_RANGE;
323  m_rig->masscount=0;
324  m_rig->disable_smoke = App::GetGfxParticlesMode() == 0;
325  m_rig->smokeId=0;
326  m_rig->smokeRef=0;
327  m_rig->editorId=-1;
328  m_rig->beambreakdebug = SETTINGS.getBooleanSetting("Beam Break Debug", false);
329  m_rig->beamdeformdebug = SETTINGS.getBooleanSetting("Beam Deform Debug", false);
330  m_rig->triggerdebug = SETTINGS.getBooleanSetting("Trigger Debug", false);
331  m_rig->rotaInertia = nullptr;
332  m_rig->hydroInertia = nullptr;
333  m_rig->cmdInertia = nullptr;
334  m_rig->truckmass=0;
335  m_rig->loadmass=0;
336  m_rig->buoyance = nullptr;
337 
338  m_rig->free_fixes=0;
339  m_rig->propwheelcount=0;
340  m_rig->free_commands=0;
341  m_rig->fileformatversion=0;
342 
343  m_rig->origin=Ogre::Vector3::ZERO;
344  m_rig->mSlideNodes.clear();
345 
346  m_rig->engine = nullptr;
347  m_rig->hascommands=0;
348  m_rig->hashelp=0;
349  m_rig->cinecameranodepos[0]=-1;
350  m_rig->freecinecamera=0;
351  m_rig->deletion_sceneNodes.clear();
352  m_rig->deletion_Objects.clear();
353  m_rig->netCustomLightArray[0] = UINT_MAX;
354  m_rig->netCustomLightArray[1] = UINT_MAX;
355  m_rig->netCustomLightArray[2] = UINT_MAX;
356  m_rig->netCustomLightArray[3] = UINT_MAX;
357  m_rig->netCustomLightArray_counter = 0;
358 
359  m_rig->ispolice=false;
360  m_rig->state=SLEEPING;
361  m_rig->heathaze=false;
362  m_rig->autopilot = nullptr;
363  m_rig->hfinder = nullptr;
364  m_rig->fuseAirfoil = nullptr;
365  m_rig->fuseFront = nullptr;
366  m_rig->fuseBack = nullptr;
367  m_rig->fuseWidth=0;
368  m_rig->brakeforce=30000.0;
369  m_rig->hbrakeforce = 2 * m_rig->brakeforce;
370  m_rig->debugVisuals = SETTINGS.getBooleanSetting("DebugBeams", false);
371  m_rig->shadowOptimizations = SETTINGS.getBooleanSetting("Shadow optimizations", true);
372 
373  m_rig->proped_wheels=0;
374  m_rig->braked_wheels=0;
375 
376  m_rig->speedoMax=140;
377  m_rig->useMaxRPMforGUI=false;
378  m_rig->minimass=50.0;
379  m_rig->cparticle_enabled=false;
380  m_rig->advanced_drag=false;
381  m_rig->advanced_node_drag=0;
382  m_rig->advanced_total_drag=0;
383  m_rig->freecamera=0;
384  m_rig->cabMesh = nullptr;
385  m_rig->cabNode = nullptr;
386  m_rig->cameranodepos[0]=-1;
387  m_rig->cameranodedir[0]=-1;
388  m_rig->cameranoderoll[0]=-1;
389  m_rig->lowestnode=0;
390 
391  m_rig->subMeshGroundModelName = "";
392 
393 #ifdef USE_ANGELSCRIPT
394  m_rig->vehicle_ai = new VehicleAI(m_rig);
395 #endif // USE_ANGELSCRIPT
396 
397  /* Init code from Beam::Beam() */
398 
399  m_rig->airbrakeval = 0;
400  m_rig->alb_minspeed = 0.0f;
401  m_rig->alb_mode = 0;
402  m_rig->alb_notoggle = false;
403  m_rig->alb_present = false;
404  m_rig->alb_pulse_time = 2000.0f;
405  m_rig->alb_pulse_state = false;
406  m_rig->alb_ratio = 0.0f;
407  m_rig->alb_timer = 0.0f;
408  m_rig->animTimer = 0.0f;
409  m_rig->antilockbrake = 0;
410 
411  m_rig->cabMesh = nullptr;
412 
413  m_rig->cc_mode = false;
414  m_rig->cc_can_brake = false;
415  m_rig->cc_target_rpm = 0.0f;
416  m_rig->cc_target_speed = 0.0f;
417  m_rig->cc_target_speed_lower_limit = 0.0f;
418 
419  m_rig->collisionRelevant = false;
420 
421  m_rig->debugVisuals = 0;
422 
423  m_rig->driverSeat = nullptr;
424 
425  m_rig->heathaze = !m_rig->disable_smoke && BSETTING("HeatHaze", false);
426  m_rig->hideInChooser = false;
427 
428  m_rig->previousCrank = 0.f;
429 
430  m_rig->sl_enabled = false;
431  m_rig->sl_speed_limit = 0.f;
432 
433  m_rig->tc_fade = 0.f;
434  m_rig->tc_mode = 0;
435  m_rig->tc_notoggle = false;
436  m_rig->tc_present = false;
437  m_rig->tc_pulse_time = 2000.0f;
438  m_rig->tc_pulse_state = false;
439  m_rig->tc_ratio = 0.f;
440  m_rig->tc_wheelslip = 0.f;
441  m_rig->tc_timer = 0.f;
442 
443  m_rig->tractioncontrol = 0;
444 
445 
446  m_rig->dash = new DashBoardManager();
447 
448 
449 #ifdef FEAT_TIMING
450  // this enables beam engine timing statistics
451  statistics = BES.getClient(tnum, BES_CORE);
452  statistics_gfx = BES.getClient(tnum, BES_GFX);
453 #endif
454 
455  m_rig->simpleSkeletonNode = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
456  m_rig->deletion_sceneNodes.emplace_back(m_rig->simpleSkeletonNode);
457 
458  m_rig->beamsRoot = m_parent_scene_node;
459 
460  /* Collisions */
461 
462  m_rig->disableTruckTruckCollisions = BSETTING("DisableCollisions", false);
463  if (! m_rig->disableTruckTruckCollisions)
464  {
465  m_rig->interPointCD = new PointColDetector();
466  }
467  m_rig->disableTruckTruckSelfCollisions = BSETTING("DisableSelfCollisions", false);
468  if (! m_rig->disableTruckTruckSelfCollisions)
469  {
470  m_rig->intraPointCD = new PointColDetector();
471  }
472 
473  m_rig->submesh_ground_model = gEnv->collisions->defaultgm;
474  m_rig->cparticle_enabled = App::GetGfxParticlesMode() == 1;
475 
476  DustManager& dustman = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->GetParticleManager();
477  m_rig->dustp = dustman.getDustPool("dust");
478  m_rig->dripp = dustman.getDustPool("drip");
479  m_rig->sparksp = dustman.getDustPool("sparks");
480  m_rig->clumpp = dustman.getDustPool("clump");
481  m_rig->splashp = dustman.getDustPool("splash");
482  m_rig->ripplep = dustman.getDustPool("ripple");
483 
484  m_rig->cmdInertia = new CmdKeyInertia();
485  m_rig->hydroInertia = new CmdKeyInertia();
486  m_rig->rotaInertia = new CmdKeyInertia();
487 
488  // Lights mode
489  m_rig->m_flares_mode = App::GetGfxFlaresMode();
490 
491  m_rig->m_definition = m_file;
492 
493  m_flex_factory = RoR::FlexFactory(
494  this,
495  BSETTING("Flexbody_UseCache", false),
496  m_cache_entry_number
497  );
498 
499  m_flex_factory.CheckAndLoadFlexbodyCache();
500 
501  std::stringstream grp_name;
502  grp_name << m_rig->truckname << ACTOR_ID_TOKEN << m_rig->trucknum;
503  Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().createResourceGroup(grp_name.str());
504  m_custom_resource_group = grp_name.str();
505 
506  m_placeholder_managedmat = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName("rigsofrods/managedmaterial-placeholder"); // Built-in
507 
508  m_apply_simple_materials = BSETTING("SimpleMaterials", false);
509  if (m_apply_simple_materials)
510  {
511  m_simple_material_base = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName("tracks/simple"); // Built-in material
512  if (m_simple_material_base.isNull())
513  {
514  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INTERNAL_ERROR, "Failed to load built-in material 'tracks/simple'; disabling 'SimpleMaterials'");
515  m_apply_simple_materials = false;
516  }
517  }
518 
519  m_curr_mirror_prop_type = CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_NONE;
520  m_curr_mirror_prop_scenenode = nullptr;
521 }
522 
523 void RigSpawner::FinalizeRig()
524 {
525  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
526 
527  // we should post-process the torque curve if existing
528  if (m_rig->engine)
529  {
530  int result = m_rig->engine->getTorqueCurve()->spaceCurveEvenly(m_rig->engine->getTorqueCurve()->getUsedSpline());
531  if (result)
532  {
533  m_rig->engine->getTorqueCurve()->setTorqueModel("default");
534  if (result == 1)
535  {
536  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "TorqueCurve: Points (rpm) must be in an ascending order. Using default curve");
537  }
538  }
539 
540  //Gearbox
541  m_rig->engine->setAutoMode(App::GetSimGearboxMode());
542  }
543 
544  //calculate gwps height offset
545  //get a starting value
546  m_rig->posnode_spawn_height=m_rig->nodes[0].RelPosition.y;
547  //start at 0 to avoid a crash whith a 1-node truck
548  for (int i=0; i<m_rig->free_node; i++)
549  {
550  // scan and store the y-coord for the lowest node of the truck
551  if (m_rig->nodes[i].RelPosition.y <= m_rig->posnode_spawn_height)
552  {
553  m_rig->posnode_spawn_height = m_rig->nodes[i].RelPosition.y;
554  }
555  }
556 
557  if (m_rig->cameranodepos[0] > 0)
558  {
559  // store the y-difference between the trucks lowest node and the campos-node for the gwps system
560  m_rig->posnode_spawn_height = m_rig->nodes[m_rig->cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition.y - m_rig->posnode_spawn_height;
561  }
562  else
563  {
564  //this can not be an airplane, just set it to 0.
565  m_rig->posnode_spawn_height = 0.0f;
566  }
567 
568  //cameras workaround
569  for (int i=0; i<m_rig->freecamera; i++)
570  {
571  //LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Camera dir="+StringConverter::toString(nodes[cameranodedir[i]].RelPosition-nodes[cameranodepos[i]].RelPosition)+" roll="+StringConverter::toString(nodes[cameranoderoll[i]].RelPosition-nodes[cameranodepos[i]].RelPosition));
572  Ogre::Vector3 dir_node_offset = GetNode(m_rig->cameranodedir[i]).RelPosition - GetNode(m_rig->cameranodepos[i]).RelPosition;
573  Ogre::Vector3 roll_node_offset = GetNode(m_rig->cameranoderoll[i]).RelPosition - GetNode(m_rig->cameranodepos[i]).RelPosition;
574  Ogre::Vector3 cross = dir_node_offset.crossProduct(roll_node_offset);
575 
576  m_rig->revroll[i]=cross.y > 0;//(nodes[cameranodedir[i]].RelPosition-nodes[cameranodepos[i]].RelPosition).crossProduct(nodes[cameranoderoll[i]].RelPosition-nodes[cameranodepos[i]].RelPosition).y>0;
577  if (m_rig->revroll[i])
578  {
579  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, "camera definition is probably invalid and has been corrected. It should be center, back, left");
580  }
581  }
582 
583  //wing closure
584  if (m_first_wing_index!=-1)
585  {
586  if (m_rig->autopilot != nullptr)
587  {
588  m_rig->autopilot->setInertialReferences(
589  & GetNode(m_airplane_left_light),
590  & GetNode(m_airplane_right_light),
591  m_rig->fuseBack,
592  & GetNode(m_rig->cameranodepos[0])
593  );
594  }
595  //inform wing segments
596  float span=GetNode(m_rig->wings[m_first_wing_index].fa->nfrd).RelPosition.distance(GetNode(m_rig->wings[m_rig->free_wing-1].fa->nfld).RelPosition);
597 
598  m_rig->wings[m_first_wing_index].fa->enableInducedDrag(span,m_wing_area, false);
599  m_rig->wings[m_rig->free_wing-1].fa->enableInducedDrag(span,m_wing_area, true);
600  //wash calculator
601  WashCalculator();
602  }
603  //add the cab visual
604  if (!m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords.empty() && m_rig->free_cab>0)
605  {
606  //the cab materials are as follow:
607  //texname: base texture with emissive(2 pass) or without emissive if none available(1 pass), alpha cutting
608  //texname-trans: transparency texture (1 pass)
609  //texname-back: backface texture: black+alpha cutting (1 pass)
610  //texname-noem: base texture without emissive (1 pass), alpha cutting
611 
612  //material passes must be:
613  //0: normal texture
614  //1: transparent (windows)
615  //2: emissive
616 
617  Ogre::MaterialPtr mat = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName(m_cab_material_name);
618  if (mat.isNull())
619  {
620  Ogre::String msg = "Material '"+m_cab_material_name+"' missing!";
621  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg);
622  return;
623  }
624 
625  //-trans
626  char transmatname[256];
627  sprintf(transmatname, "%s-trans", m_cab_material_name.c_str());
628  Ogre::MaterialPtr transmat=mat->clone(transmatname);
629  if (mat->getTechnique(0)->getNumPasses()>1) // If there's the "emissive pass", remove it from the 'transmat'
630  {
631  transmat->getTechnique(0)->removePass(1);
632  }
633  transmat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setAlphaRejectSettings(Ogre::CMPF_LESS_EQUAL, 128);
634  transmat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
635  if (transmat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getNumTextureUnitStates()>0)
636  {
637  transmat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureFiltering(Ogre::TFO_NONE);
638  }
639  transmat->compile();
640  m_cab_trans_material = transmat;
641 
642  //-back
643  char backmatname[256];
644  sprintf(backmatname, "%s-back", m_cab_material_name.c_str());
645  Ogre::MaterialPtr backmat=mat->clone(backmatname);
646  if (mat->getTechnique(0)->getNumPasses()>1)// If there's the "emissive pass", remove it from the 'transmat'
647  {
648  backmat->getTechnique(0)->removePass(1);
649  }
650  if (transmat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getNumTextureUnitStates()>0)
651  {
652  backmat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setColourOperationEx(
653  Ogre::LBX_SOURCE1,
654  Ogre::LBS_MANUAL,
655  Ogre::LBS_MANUAL,
656  Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0),
657  Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0)
658  );
659  }
660  if (m_rig->shadowOptimizations)
661  {
662  backmat->setReceiveShadows(false);
663  }
664  backmat->compile();
665 
666  char cab_material_name_cstr[1000] = {};
667  strncpy(cab_material_name_cstr, m_cab_material_name.c_str(), 999);
668  std::string mesh_name = this->ComposeName("VehicleCabMesh", 0);
669  m_rig->cabMesh =new FlexObj( // Names in FlexObj ctor
670  m_rig->nodes, // node_t* nds
671  m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords,// std::vector<CabNodeTexcoords>& texcoords
672  m_rig->free_cab, // int numtriangles
673  m_rig->cabs, // int* triangles
674  m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes,// std::vector<CabSubmesh>& submeshes
675  cab_material_name_cstr, // char* texname
676  mesh_name.c_str(),
677  backmatname, // char* backtexname
678  transmatname // char* transtexname
679  );
680 
681  m_rig->cabNode = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
682  Ogre::Entity *ec = nullptr;
683  try
684  {
685  ec = gEnv->sceneManager->createEntity(this->ComposeName("VehicleCabEntity", 0), mesh_name);
686  this->SetupNewEntity(ec, Ogre::ColourValue(0.5, 1, 0.5));
687  if (ec)
688  {
689  m_rig->cabNode->attachObject(ec);
690  }
691  }
692  catch (...)
693  {
694  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "error loading mesh: "+mesh_name);
695  }
696  m_rig->cabEntity = ec;
697  };
698 
699  m_rig->lowestnode = FindLowestNodeInRig();
700  m_rig->lowestcontactingnode = FindLowestContactingNodeInRig();
701 
702  this->UpdateCollcabContacterNodes();
703 
704  m_flex_factory.SaveFlexbodiesToCache();
705 
706  this->FinalizeGfxSetup(); // Creates the GfxActor
707 }
708 
709 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
710 /* Actual loading
711 /* ~~~ Implemented in RigSpawner_ProcessControl.cpp!
712 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
713 
714 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
715 /* Processing functions and utilities.
716 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
717 
718 void RigSpawner::WashCalculator()
719 {
720  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
721 
722  //we will compute wash
723  int w,p;
724  for (p=0; p<m_rig->free_aeroengine; p++)
725  {
726  Ogre::Vector3 prop=m_rig->nodes[m_rig->aeroengines[p]->getNoderef()].RelPosition;
727  float radius=m_rig->aeroengines[p]->getRadius();
728  for (w=0; w<m_rig->free_wing; w++)
729  {
730  //left wash
731  Ogre::Vector3 wcent=((m_rig->nodes[m_rig->wings[w].fa->nfld].RelPosition+m_rig->nodes[m_rig->wings[w].fa->nfrd].RelPosition)/2.0);
732  //check if wing is near enough along X (less than 15m back)
733  if (wcent.x>prop.x && wcent.x<prop.x+15.0)
734  {
735  //check if it's okay vertically
736  if (wcent.y>prop.y-radius && wcent.y<prop.y+radius)
737  {
738  //okay, compute wash coverage ratio along Z
739  float wleft=(m_rig->nodes[m_rig->wings[w].fa->nfld].RelPosition).z;
740  float wright=(m_rig->nodes[m_rig->wings[w].fa->nfrd].RelPosition).z;
741  float pleft=prop.z+radius;
742  float pright=prop.z-radius;
743  float aleft=wleft;
744  if (pleft<aleft) aleft=pleft;
745  float aright=wright;
746  if (pright>aright) aright=pright;
747  if (aright<aleft)
748  {
749  //we have a wash
750  float wratio=(aleft-aright)/(wleft-wright);
751  m_rig->wings[w].fa->addwash(p, wratio);
752  Ogre::String msg = "Wing "+TOSTRING(w)+" is washed by prop "+TOSTRING(p)+" at "+TOSTRING((float)(wratio*100.0))+"%";
753  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, msg);
754  }
755  }
756  }
757  }
758  }
759 }
760 
761 void RigSpawner::ProcessTurbojet(RigDef::Turbojet & def)
762 {
763  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
764 
765  int front,back,ref;
766  front = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.front_node);
767  back = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.back_node);
768  ref = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.side_node);
769 
770  Turbojet *tj=new Turbojet(
771  m_rig->free_aeroengine,
772  m_rig->trucknum,
773  m_rig->nodes,
774  front,
775  back,
776  ref,
777  def.dry_thrust,
778  def.is_reversable != 0,
779  def.wet_thrust,
780  def.front_diameter,
781  m_rig->heathaze);
782 
783  // Visuals
784  std::string nozzle_name = this->ComposeName("TurbojetNozzle", m_rig->free_aeroengine);
785  Ogre::Entity* nozzle_ent = gEnv->sceneManager->createEntity(nozzle_name, "nozzle.mesh");
786  this->SetupNewEntity(nozzle_ent, Ogre::ColourValue(1, 0.5, 0.5));
787  Ogre::Entity* afterburn_ent = nullptr;
788  if (def.wet_thrust > 0.f)
789  {
790  std::string flame_name = this->ComposeName("AfterburnerFlame", m_rig->free_aeroengine);
791  afterburn_ent = gEnv->sceneManager->createEntity(flame_name, "abflame.mesh");
792  this->SetupNewEntity(afterburn_ent, Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 0));
793  }
794  std::string propname = this->ComposeName("Turbojet", m_rig->free_aeroengine);
795  tj->SetupVisuals(propname, nozzle_ent, def.back_diameter, def.nozzle_length, afterburn_ent, m_rig->disable_smoke);
796 
797  m_rig->aeroengines[m_rig->free_aeroengine]=tj;
798  m_rig->driveable=AIRPLANE;
799  if (m_rig->autopilot == nullptr && m_rig->state != NETWORKED)
800  m_rig->autopilot=new Autopilot(m_rig->trucknum);
801 
802  m_rig->free_aeroengine++;
803 }
804 
805 std::string RigSpawner::ComposeName(const char* type, int number)
806 {
807  char buf[500];
808  snprintf(buf, 500, "%s_%d%s%d", type, number, ACTOR_ID_TOKEN, m_rig->trucknum);
809  return buf;
810 }
811 
812 void RigSpawner::ProcessScrewprop(RigDef::Screwprop & def)
813 {
814  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
815 
816  if (! CheckScrewpropLimit(1))
817  {
818  return;
819  }
820 
821  int ref_node_idx = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.prop_node);
822  int back_node_idx = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.back_node);
823  int top_node_idx = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.top_node);
824 
825  m_rig->screwprops[m_rig->free_screwprop] = new Screwprop(
826  &m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->GetParticleManager(),
827  m_rig->nodes,
828  ref_node_idx,
829  back_node_idx,
830  top_node_idx,
831  def.power,
832  m_rig->trucknum
833  );
834  m_rig->driveable=BOAT;
835  m_rig->free_screwprop++;
836 }
837 
838 void RigSpawner::ProcessFusedrag(RigDef::Fusedrag & def)
839 {
840  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
841 
842  //parse fusedrag
843  int front_node_idx = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.front_node);
844  int back_node_idx = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.rear_node);
845  float width = 1.f;
846  float factor = 1.f;
847  char fusefoil[256];
848  strncpy(fusefoil, def.airfoil_name.c_str(), 255);
849 
850  if (def.autocalc)
851  {
852  // fusedrag autocalculation
853 
854  // calculate fusedrag by truck size
855  factor = def.area_coefficient;
856  width = (m_fuse_z_max - m_fuse_z_min) * (m_fuse_y_max - m_fuse_y_min) * factor;
857 
858  m_rig->fuseAirfoil = new Airfoil(fusefoil);
859 
860  m_rig->fuseFront = & GetNode(front_node_idx);
861  m_rig->fuseBack = & GetNode(front_node_idx); // This equals v0.38 / v0.4.0.7, but it's probably a bug
862  m_rig->fuseWidth = width;
863  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, "Fusedrag autocalculation size: "+TOSTRING(width)+" m^2");
864  }
865  else
866  {
867  // original fusedrag calculation
868 
869  width = def.approximate_width;
870 
871  m_rig->fuseAirfoil = new Airfoil(fusefoil);
872 
873  m_rig->fuseFront = & GetNode(front_node_idx);
874  m_rig->fuseBack = & GetNode(front_node_idx); // This equals v0.38 / v0.4.0.7, but it's probably a bug
875  m_rig->fuseWidth = width;
876  }
877 }
878 
879 void RigSpawner::BuildAerialEngine(
880  int ref_node_index,
881  int back_node_index,
882  int blade_1_node_index,
883  int blade_2_node_index,
884  int blade_3_node_index,
885  int blade_4_node_index,
886  int couplenode_index,
887  bool is_turboprops,
888  Ogre::String const & airfoil,
889  float power,
890  float pitch
891  )
892 {
893  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
894 
895  char propname[256];
896  sprintf(propname, "turboprop-%s-%i", m_rig->truckname, m_rig->free_aeroengine);
897 
898  Turboprop *turbo_prop = new Turboprop(
899  propname,
900  m_rig->nodes,
901  ref_node_index,
902  back_node_index,
903  blade_1_node_index,
904  blade_2_node_index,
905  blade_3_node_index,
906  blade_4_node_index,
907  couplenode_index,
908  power,
909  airfoil,
910  m_rig->free_aeroengine,
911  m_rig->trucknum,
912  m_rig->disable_smoke,
913  ! is_turboprops,
914  pitch,
915  m_rig->heathaze
916  );
917  m_rig->aeroengines[m_rig->free_aeroengine] = turbo_prop;
918  m_rig->free_aeroengine++;
919  m_rig->driveable = AIRPLANE;
920 
921  /* Autopilot */
922  if (m_rig->autopilot == nullptr && m_rig->state != NETWORKED)
923  {
924  m_rig->autopilot = new Autopilot(m_rig->trucknum);
925  }
926 
927  /* Visuals */
928  float scale = GetNode(ref_node_index).RelPosition.distance(GetNode(blade_1_node_index).RelPosition) / 2.25f;
929  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_prop); i++)
930  {
931  prop_t & prop = m_rig->props[i];
932  if (prop.noderef == ref_node_index)
933  {
934  if (prop.pale == 1)
935  {
936  prop.scene_node->scale(scale, scale, scale);
937  turbo_prop->addPale(prop.scene_node);
938  }
939  if (prop.spinner == 1)
940  {
941  prop.scene_node->scale(scale, scale, scale);
942  turbo_prop->addSpinner(prop.scene_node);
943  }
944  }
945  }
946 }
947 
948 void RigSpawner::ProcessTurboprop2(RigDef::Turboprop2 & def)
949 {
950  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
951 
952  int p3_node_index = (def.blade_tip_nodes[2].IsValidAnyState()) ? GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[2]) : -1;
953  int p4_node_index = (def.blade_tip_nodes[3].IsValidAnyState()) ? GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[3]) : -1;
954  int couple_node_index = (def.couple_node.IsValidAnyState()) ? GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.couple_node) : -1;
955 
956  BuildAerialEngine(
957  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.reference_node),
958  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.axis_node),
959  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[0]),
960  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[1]),
961  p3_node_index,
962  p4_node_index,
963  couple_node_index,
964  true,
965  def.airfoil,
966  def.turbine_power_kW,
967  -10
968  );
969 }
970 
971 void RigSpawner::ProcessPistonprop(RigDef::Pistonprop & def)
972 {
973  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
974 
975  int p3_node_index = (def.blade_tip_nodes[2].IsValidAnyState()) ? GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[2]) : -1;
976  int p4_node_index = (def.blade_tip_nodes[3].IsValidAnyState()) ? GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[3]) : -1;
977  int couple_node_index = (def.couple_node.IsValidAnyState()) ? GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.couple_node) : -1;
978 
979  BuildAerialEngine(
980  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.reference_node),
981  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.axis_node),
982  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[0]),
983  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.blade_tip_nodes[1]),
984  p3_node_index,
985  p4_node_index,
986  couple_node_index,
987  false,
988  def.airfoil,
989  def.turbine_power_kW,
990  def.pitch
991  );
992 }
993 
994 void RigSpawner::ProcessAirbrake(RigDef::Airbrake & def)
995 {
996  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
997 
998  if (! CheckAirBrakeLimit(1))
999  {
1000  return;
1001  }
1002 
1003  m_rig->airbrakes[m_rig->free_airbrake] = new Airbrake(
1004  m_rig->truckname,
1005  m_rig->free_airbrake,
1006  GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.reference_node),
1007  GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.x_axis_node),
1008  GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.y_axis_node),
1009  GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.aditional_node),
1010  def.offset,
1011  def.width,
1012  def.height,
1013  def.max_inclination_angle,
1014  m_cab_material_name,
1015  def.texcoord_x1,
1016  def.texcoord_y1,
1017  def.texcoord_x2,
1018  def.texcoord_y2,
1019  def.lift_coefficient
1020  );
1021  m_rig->free_airbrake++;
1022 }
1023 
1024 void RigSpawner::ProcessWing(RigDef::Wing & def)
1025 {
1026  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1027 
1028  if ((m_first_wing_index != -1) && (m_rig->wings[m_rig->free_wing - 1].fa == nullptr))
1029  {
1030  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Unable to process wing, previous wing has no Airfoil");
1031  return;
1032  }
1033 
1034  // Create airfoil
1035  int node_indices[8];
1036  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
1037  {
1038  node_indices[i] = this->GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.nodes[i]);
1039  }
1040 
1041  const std::string wing_name = this->ComposeName("Wing", m_rig->free_wing);
1042  auto flex_airfoil = new FlexAirfoil(
1043  wing_name,
1044  m_rig->nodes,
1045  node_indices[0],
1046  node_indices[1],
1047  node_indices[2],
1048  node_indices[3],
1049  node_indices[4],
1050  node_indices[5],
1051  node_indices[6],
1052  node_indices[7],
1053  m_cab_material_name,
1054  Ogre::Vector2(def.tex_coords[0], def.tex_coords[1]),
1055  Ogre::Vector2(def.tex_coords[2], def.tex_coords[3]),
1056  Ogre::Vector2(def.tex_coords[4], def.tex_coords[5]),
1057  Ogre::Vector2(def.tex_coords[6], def.tex_coords[7]),
1058  def.control_surface,
1059  def.chord_point,
1060  def.min_deflection,
1061  def.max_deflection,
1062  def.airfoil,
1063  def.efficacy_coef,
1064  m_rig->aeroengines,
1065  m_rig->state != NETWORKED
1066  );
1067 
1068  Ogre::Entity* entity = nullptr;
1069  try
1070  {
1071  const std::string wing_instance_name = this->ComposeName("WingEntity", m_rig->free_wing);
1072  entity = gEnv->sceneManager->createEntity(wing_instance_name, wing_name);
1073  m_rig->deletion_Entities.emplace_back(entity);
1074  this->SetupNewEntity(entity, Ogre::ColourValue(0.5, 1, 0));
1075  }
1076  catch (...)
1077  {
1078  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, std::string("Failed to load mesh (flexbody wing): ") + wing_name);
1079  delete flex_airfoil;
1080  return;
1081  }
1082 
1083  // induced drag
1084  if (m_first_wing_index == -1)
1085  {
1086  m_first_wing_index = m_rig->free_wing;
1087  m_wing_area=ComputeWingArea(
1088  this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nfld).AbsPosition, this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nfrd).AbsPosition,
1089  this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nbld).AbsPosition, this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nbrd).AbsPosition
1090  );
1091  }
1092  else
1093  {
1094  wing_t & previous_wing = m_rig->wings[m_rig->free_wing - 1];
1095 
1096  if (node_indices[1] != previous_wing.fa->nfld)
1097  {
1098  wing_t & start_wing = m_rig->wings[m_first_wing_index];
1099 
1100  //discontinuity
1101  //inform wing segments
1102  float span = GetNode( start_wing.fa->nfrd).RelPosition.distance( GetNode(previous_wing.fa->nfld).RelPosition );
1103 
1104  start_wing.fa->enableInducedDrag(span, m_wing_area, false);
1105  previous_wing.fa->enableInducedDrag(span, m_wing_area, true);
1106 
1107  //we want also to add positional lights for first wing
1108  if (m_generate_wing_position_lights && (m_rig->m_flares_mode != App::GFX_FLARES_NONE))
1109  {
1110  if (! CheckPropLimit(4))
1111  {
1112  return;
1113  }
1114 
1115  //Left green
1116  m_airplane_left_light=previous_wing.fa->nfld;
1117  prop_t & left_green_prop = m_rig->props[m_rig->free_prop];
1118  m_rig->free_prop++;
1119 
1120  left_green_prop.noderef=previous_wing.fa->nfld;
1121  left_green_prop.nodex=previous_wing.fa->nflu;
1122  left_green_prop.nodey=previous_wing.fa->nfld; //ignored
1123  left_green_prop.offsetx=0.5;
1124  left_green_prop.offsety=0.0;
1125  left_green_prop.offsetz=0.0;
1126  left_green_prop.rot=Ogre::Quaternion::IDENTITY;
1127  left_green_prop.wheel=nullptr;
1128  left_green_prop.wheelrotdegree=0.0;
1129  left_green_prop.mirror=0;
1130  left_green_prop.pale=0;
1131  left_green_prop.spinner=0;
1132  left_green_prop.scene_node=nullptr; //no visible prop
1133  left_green_prop.beacon_light_rotation_angle[0]=0.0;
1134  left_green_prop.beacon_light_rotation_rate[0]=1.0;
1135  left_green_prop.beacontype='L';
1136  left_green_prop.beacon_light[0]=nullptr; //no light
1137  //the flare billboard
1138  char propname[256];
1139  sprintf(propname, "prop-%s-%i", m_rig->truckname, m_rig->free_prop);
1140  left_green_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0] = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1141  left_green_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]=gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(propname,1);
1142  left_green_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->createBillboard(0,0,0);
1143  if (left_green_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0])
1144  {
1145  left_green_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
1146  left_green_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setMaterialName("tracks/greenflare");
1147  left_green_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->attachObject(left_green_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]);
1148  }
1149  left_green_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
1150  left_green_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setDefaultDimensions(0.5, 0.5);
1151  left_green_prop.animFlags[0]=0;
1152  left_green_prop.animMode[0]=0;
1153 
1154  //Left flash
1155  prop_t & left_flash_prop = m_rig->props[m_rig->free_prop];
1156  m_rig->free_prop++;
1157 
1158  left_flash_prop.noderef=previous_wing.fa->nbld;
1159  left_flash_prop.nodex=previous_wing.fa->nblu;
1160  left_flash_prop.nodey=previous_wing.fa->nbld; //ignored
1161  left_flash_prop.offsetx=0.5;
1162  left_flash_prop.offsety=0.0;
1163  left_flash_prop.offsetz=0.0;
1164  left_flash_prop.rot=Ogre::Quaternion::IDENTITY;
1165  left_flash_prop.wheel=nullptr;
1166  left_flash_prop.wheelrotdegree=0.0;
1167  left_flash_prop.mirror=0;
1168  left_flash_prop.pale=0;
1169  left_flash_prop.spinner=0;
1170  left_flash_prop.scene_node=nullptr; //no visible prop
1171  left_flash_prop.beacon_light_rotation_angle[0]=0.5; //alt
1172  left_flash_prop.beacon_light_rotation_rate[0]=1.0;
1173  left_flash_prop.beacontype='w';
1174  //light
1175  sprintf(propname, "prop-%s-%i", m_rig->truckname, m_rig->free_prop);
1176  left_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(propname);
1177  left_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
1178  left_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 1.0, 1.0));
1179  left_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 1.0, 1.0));
1180  left_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setAttenuation(50.0, 1.0, 0.3, 0.0);
1181  left_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setCastShadows(false);
1182  left_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setVisible(false);
1183  //the flare billboard
1184  left_flash_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0] = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1185  left_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]=gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(propname,1);
1186  left_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->createBillboard(0,0,0);
1187  if (left_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0])
1188  {
1189  left_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
1190  left_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setMaterialName("tracks/flare");
1191  left_flash_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->attachObject(left_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]);
1192  }
1193  left_flash_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
1194  left_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setDefaultDimensions(1.0, 1.0);
1195 
1196  //Right red
1197  m_airplane_right_light=previous_wing.fa->nfrd;
1198  prop_t & right_red_prop = m_rig->props[m_rig->free_prop];
1199  m_rig->free_prop++;
1200 
1201 
1202  right_red_prop.noderef=start_wing.fa->nfrd;
1203  right_red_prop.nodex=start_wing.fa->nfru;
1204  right_red_prop.nodey=start_wing.fa->nfrd; //ignored
1205  right_red_prop.offsetx=0.5;
1206  right_red_prop.offsety=0.0;
1207  right_red_prop.offsetz=0.0;
1208  right_red_prop.rot=Ogre::Quaternion::IDENTITY;
1209  right_red_prop.wheel=nullptr;
1210  right_red_prop.wheelrotdegree=0.0;
1211  right_red_prop.mirror=0;
1212  right_red_prop.pale=0;
1213  right_red_prop.spinner=0;
1214  right_red_prop.scene_node=nullptr; //no visible prop
1215  right_red_prop.beacon_light_rotation_angle[0]=0.0;
1216  right_red_prop.beacon_light_rotation_rate[0]=1.0;
1217  right_red_prop.beacontype='R';
1218  right_red_prop.beacon_light[0]=nullptr; /* No light */
1219  //the flare billboard
1220  sprintf(propname, "prop-%s-%i", m_rig->truckname, m_rig->free_prop);
1221  right_red_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0] = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1222  right_red_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]=gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(propname,1);
1223  right_red_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->createBillboard(0,0,0);
1224  if (right_red_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0])
1225  {
1226  right_red_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
1227  right_red_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setMaterialName("tracks/redflare");
1228  right_red_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->attachObject(right_red_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]);
1229  }
1230  right_red_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
1231  right_red_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setDefaultDimensions(0.5, 0.5);
1232  right_red_prop.animFlags[0]=0;
1233  right_red_prop.animMode[0]=0;
1234 
1235  //Right flash
1236  prop_t & right_flash_prop = m_rig->props[m_rig->free_prop];
1237  m_rig->free_prop++;
1238 
1239  right_flash_prop.noderef=start_wing.fa->nbrd;
1240  right_flash_prop.nodex=start_wing.fa->nbru;
1241  right_flash_prop.nodey=start_wing.fa->nbrd; //ignored
1242  right_flash_prop.offsetx=0.5;
1243  right_flash_prop.offsety=0.0;
1244  right_flash_prop.offsetz=0.0;
1245  right_flash_prop.rot=Ogre::Quaternion::IDENTITY;
1246  right_flash_prop.wheel=nullptr;
1247  right_flash_prop.wheelrotdegree=0.0;
1248  right_flash_prop.mirror=0;
1249  right_flash_prop.pale=0;
1250  right_flash_prop.spinner=0;
1251  right_flash_prop.scene_node=nullptr; //no visible prop
1252  right_flash_prop.beacon_light_rotation_angle[0]=0.5; //alt
1253  right_flash_prop.beacon_light_rotation_rate[0]=1.0;
1254  right_flash_prop.beacontype='w';
1255  //light
1256  sprintf(propname, "prop-%s-%i", m_rig->truckname, m_rig->free_prop);
1257  right_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(propname);
1258  right_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
1259  right_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 1.0, 1.0));
1260  right_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 1.0, 1.0));
1261  right_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setAttenuation(50.0, 1.0, 0.3, 0.0);
1262  right_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setCastShadows(false);
1263  right_flash_prop.beacon_light[0]->setVisible(false);
1264  //the flare billboard
1265  right_flash_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0] = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1266  right_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]=gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(propname,1);
1267  right_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->createBillboard(0,0,0);
1268  if (right_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0] != nullptr)
1269  {
1270  right_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
1271  right_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setMaterialName("tracks/flare");
1272  right_flash_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->attachObject(right_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]);
1273  }
1274  right_flash_prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
1275  right_flash_prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setDefaultDimensions(1.0, 1.0);
1276  right_flash_prop.animFlags[0]=0;
1277  right_flash_prop.animMode[0]=0;
1278 
1279  m_generate_wing_position_lights = false; // Already done
1280  }
1281 
1282  m_first_wing_index = m_rig->free_wing;
1283  m_wing_area=ComputeWingArea(
1284  this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nfld).AbsPosition, this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nfrd).AbsPosition,
1285  this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nbld).AbsPosition, this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nbrd).AbsPosition
1286  );
1287  }
1288  else
1289  {
1290  m_wing_area+=ComputeWingArea(
1291  this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nfld).AbsPosition, this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nfrd).AbsPosition,
1292  this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nbld).AbsPosition, this->GetNode(flex_airfoil->nbrd).AbsPosition
1293  );
1294  }
1295  }
1296 
1297  // Add new wing to rig
1298  m_rig->wings[m_rig->free_wing].fa = flex_airfoil;
1299  m_rig->wings[m_rig->free_wing].cnode = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1300  m_rig->wings[m_rig->free_wing].cnode->attachObject(entity);
1301 
1302  ++m_rig->free_wing;
1303 }
1304 
1305 float RigSpawner::ComputeWingArea(Ogre::Vector3 const & ref, Ogre::Vector3 const & x, Ogre::Vector3 const & y, Ogre::Vector3 const & aref)
1306 {
1307  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1308 
1309  return (((x-ref).crossProduct(y-ref)).length()+((x-aref).crossProduct(y-aref)).length())*0.5f;
1310 }
1311 
1312 void RigSpawner::ProcessSoundSource2(RigDef::SoundSource2 & def)
1313 {
1314  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1315 
1316  int mode = (def.mode == RigDef::SoundSource2::MODE_CINECAM) ? def.cinecam_index : def.mode;
1317  int node_index = FindNodeIndex(def.node);
1318  if (node_index == -1)
1319  {
1320  return;
1321  }
1322  AddSoundSource(
1323  m_rig,
1324  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().createInstance(def.sound_script_name, m_rig->trucknum),
1325  node_index,
1326  mode
1327  );
1328 }
1329 
1330 void RigSpawner::AddSoundSourceInstance(Beam *vehicle, Ogre::String const & sound_script_name, int node_index, int type)
1331 {
1332  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1333 
1334  AddSoundSource(vehicle, SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().createInstance(sound_script_name, vehicle->trucknum, nullptr), node_index);
1335 }
1336 
1337 void RigSpawner::AddSoundSource(Beam *vehicle, SoundScriptInstance *sound_script, int node_index, int type)
1338 {
1339  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1340 
1341  if (! CheckSoundScriptLimit(vehicle, 1))
1342  {
1343  return;
1344  }
1345 
1346  if (sound_script == nullptr)
1347  {
1348  return;
1349  }
1350 
1351  vehicle->soundsources[vehicle->free_soundsource].ssi=sound_script;
1352  vehicle->soundsources[vehicle->free_soundsource].nodenum=node_index;
1353  vehicle->soundsources[vehicle->free_soundsource].type=type;
1354  vehicle->free_soundsource++;
1355 }
1356 
1357 void RigSpawner::ProcessSoundSource(RigDef::SoundSource & def)
1358 {
1359  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1360 
1361  AddSoundSource(
1362  m_rig,
1363  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().createInstance(def.sound_script_name, m_rig->trucknum),
1364  GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.node),
1365  -2
1366  );
1367 }
1368 
1369 void RigSpawner::ProcessCameraRail(RigDef::CameraRail & def)
1370 {
1371  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1372 
1373  auto itor = def.nodes.begin();
1374  auto end = def.nodes.end();
1375  for(; itor != end; ++itor)
1376  {
1377  if (! CheckCameraRailLimit(1))
1378  {
1379  return;
1380  }
1381  m_rig->cameraRail[m_rig->free_camerarail] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(*itor);
1382  m_rig->free_camerarail++;
1383  }
1384 }
1385 
1386 void RigSpawner::ProcessExtCamera(RigDef::ExtCamera & def)
1387 {
1388  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1389 
1390  m_rig->externalcameramode = def.mode;
1391  if (def.node.IsValidAnyState())
1392  {
1393  m_rig->externalcameranode = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.node);
1394  }
1395 }
1396 
1397 void RigSpawner::ProcessGuiSettings(RigDef::GuiSettings & def)
1398 {
1399  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1400 
1401  // Currently unused (was relevant to overlay-based HUD): def.tacho_material; def.speedo_material;
1402 
1403  if (! def.help_material.empty())
1404  {
1405  strncpy(m_rig->helpmat, def.help_material.c_str(), sizeof(m_rig->helpmat) - 1);
1406  }
1407  if (def.speedo_highest_kph > 10 && def.speedo_highest_kph < 32000)
1408  {
1409  m_rig->speedoMax = def.speedo_highest_kph; /* Handles default */
1410  }
1411  else
1412  {
1413  std::stringstream msg;
1414  msg << "Invalid 'speedo_highest_kph' value (" << def.speedo_highest_kph << "), allowed range is <10 -32000>. Falling back to default...";
1415  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
1416  m_rig->speedoMax = RigDef::GuiSettings::DEFAULT_SPEEDO_MAX;
1417  }
1418  m_rig->useMaxRPMforGUI = def.use_max_rpm; /* Handles default */
1419 
1420  std::list<Ogre::String>::iterator dash_itor = def.dashboard_layouts.begin();
1421  for ( ; dash_itor != def.dashboard_layouts.end(); dash_itor++)
1422  {
1423  m_rig->dashBoardLayouts.push_back(std::pair<Ogre::String, bool>(*dash_itor, false));
1424  }
1425 
1426  std::list<Ogre::String>::iterator rtt_itor = def.rtt_dashboard_layouts.begin();
1427  for ( ; rtt_itor != def.rtt_dashboard_layouts.end(); rtt_itor++)
1428  {
1429  m_rig->dashBoardLayouts.push_back(std::pair<Ogre::String, bool>(*rtt_itor, true));
1430  }
1431 
1432 }
1433 
1434 void RigSpawner::ProcessFixedNode(RigDef::Node::Ref node_ref)
1435 {
1436  node_t & node = GetNodeOrThrow(node_ref);
1437  node.locked = 1;
1438 }
1439 
1440 void RigSpawner::ProcessExhaust(RigDef::Exhaust & def)
1441 {
1442  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1443 
1444  // parse exhausts
1445  if (m_rig->disable_smoke)
1446  {
1447  return;
1448  }
1449 
1450  node_t & ref_node = GetNodeOrThrow(def.reference_node);//id1;
1451  node_t & dir_node = GetNodeOrThrow(def.direction_node);//id2;
1452 
1453  exhaust_t exhaust;
1454  exhaust.emitterNode = ref_node.pos;
1455  exhaust.directionNode = dir_node.pos;
1456  exhaust.isOldFormat = false;
1457  exhaust.factor = 1.f; // Unused, according to wiki documentation.
1458  std::memset(exhaust.material, 0, sizeof(exhaust.material));
1459 
1460  exhaust.smokeNode = m_parent_scene_node->createChildSceneNode();
1461  std::stringstream instance_name;
1462  instance_name << "exhaust-" << m_rig->exhausts.size() << "-" << m_rig->truckname;
1463  Ogre::String material_name;
1464  if (def.material_name.empty() || def.material_name == "default")
1465  {
1466  material_name = "tracks/Smoke";
1467  }
1468  else
1469  {
1470  material_name = def.material_name;
1471  }
1472 
1473  if (m_rig->usedSkin != nullptr)
1474  {
1475  auto search = m_rig->usedSkin->replace_materials.find(material_name);
1476  if (search != m_rig->usedSkin->replace_materials.end())
1477  {
1478  material_name = search->second;
1479  }
1480  }
1481 
1482  exhaust.smoker = gEnv->sceneManager->createParticleSystem(instance_name.str(), material_name);
1483  if (!exhaust.smoker)
1484  {
1485  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to create exhaust particle system");
1486  return;
1487  }
1488  exhaust.smoker->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED); // disable particles in depthmap
1489  exhaust.smokeNode->attachObject(exhaust.smoker);
1490  exhaust.smokeNode->setPosition(m_rig->nodes[exhaust.emitterNode].AbsPosition);
1491 
1492  ref_node.isHot=true;
1493  dir_node.isHot=true;
1494  m_rig->exhausts.push_back(exhaust);
1495 }
1496 
1497 void RigSpawner::ProcessSubmeshGroundmodel()
1498 {
1499  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1500 
1501  SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_SUBMESH_GROUNDMODEL);
1502 
1503  auto module_itor = m_selected_modules.begin();
1504  auto module_end = m_selected_modules.end();
1505  for (; module_itor != module_end; ++module_itor)
1506  {
1507  if (! module_itor->get()->submeshes_ground_model_name.empty())
1508  {
1509  m_rig->subMeshGroundModelName = module_itor->get()->submeshes_ground_model_name;
1510  break;
1511  }
1512  }
1513 
1514  SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_INVALID);
1515 };
1516 
1517 void RigSpawner::ProcessSubmesh(RigDef::Submesh & def)
1518 {
1519  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1520 
1521  if (! CheckSubmeshLimit(1))
1522  {
1523  return;
1524  }
1525 
1526  /* TEXCOORDS */
1527 
1528  std::vector<RigDef::Texcoord>::iterator texcoord_itor = def.texcoords.begin();
1529  for ( ; texcoord_itor != def.texcoords.end(); texcoord_itor++)
1530  {
1531  if (! CheckTexcoordLimit(1))
1532  {
1533  break;
1534  }
1535 
1536  CabTexcoord texcoord;
1537  texcoord.node_id = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(texcoord_itor->node);
1538  texcoord.texcoord_u = texcoord_itor->u;
1539  texcoord.texcoord_v = texcoord_itor->v;
1540  m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords.push_back(texcoord);
1541  }
1542 
1543  /* CAB */
1544 
1545  auto cab_itor = def.cab_triangles.begin();
1546  auto cab_itor_end = def.cab_triangles.end();
1547  for ( ; cab_itor != cab_itor_end; ++cab_itor)
1548  {
1549  if (! CheckCabLimit(1))
1550  {
1551  return;
1552  }
1553  else if (m_rig->free_collcab >= MAX_CABS)
1554  {
1555  std::stringstream msg;
1556  msg << "Collcab limit (" << MAX_CABS << ") exceeded";
1557  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
1558  return;
1559  }
1560 
1561  bool mk_buoyance = false;
1562 
1563  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3]=GetNodeIndexOrThrow(cab_itor->nodes[0]); //id1;
1564  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3+1]=GetNodeIndexOrThrow(cab_itor->nodes[1]);//id2;
1565  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3+2]=GetNodeIndexOrThrow(cab_itor->nodes[2]);//id3;
1566 
1567  if (BITMASK_IS_1(cab_itor->options, RigDef::Cab::OPTION_c_CONTACT))
1568  {
1569  m_rig->collcabs[m_rig->free_collcab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1570  m_rig->free_collcab++;
1571  }
1572  if (BITMASK_IS_1(cab_itor->options, RigDef::Cab::OPTION_p_10xTOUGHER))
1573  {
1574  m_rig->collcabs[m_rig->free_collcab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1575  m_rig->free_collcab++;
1576  }
1577  if (BITMASK_IS_1(cab_itor->options, RigDef::Cab::OPTION_u_INVULNERABLE))
1578  {
1579  m_rig->collcabs[m_rig->free_collcab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1580  m_rig->free_collcab++;
1581  }
1582  if (BITMASK_IS_1(cab_itor->options, RigDef::Cab::OPTION_b_BUOYANT))
1583  {
1584  m_rig->buoycabs[m_rig->free_buoycab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1585  m_rig->buoycabtypes[m_rig->free_buoycab]=Buoyance::BUOY_NORMAL;
1586  m_rig->free_buoycab++;
1587  mk_buoyance = true;
1588  }
1589  if (BITMASK_IS_1(cab_itor->options, RigDef::Cab::OPTION_r_BUOYANT_ONLY_DRAG))
1590  {
1591  m_rig->buoycabs[m_rig->free_buoycab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1592  m_rig->buoycabtypes[m_rig->free_buoycab]=Buoyance::BUOY_DRAGONLY;
1593  m_rig->free_buoycab++;
1594  mk_buoyance = true;
1595  }
1596  if (BITMASK_IS_1(cab_itor->options, RigDef::Cab::OPTION_s_BUOYANT_NO_DRAG))
1597  {
1598  m_rig->buoycabs[m_rig->free_buoycab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1599  m_rig->buoycabtypes[m_rig->free_buoycab]=Buoyance::BUOY_DRAGLESS;
1600  m_rig->free_buoycab++;
1601  mk_buoyance = true;
1602  }
1603 
1604  int collcabs_type = -1;
1605  if (cab_itor->GetOption_D_ContactBuoyant())
1606  {
1607  collcabs_type = 0;
1608  }
1609  if (cab_itor->GetOption_F_10xTougherBuoyant())
1610  {
1611  collcabs_type = 1;
1612  }
1613  if (cab_itor->GetOption_S_UnpenetrableBuoyant())
1614  {
1615  collcabs_type = 2;
1616  }
1617 
1618  //if (type=='D' || type == 'F' || type == 'S')
1619  if (collcabs_type != -1)
1620  {
1621 
1622  if (m_rig->free_collcab >= MAX_CABS)
1623  {
1624  std::stringstream msg;
1625  msg << "Collcab limit (" << MAX_CABS << ") exceeded";
1626  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
1627  return;
1628  }
1629  else if (m_rig->free_buoycab >= MAX_CABS)
1630  {
1631  std::stringstream msg;
1632  msg << "Buoycab limit (" << MAX_CABS << ") exceeded";
1633  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
1634  return;
1635  }
1636 
1637  m_rig->collcabs[m_rig->free_collcab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1638  m_rig->free_collcab++;
1639  m_rig->buoycabs[m_rig->free_buoycab]=m_rig->free_cab;
1640  m_rig->buoycabtypes[m_rig->free_buoycab]=Buoyance::BUOY_NORMAL;
1641  m_rig->free_buoycab++;
1642  mk_buoyance = true;
1643  }
1644 
1645  if (mk_buoyance && (m_rig->buoyance == nullptr))
1646  {
1647  auto& dustman = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->GetParticleManager();
1648  m_rig->buoyance=new Buoyance(dustman.getDustPool("splash"), dustman.getDustPool("ripple"));
1649  }
1650  m_rig->free_cab++;
1651  }
1652 
1653  //close the current mesh
1654  CabSubmesh submesh;
1655  submesh.texcoords_pos = m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords.size();
1656  submesh.cabs_pos = static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_cab);
1657  submesh.backmesh_type = CabSubmesh::BACKMESH_NONE;
1658  m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.push_back(submesh);
1659 
1660  /* BACKMESH */
1661 
1662  if (def.backmesh)
1663  {
1664 
1665  // Check limit
1666  if (! CheckCabLimit(1))
1667  {
1668  return;
1669  }
1670 
1671  // === add an extra front mesh ===
1672  //texcoords
1673  int uv_start = (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.size()==1) ? 0 : (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.rbegin()+1)->texcoords_pos;
1674  for (size_t i=uv_start; i<m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.back().texcoords_pos; i++)
1675  {
1676  m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords.push_back(m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords[i]);
1677  }
1678  //cab
1679  int cab_start = (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.size()==1) ? 0 : (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.rbegin()+1)->cabs_pos;
1680  for (size_t i=cab_start; i<m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.back().cabs_pos; i++)
1681  {
1682  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3]=m_rig->cabs[i*3];
1683  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3+1]=m_rig->cabs[i*3+1];
1684  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3+2]=m_rig->cabs[i*3+2];
1685  m_rig->free_cab++;
1686  }
1687  // Finalize
1688  CabSubmesh submesh;
1689  submesh.backmesh_type = CabSubmesh::BACKMESH_TRANSPARENT;
1690  submesh.texcoords_pos = m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords.size();
1691  submesh.cabs_pos = static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_cab);
1692  m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.push_back(submesh);
1693 
1694  // === add an extra back mesh ===
1695  //texcoords
1696  uv_start = (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.size()==1) ? 0 : (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.rbegin()+1)->texcoords_pos;
1697  for (size_t i=uv_start; i<m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.back().texcoords_pos; i++)
1698  {
1699  m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords.push_back(m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords[i]);
1700  }
1701 
1702  //cab
1703  cab_start = (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.size()==1) ? 0 : (m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.rbegin()+1)->cabs_pos;
1704  for (size_t i=cab_start; i<m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.back().cabs_pos; i++)
1705  {
1706  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3]=m_rig->cabs[i*3+1];
1707  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3+1]=m_rig->cabs[i*3];
1708  m_rig->cabs[m_rig->free_cab*3+2]=m_rig->cabs[i*3+2];
1709  m_rig->free_cab++;
1710  }
1711 
1712  //close the current mesh
1713  CabSubmesh submesh2;
1714  submesh2.texcoords_pos = m_oldstyle_cab_texcoords.size();
1715  submesh2.cabs_pos = static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_cab);
1716  submesh2.backmesh_type = CabSubmesh::BACKMESH_OPAQUE;
1717  m_oldstyle_cab_submeshes.push_back(submesh2);
1718  }
1719 }
1720 
1721 void RigSpawner::ProcessFlexbody(std::shared_ptr<RigDef::Flexbody> def)
1722 {
1723  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1724 
1725  if (!this->CheckFlexbodyLimit(1))
1726  {
1727  return;
1728  }
1729 
1730  // Collect nodes
1731  std::vector<unsigned int> node_indices;
1732  bool nodes_found = true;
1733  for (auto& node_def: def->node_list)
1734  {
1735  auto result = this->GetNodeIndex(node_def);
1736  if (!result.second)
1737  {
1738  nodes_found = false;
1739  break;
1740  }
1741  node_indices.push_back(result.first);
1742  }
1743 
1744  if (! nodes_found)
1745  {
1746  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to collect nodes from node-ranges, skipping flexbody: " + def->mesh_name);
1747  return;
1748  }
1749 
1750  const int reference_node = this->FindNodeIndex(def->reference_node);
1751  const int x_axis_node = this->FindNodeIndex(def->x_axis_node);
1752  const int y_axis_node = this->FindNodeIndex(def->y_axis_node);
1753  if (reference_node == -1 || x_axis_node == -1 || y_axis_node == -1)
1754  {
1755  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to find required nodes, skipping flexbody '" + def->mesh_name + "'");
1756  return;
1757  }
1758 
1759  Ogre::Quaternion rot=Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def->rotation.z), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Z);
1760  rot=rot*Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def->rotation.y), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y);
1761  rot=rot*Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def->rotation.x), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_X);
1762 
1763  try
1764  {
1765  auto* flexbody = m_flex_factory.CreateFlexBody(
1766  def.get(), reference_node, x_axis_node, y_axis_node, rot, node_indices);
1767 
1768  if (flexbody == nullptr)
1769  return; // Error already logged
1770 
1771  if (def->camera_settings.mode == RigDef::CameraSettings::MODE_CINECAM)
1772  flexbody->setCameraMode(static_cast<int>(def->camera_settings.cinecam_index));
1773  else
1774  flexbody->setCameraMode(static_cast<int>(def->camera_settings.mode));
1775 
1776  m_rig->flexbodies[m_rig->free_flexbody] = flexbody;
1777  m_rig->free_flexbody++;
1778  }
1779  catch (Ogre::Exception& e)
1780  {
1781  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR,
1782  "Failed to create flexbody '" + def->mesh_name + "', reason:" + e.getFullDescription());
1783  }
1784 }
1785 
1786 void RigSpawner::ProcessProp(RigDef::Prop & def)
1787 {
1788  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
1789 
1790  if (! CheckPropLimit(1))
1791  {
1792  return;
1793  }
1794 
1795  prop_t & prop = m_rig->props[m_rig->free_prop];
1796  int prop_index = m_rig->free_prop;
1797  memset(&prop, 0, sizeof(prop_t));
1798 
1799  prop.noderef = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.reference_node);
1800  prop.nodex = FindNodeIndex(def.x_axis_node);
1801  prop.nodey = FindNodeIndex(def.y_axis_node);
1802  if (prop.nodex == -1 || prop.nodey == -1)
1803  {
1804  return;
1805  }
1806  prop.offsetx = def.offset.x;
1807  prop.offsety = def.offset.y;
1808  prop.offsetz = def.offset.z;
1809  prop.orgoffsetX = def.offset.x;
1810  prop.orgoffsetY = def.offset.y;
1811  prop.orgoffsetZ = def.offset.z;
1812  prop.rotaX = def.rotation.x;
1813  prop.rotaY = def.rotation.y;
1814  prop.rotaZ = def.rotation.z;
1815  prop.rot = Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def.rotation.z), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Z);
1816  prop.rot = prop.rot * Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def.rotation.y), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y);
1817  prop.rot = prop.rot * Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def.rotation.x), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_X);
1818  prop.cameramode = def.camera_settings.mode; /* Handles default value */
1819  prop.wheelrotdegree = 160.f;
1820  /* Set no animation by default */
1821  prop.animKey[0] = -1;
1822  prop.animKeyState[0] = -1.f;
1823 
1824  /* SPECIAL PROPS */
1825 
1826  /* Rear view mirror (left) */
1827  if (def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_MIRROR_LEFT)
1828  {
1829  prop.mirror = 1;
1830  m_curr_mirror_prop_type = CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_LEFT;
1831  }
1832 
1833  /* Rear view mirror (right) */
1834  if (def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_MIRROR_RIGHT)
1835  {
1836  prop.mirror = -1;
1837  m_curr_mirror_prop_type = CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_RIGHT;
1838  }
1839 
1840  /* Custom steering wheel */
1841  Ogre::Vector3 steering_wheel_offset = Ogre::Vector3::ZERO;
1842  if (def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_DASHBOARD_LEFT)
1843  {
1844  steering_wheel_offset = Ogre::Vector3(-0.67, -0.61,0.24);
1845  }
1846  if (def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_DASHBOARD_RIGHT)
1847  {
1848  steering_wheel_offset = Ogre::Vector3(0.67, -0.61,0.24);
1849  }
1850  if (steering_wheel_offset != Ogre::Vector3::ZERO)
1851  {
1852  if (def.special_prop_dashboard._offset_is_set)
1853  {
1854  steering_wheel_offset = def.special_prop_dashboard.offset;
1855  }
1856  prop.wheelrotdegree = def.special_prop_dashboard.rotation_angle;
1857  prop.wheel = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1858  prop.wheelpos = steering_wheel_offset;
1859  const std::string instance_name = this->ComposeName("SteeringWheelPropEntity", prop_index);
1860  prop.wheelmo = new MeshObject(
1861  def.special_prop_dashboard.mesh_name,
1862  instance_name,
1863  prop.wheel,
1864  m_enable_background_loading
1865  );
1866  this->SetupNewEntity(prop.wheelmo->getEntity(), Ogre::ColourValue(0, 0.5, 0.5));
1867  }
1868 
1869  /* CREATE THE PROP */
1870 
1871  prop.scene_node = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1872  const std::string instance_name = this->ComposeName("PropEntity", prop_index);
1873  prop.mo = new MeshObject(def.mesh_name, instance_name, prop.scene_node, m_enable_background_loading);
1874  prop.mo->setCastShadows(true); // Orig code {{ prop.mo->setCastShadows(shadowmode != 0); }}, shadowmode has default value 1 and changes with undocumented directive 'set_shadows'
1875  prop.beacontype = 'n'; // Orig: hardcoded in BTS_PROPS
1876 
1877  if (def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_SPINPROP)
1878  {
1879  prop.spinner = 1;
1880  prop.mo->setCastShadows(false);
1881  prop.scene_node->setVisible(false);
1882  }
1883  else if(def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_PALE)
1884  {
1885  prop.pale = 1;
1886  }
1887  else if(def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_DRIVER_SEAT)
1888  {
1889  //driver seat, used to position the driver and make the seat translucent at times
1890  if (m_rig->driverSeat == nullptr)
1891  {
1892  m_rig->driverSeat = & prop;
1893  prop.mo->setMaterialName("driversseat");
1894  }
1895  else
1896  {
1897  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, "Found more than one 'seat[2]' special props. Only the first one will be the driver's seat.");
1898  }
1899  }
1900  else if(def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_DRIVER_SEAT_2)
1901  {
1902  // Same as DRIVER_SEAT, except it doesn't force the "driversseat" material
1903  if (m_rig->driverSeat == nullptr)
1904  {
1905  m_rig->driverSeat = & prop;
1906  }
1907  else
1908  {
1909  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, "Found more than one 'seat[2]' special props. Only the first one will be the driver's seat.");
1910  }
1911  }
1912  else if (m_rig->m_flares_mode != App::GFX_FLARES_NONE)
1913  {
1914  if(def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_BEACON)
1915  {
1916  prop.beacontype = 'b';
1917  prop.beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] = 2.0 * 3.14 * (std::rand() / RAND_MAX);
1918  prop.beacon_light_rotation_rate[0] = 4.0 * 3.14 + (std::rand() / RAND_MAX) - 0.5;
1919  /* the light */
1920  auto beacon_light = gEnv->sceneManager->createLight();
1921  beacon_light->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT);
1922  beacon_light->setDiffuseColour(def.special_prop_beacon.color);
1923  beacon_light->setSpecularColour(def.special_prop_beacon.color);
1924  beacon_light->setAttenuation(50.0, 1.0, 0.3, 0.0);
1925  beacon_light->setSpotlightRange( Ogre::Degree(35), Ogre::Degree(45) );
1926  beacon_light->setCastShadows(false);
1927  beacon_light->setVisible(false);
1928  /* the flare billboard */
1929 
1930  auto flare_scene_node = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1931  auto flare_billboard_sys = gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(1); //(propname,1);
1932  flare_scene_node->attachObject(flare_billboard_sys);
1933  flare_billboard_sys->createBillboard(0,0,0);
1934  if (flare_billboard_sys)
1935  {
1936  flare_billboard_sys->setMaterialName(def.special_prop_beacon.flare_material_name);
1937  flare_billboard_sys->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
1938  }
1939  flare_scene_node->setVisible(false);
1940  flare_billboard_sys->setVisible(false);
1941 
1942  // Complete
1943  prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0] = flare_scene_node;
1944  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0] = flare_billboard_sys;
1945  prop.beacon_light[0] = beacon_light;
1946  }
1947  else if(def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_REDBEACON)
1948  {
1949  prop.beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] = 0.f;
1950  prop.beacon_light_rotation_rate[0] = 1.0;
1951  prop.beacontype = 'r';
1952  //the light
1953  auto beacon_light=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight();//propname);
1954  beacon_light->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
1955  beacon_light->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0));
1956  beacon_light->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0));
1957  beacon_light->setAttenuation(50.0, 1.0, 0.3, 0.0);
1958  beacon_light->setCastShadows(false);
1959  beacon_light->setVisible(false);
1960  //the flare billboard
1961  auto flare_scene_node = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
1962  auto flare_billboard_sys =gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(1); //propname,1);
1963  flare_billboard_sys->createBillboard(0,0,0);
1964  flare_billboard_sys->setMaterialName("tracks/redbeaconflare");
1965  flare_billboard_sys->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
1966  flare_scene_node->attachObject(flare_billboard_sys);
1967  flare_scene_node->setVisible(false);
1968  flare_billboard_sys->setDefaultDimensions(1.0, 1.0);
1969 
1970  // Finalize
1971  prop.beacon_light[0] = beacon_light;
1972  prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0] = flare_scene_node;
1973  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[0] = flare_billboard_sys;
1974 
1975  }
1976  else if(def.special == RigDef::Prop::SPECIAL_LIGHTBAR)
1977  {
1978  m_rig->ispolice = true;
1979  prop.beacontype='p';
1980  for (int k=0; k<4; k++)
1981  {
1982  // Randomize rotation speed and timing,
1983  // IMPORTANT: Do not remove the (Ogre::Real) casts, they affect result!
1984  prop.beacon_light_rotation_angle[k]=2.0*3.14*((Ogre::Real)std::rand()/(Ogre::Real)RAND_MAX);
1985  prop.beacon_light_rotation_rate[k]=4.0*3.14+((Ogre::Real)std::rand()/(Ogre::Real)RAND_MAX)-0.5;
1986  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]=nullptr;
1987  //the light
1988  prop.beacon_light[k]=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight();
1989  prop.beacon_light[k]->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT);
1990  if (k>1)
1991  {
1992  prop.beacon_light[k]->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0));
1993  prop.beacon_light[k]->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0));
1994  }
1995  else
1996  {
1997  prop.beacon_light[k]->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(0.0, 0.5, 1.0));
1998  prop.beacon_light[k]->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(0.0, 0.5, 1.0));
1999  }
2000  prop.beacon_light[k]->setAttenuation(50.0, 1.0, 0.3, 0.0);
2001  prop.beacon_light[k]->setSpotlightRange( Ogre::Degree(35), Ogre::Degree(45) );
2002  prop.beacon_light[k]->setCastShadows(false);
2003  prop.beacon_light[k]->setVisible(false);
2004  //the flare billboard
2005  prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k] = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
2006  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]=gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(1);
2007  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]->createBillboard(0,0,0);
2008  if (prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k])
2009  {
2010  if (k>1)
2011  {
2012  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]->setMaterialName("tracks/brightredflare");
2013  }
2014  else
2015  {
2016  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]->setMaterialName("tracks/brightblueflare");
2017  }
2018 
2019  prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
2020  prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->attachObject(prop.beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]);
2021  }
2022  prop.beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->setVisible(false);
2023  }
2024  }
2025 
2026  if (m_curr_mirror_prop_type != CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_NONE)
2027  {
2028  m_curr_mirror_prop_scenenode = prop.mo->GetSceneNode();
2029  }
2030  this->SetupNewEntity(prop.mo->getEntity(), Ogre::ColourValue(1.f, 1.f, 0.f));
2031  }
2032 
2033  ++m_rig->free_prop;
2034  m_curr_mirror_prop_scenenode = nullptr;
2035  m_curr_mirror_prop_type = CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_NONE;
2036 
2037  /* PROCESS ANIMATIONS */
2038 
2039  if (def.animations.size() > 10)
2040  {
2041  std::stringstream msg;
2042  msg << "Prop (mesh: " << def.mesh_name << ") has too many animations: " << def.animations.size() << " (max. is 10). Using first 10 ...";
2043  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, msg.str());
2044  }
2045 
2046  std::list<RigDef::Animation>::iterator anim_itor = def.animations.begin();
2047  int anim_index = 0;
2048  while (anim_itor != def.animations.end() && anim_index < 10)
2049  {
2050  prop.animKeyState[anim_index] = -1.0f; // Orig: hardcoded in {add_animation}
2051 
2052  /* Arg #1: ratio */
2053  prop.animratio[anim_index] = anim_itor->ratio;
2054  if (anim_itor->ratio == 0)
2055  {
2056  std::stringstream msg;
2057  msg << "Prop (mesh: " << def.mesh_name << ") has invalid animation ratio (0), using it anyway (compatibility)...";
2058  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, msg.str());
2059  }
2060 
2061  /* Arg #2: option1 (lower limit) */
2062  prop.constraints[anim_index].lower_limit = anim_itor->lower_limit; /* Handles default */
2063 
2064  /* Arg #3: option2 (upper limit) */
2065  prop.constraints[anim_index].upper_limit = anim_itor->upper_limit; /* Handles default */
2066 
2067  /* Arg #4: source */
2068  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_AIRSPEED)) { /* (NOTE: code formatting relaxed) */
2069  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_AIRSPEED);
2070  }
2071  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_VERTICAL_VELOCITY)) {
2072  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_VVI);
2073  }
2074  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_ALTIMETER_100K)) {
2075  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_ALTIMETER);
2076  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = 1.f;
2077  }
2078  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_ALTIMETER_10K)) {
2079  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_ALTIMETER);
2080  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = 2.f;
2081  }
2082  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_ALTIMETER_1K)) {
2083  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_ALTIMETER);
2084  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = 3.f;
2085  }
2086  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK)) {
2087  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_AOA);
2088  }
2089  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_FLAP)) {
2090  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_FLAP);
2091  }
2092  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_AIR_BRAKE)) {
2093  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_AIRBRAKE);
2094  }
2095  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_ROLL)) {
2096  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_ROLL);
2097  }
2098  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_PITCH)) {
2099  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_PITCH);
2100  }
2101  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_BRAKES)) {
2102  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_BRAKE);
2103  }
2104  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_ACCEL)) {
2105  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_ACCEL);
2106  }
2107  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_CLUTCH)) {
2108  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_CLUTCH);
2109  }
2110  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_SPEEDO)) {
2111  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_SPEEDO);
2112  }
2113  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_TACHO)) {
2114  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_TACHO);
2115  }
2116  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_TURBO)) {
2117  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_TURBO);
2118  }
2119  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_PARKING)) {
2120  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_PBRAKE);
2121  }
2122  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_SHIFT_LEFT_RIGHT)) {
2123  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
2124  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = 1.0f;
2125  }
2126  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_SHIFT_BACK_FORTH)) {
2127  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
2128  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = 2.0f;
2129  }
2130  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_SEQUENTIAL_SHIFT)) {
2131  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
2132  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = 3.0f;
2133  }
2134  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_SHIFTERLIN)) {
2135  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
2136  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = 4.0f;
2137  }
2138  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_TORQUE)) {
2139  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_TORQUE);
2140  }
2141  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_HEADING)) {
2142  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_HEADING);
2143  }
2144  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_DIFFLOCK)) {
2145  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_DIFFLOCK);
2146  }
2147  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_STEERING_WHEEL)) {
2148  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_STEERING);
2149  }
2150  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_AILERON)) {
2151  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_AILERONS);
2152  }
2153  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_ELEVATOR)) {
2154  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_ELEVATORS);
2155  }
2156  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_AIR_RUDDER)) {
2157  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_ARUDDER);
2158  }
2159  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_BOAT_RUDDER)) {
2160  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_BRUDDER);
2161  }
2162  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_BOAT_THROTTLE)) {
2163  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_BTHROTTLE);
2164  }
2165  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_PERMANENT)) {
2166  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_PERMANENT);
2167  }
2168  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::SOURCE_EVENT)) {
2169  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_EVENT);
2170  }
2171  /* Motor-indexed sources */
2172  std::list<RigDef::Animation::MotorSource>::iterator source_itor = anim_itor->motor_sources.begin();
2173  for ( ; source_itor != anim_itor->motor_sources.end(); source_itor++)
2174  {
2175  if (BITMASK_IS_1(source_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::MotorSource::SOURCE_AERO_THROTTLE)) {
2176  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_THROTTLE);
2177  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = static_cast<float>(source_itor->motor);
2178  }
2179  if (BITMASK_IS_1(source_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::MotorSource::SOURCE_AERO_RPM)) {
2180  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_RPM);
2181  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = static_cast<float>(source_itor->motor);
2182  }
2183  if (BITMASK_IS_1(source_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::MotorSource::SOURCE_AERO_TORQUE)) {
2184  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_AETORQUE);
2185  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = static_cast<float>(source_itor->motor);
2186  }
2187  if (BITMASK_IS_1(source_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::MotorSource::SOURCE_AERO_PITCH)) {
2188  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_AEPITCH);
2189  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = static_cast<float>(source_itor->motor);
2190  }
2191  if (BITMASK_IS_1(source_itor->source, RigDef::Animation::MotorSource::SOURCE_AERO_STATUS)) {
2192  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animFlags[anim_index], ANIM_FLAG_AESTATUS);
2193  prop.animOpt3[anim_index] = static_cast<float>(source_itor->motor);
2194  }
2195  }
2196  if (prop.animFlags[anim_index] == 0)
2197  {
2198  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to identify animation source");
2199  }
2200 
2201  /* Anim modes */
2202  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_ROTATION_X)) {
2203  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_ROTA_X);
2204  }
2205  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_ROTATION_Y)) {
2206  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Y);
2207  }
2208  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_ROTATION_Z)) {
2209  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Z);
2210  }
2211  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_OFFSET_X)) {
