2212  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_X);
2213  }
2214  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_OFFSET_Y)) {
2215  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Y);
2216  }
2217  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_OFFSET_Z)) {
2218  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Z);
2219  }
2220  if (prop.animMode[anim_index] == 0)
2221  {
2222  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to identify animation mode");
2223  }
2224 
2225  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_AUTO_ANIMATE))
2226  {
2227  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_AUTOANIMATE);
2228 
2229  // Flag whether default lower and/or upper animation limit constraints are effective
2230  const bool use_default_lower_limit = (anim_itor->lower_limit == 0.f);
2231  const bool use_default_upper_limit = (anim_itor->upper_limit == 0.f);
2232 
2233  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_ROTATION_X)) {
2234  prop.constraints[anim_index].lower_limit = (use_default_lower_limit) ? (-180.f) : (anim_itor->lower_limit + prop.rotaX);
2235  prop.constraints[anim_index].upper_limit = (use_default_upper_limit) ? ( 180.f) : (anim_itor->upper_limit + prop.rotaX);
2236  }
2237  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_ROTATION_Y)) {
2238  prop.constraints[anim_index].lower_limit = (use_default_lower_limit) ? (-180.f) : (anim_itor->lower_limit + prop.rotaY);
2239  prop.constraints[anim_index].upper_limit = (use_default_upper_limit) ? ( 180.f) : (anim_itor->upper_limit + prop.rotaY);
2240  }
2241  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_ROTATION_Z)) {
2242  prop.constraints[anim_index].lower_limit = (use_default_lower_limit) ? (-180.f) : (anim_itor->lower_limit + prop.rotaZ);
2243  prop.constraints[anim_index].upper_limit = (use_default_upper_limit) ? ( 180.f) : (anim_itor->upper_limit + prop.rotaZ);
2244  }
2245  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_OFFSET_X)) {
2246  prop.constraints[anim_index].lower_limit = (use_default_lower_limit) ? (-10.f) : (anim_itor->lower_limit + prop.orgoffsetX);
2247  prop.constraints[anim_index].upper_limit = (use_default_upper_limit) ? ( 10.f) : (anim_itor->upper_limit + prop.orgoffsetX);
2248  }
2249  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_OFFSET_Y)) {
2250  prop.constraints[anim_index].lower_limit = (use_default_lower_limit) ? (-10.f) : (anim_itor->lower_limit + prop.orgoffsetY);
2251  prop.constraints[anim_index].upper_limit = (use_default_upper_limit) ? ( 10.f) : (anim_itor->upper_limit + prop.orgoffsetY);
2252  }
2253  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_OFFSET_Z)) {
2254  prop.constraints[anim_index].lower_limit = (use_default_lower_limit) ? (-10.f) : (anim_itor->lower_limit + prop.orgoffsetZ);
2255  prop.constraints[anim_index].upper_limit = (use_default_upper_limit) ? ( 10.f) : (anim_itor->upper_limit + prop.orgoffsetZ);
2256  }
2257  }
2258  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_NO_FLIP))
2259  {
2260  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_NOFLIP);
2261  }
2262  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_BOUNCE))
2263  {
2264  BITMASK_SET_1(prop.animMode[anim_index], ANIM_MODE_BOUNCE);
2265  prop.animOpt5[anim_index] = 1.f;
2266  }
2267  if (BITMASK_IS_1(anim_itor->mode, RigDef::Animation::MODE_EVENT_LOCK))
2268  {
2269  prop.animKeyState[anim_index] = 0.0f;
2270  prop.lastanimKS[anim_index] = 0.0f;
2271  }
2272 
2273  /* Parameter 'event:' */
2274 
2275  if (! anim_itor->event.empty())
2276  {
2277  // we are using keys as source
2278  prop.animFlags[anim_index] |= ANIM_FLAG_EVENT;
2279 
2280  int event_id = RoR::App::GetInputEngine()->resolveEventName(anim_itor->event);
2281  if (event_id == -1)
2282  {
2283  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Unknown animation event: " + anim_itor->event);
2284  }
2285  else
2286  {
2287  prop.animKey[anim_index] = event_id;
2288  }
2289  }
2290 
2291  /* Advance */
2292  anim_itor++;
2293  anim_index++;
2294  }
2295 }
2296 
2297 void RigSpawner::ProcessFlare2(RigDef::Flare2 & def)
2298 {
2299  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2300 
2301  if (m_rig->m_flares_mode == App::GFX_FLARES_NONE) { return; }
2302 
2303  int blink_delay = def.blink_delay_milis;
2304  float size = def.size;
2305 
2306  /* Backwards compatibility */
2307  if (blink_delay == -2)
2308  {
2309  if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_l_LEFT_BLINKER || def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_r_RIGHT_BLINKER)
2310  {
2311  blink_delay = -1; /* Default blink */
2312  }
2313  else
2314  {
2315  blink_delay = 0; /* Default no blink */
2316  }
2317  }
2318 
2319  if (size == -2.f && def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_f_HEADLIGHT)
2320  {
2321  size = 1.f;
2322  }
2323  else if ((size == -2.f && def.type != RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_f_HEADLIGHT) || size == -1.f)
2324  {
2325  size = 0.5f;
2326  }
2327 
2328  flare_t flare;
2329  flare.type = def.type;
2330  flare.controlnumber = def.control_number;
2331  flare.controltoggle_status = false;
2332  flare.blinkdelay = (blink_delay == -1) ? 0.5f : blink_delay / 1000.f;
2333  flare.blinkdelay_curr = 0.f;
2334  flare.blinkdelay_state = false;
2335  flare.noderef = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.reference_node);
2336  flare.nodex = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.node_axis_x);
2337  flare.nodey = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.node_axis_y);
2338  flare.offsetx = def.offset.x;
2339  flare.offsety = def.offset.y;
2340  flare.offsetz = def.offset.z;
2341  flare.size = size;
2342 
2343  /* Visuals */
2344  flare.snode = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
2345  std::stringstream flare_name;
2346  flare_name << "flare-" << m_rig->truckname << "-" << m_rig->flares.size();
2347  flare.bbs = gEnv->sceneManager->createBillboardSet(flare_name.str(), 1);
2348  bool using_default_material = true;
2349  if (flare.bbs == nullptr)
2350  {
2351  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, "Failed to create flare: '" + flare_name.str() + "', continuing without it (compatibility)...");
2352  }
2353  else
2354  {
2355  flare.bbs->createBillboard(0,0,0);
2356  flare.bbs->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
2357 
2358  if (def.material_name.length() == 0 || def.material_name == "default")
2359  {
2360  if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_b_BRAKELIGHT)
2361  {
2362  flare.bbs->setMaterialName("tracks/brakeflare");
2363  }
2364  else if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_l_LEFT_BLINKER || (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_r_RIGHT_BLINKER))
2365  {
2366  flare.bbs->setMaterialName("tracks/blinkflare");
2367  }
2368  else
2369  {
2370  flare.bbs->setMaterialName("tracks/flare");
2371  }
2372  }
2373  else
2374  {
2375  using_default_material = false;
2376  flare.bbs->setMaterialName(def.material_name);
2377  }
2378  flare.snode->attachObject(flare.bbs);
2379  }
2380  flare.isVisible = true;
2381  flare.light = nullptr;
2382 
2383  if ((App::GetGfxFlaresMode() >= App::GFX_FLARES_CURR_VEHICLE_HEAD_ONLY) && size > 0.001)
2384  {
2385  //if (type == 'f' && usingDefaultMaterial && flaresMode >=2 && size > 0.001)
2386  if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_f_HEADLIGHT && using_default_material )
2387  {
2388  /* front light */
2389  flare.light=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(flare_name.str());
2390  flare.light->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT);
2391  flare.light->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 1));
2392  flare.light->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 1));
2393  flare.light->setAttenuation(400, 0.9, 0, 0);
2394  flare.light->setSpotlightRange( Ogre::Degree(35), Ogre::Degree(45) );
2395  flare.light->setCastShadows(false);
2396  }
2397  }
2398  if ((App::GetGfxFlaresMode() >= App::GFX_FLARES_ALL_VEHICLES_ALL_LIGHTS) && size > 0.001)
2399  {
2400  //else if (type == 'f' && !usingDefaultMaterial && flaresMode >=4 && size > 0.001)
2401  if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_f_HEADLIGHT && ! using_default_material)
2402  {
2403  /* this is a quick fix for the red backlight when frontlight is switched on */
2404  flare.light=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(flare_name.str());
2405  flare.light->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0, 0));
2406  flare.light->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0, 0));
2407  flare.light->setAttenuation(10.0, 1.0, 0, 0);
2408  }
2409  //else if (type == 'R' && flaresMode >= 4 && size > 0.001)
2410  else if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_R_REVERSE_LIGHT)
2411  {
2412  flare.light=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(flare_name.str());
2413  flare.light->setDiffuseColour(Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 1));
2414  flare.light->setSpecularColour(Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 1));
2415  flare.light->setAttenuation(20.0, 1, 0, 0);
2416  }
2417  //else if (type == 'b' && flaresMode >= 4 && size > 0.001)
2418  else if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_b_BRAKELIGHT)
2419  {
2420  flare.light=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(flare_name.str());
2421  flare.light->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0, 0));
2422  flare.light->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1.0, 0, 0));
2423  flare.light->setAttenuation(10.0, 1.0, 0, 0);
2424  }
2425  //else if ((type == 'l' || type == 'r') && flaresMode >= 4 && size > 0.001)
2426  else if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_l_LEFT_BLINKER || (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_r_RIGHT_BLINKER))
2427  {
2428  flare.light=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(flare_name.str());
2429  flare.light->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 0));
2430  flare.light->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 0));
2431  flare.light->setAttenuation(10.0, 1, 1, 0);
2432  }
2433  //else if ((type == 'u') && flaresMode >= 4 && size > 0.001)
2434  else if (def.type == RigDef::Flare2::TYPE_u_USER)
2435  {
2436  /* user light always white (TODO: improve this) */
2437  flare.light=gEnv->sceneManager->createLight(flare_name.str());
2438  flare.light->setDiffuseColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 1));
2439  flare.light->setSpecularColour( Ogre::ColourValue(1, 1, 1));
2440  flare.light->setAttenuation(50.0, 1.0, 1, 0.2);
2441 
2442  if (m_rig->netCustomLightArray_counter < 4)
2443  {
2444  m_rig->netCustomLightArray[m_rig->netCustomLightArray_counter] = m_rig->flares.size();
2445  m_rig->netCustomLightArray_counter++;
2446  }
2447  }
2448  }
2449 
2450  /* Finalize light */
2451  if (flare.light != nullptr)
2452  {
2453  flare.light->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT);
2454  flare.light->setSpotlightRange( Ogre::Degree(35), Ogre::Degree(45) );
2455  flare.light->setCastShadows(false);
2456  }
2457  m_rig->flares.push_back(flare);
2458 }
2459 
2460 Ogre::MaterialPtr RigSpawner::InstantiateManagedMaterial(Ogre::String const & source_name, Ogre::String const & clone_name)
2461 {
2462  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2463 
2464  Ogre::MaterialPtr src_mat = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName(source_name);
2465  if (src_mat.isNull())
2466  {
2467  std::stringstream msg;
2468  msg << "Built-in material '" << source_name << "' missing! Skipping...";
2469  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
2470  return Ogre::MaterialPtr();
2471  }
2472 
2473  return src_mat->clone(clone_name, true, m_custom_resource_group);
2474 }
2475 
2476 void RigSpawner::ProcessManagedMaterial(RigDef::ManagedMaterial & def)
2477 {
2478  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2479 
2480  if (m_managed_materials.find(def.name) != m_managed_materials.end())
2481  {
2482  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Duplicate managed material name: '" + def.name + "'. Ignoring definition...");
2483  return;
2484  }
2485 
2486  // Create global placeholder
2487  // This is necessary to load meshes with original material names (= unchanged managed mat names)
2488  // - if not found, OGRE substitutes them with 'BaseWhite' which breaks subsequent processing.
2489  if (RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName(def.name).isNull())
2490  {
2491  m_placeholder_managedmat->clone(def.name);
2492  }
2493 
2494  std::string custom_name = def.name + ACTOR_ID_TOKEN + TOSTRING(m_rig->trucknum);
2495  Ogre::MaterialPtr material;
2496  if (def.type == RigDef::ManagedMaterial::TYPE_FLEXMESH_STANDARD || def.type == RigDef::ManagedMaterial::TYPE_FLEXMESH_TRANSPARENT)
2497  {
2498  std::string mat_name_base
2499  = (def.type == RigDef::ManagedMaterial::TYPE_FLEXMESH_STANDARD)
2500  ? "managed/flexmesh_standard"
2501  : "managed/flexmesh_transparent";
2502 
2503  if (def.HasDamagedDiffuseMap())
2504  {
2505  if (def.HasSpecularMap())
2506  {
2507  /* FLEXMESH, damage, specular */
2508  material = this->InstantiateManagedMaterial(mat_name_base + "/speculardamage", custom_name);
2509  if (material.isNull())
2510  {
2511  return;
2512  }
2513  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.diffuse_map);
2514  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Dmg_Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.damaged_diffuse_map);
2515  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("SpecularMapping1")->getTextureUnitState("SpecularMapping1_Tex")->setTextureName(def.specular_map);
2516  }
2517  else
2518  {
2519  /* FLEXMESH, damage, no_specular */
2520  material = this->InstantiateManagedMaterial(mat_name_base + "/damageonly", custom_name);
2521  if (material.isNull())
2522  {
2523  return;
2524  }
2525  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.diffuse_map);
2526  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Dmg_Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.damaged_diffuse_map);
2527  }
2528  }
2529  else
2530  {
2531  if (def.HasSpecularMap())
2532  {
2533  /* FLEXMESH, no_damage, specular */
2534  material = this->InstantiateManagedMaterial(mat_name_base + "/specularonly", custom_name);
2535  if (material.isNull())
2536  {
2537  return;
2538  }
2539  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.diffuse_map);
2540  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("SpecularMapping1")->getTextureUnitState("SpecularMapping1_Tex")->setTextureName(def.specular_map);
2541  }
2542  else
2543  {
2544  /* FLEXMESH, no_damage, no_specular */
2545  material = this->InstantiateManagedMaterial(mat_name_base + "/simple", custom_name);
2546  if (material.isNull())
2547  {
2548  return;
2549  }
2550  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.diffuse_map);
2551  }
2552  }
2553  }
2554  else if (def.type == RigDef::ManagedMaterial::TYPE_MESH_STANDARD || def.type == RigDef::ManagedMaterial::TYPE_MESH_TRANSPARENT)
2555  {
2556  Ogre::String mat_name_base
2557  = (def.type == RigDef::ManagedMaterial::TYPE_MESH_STANDARD)
2558  ? "managed/mesh_standard"
2559  : "managed/mesh_transparent";
2560 
2561  if (def.HasSpecularMap())
2562  {
2563  /* MESH, specular */
2564  material = this->InstantiateManagedMaterial(mat_name_base + "/specular", custom_name);
2565  if (material.isNull())
2566  {
2567  return;
2568  }
2569  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.diffuse_map);
2570  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("SpecularMapping1")->getTextureUnitState("SpecularMapping1_Tex")->setTextureName(def.specular_map);
2571  }
2572  else
2573  {
2574  /* MESH, no_specular */
2575  material = this->InstantiateManagedMaterial(mat_name_base + "/simple", custom_name);
2576  if (material.isNull())
2577  {
2578  return;
2579  }
2580  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->getTextureUnitState("Diffuse_Map")->setTextureName(def.diffuse_map);
2581 
2582  }
2583  }
2584 
2585  if (def.type != RigDef::ManagedMaterial::TYPE_INVALID)
2586  {
2587  if (def.options.double_sided)
2588  {
2589  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("BaseRender")->setCullingMode(Ogre::CULL_NONE);
2590  if (def.HasSpecularMap())
2591  {
2592  material->getTechnique("BaseTechnique")->getPass("SpecularMapping1")->setCullingMode(Ogre::CULL_NONE);
2593  }
2594  }
2595  }
2596 
2597  /* Finalize */
2598 
2599  material->compile();
2600  m_managed_materials.insert(std::make_pair(def.name, material));
2601 }
2602 
2603 void RigSpawner::ProcessCollisionBox(RigDef::CollisionBox & def)
2604 {
2605  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2606 
2607  auto itor = def.nodes.begin();
2608  auto end = def.nodes.end();
2609  for ( ; itor != end; ++itor)
2610  {
2611  std::pair<unsigned int, bool> node_result = GetNodeIndex(*itor);
2612  if (! node_result.second)
2613  {
2614  std::stringstream msg;
2615  msg << "Invalid node '" << itor->ToString() << "'";
2616  continue;
2617  }
2618  m_rig->nodes[node_result.first].collisionBoundingBoxID = static_cast<char>(m_rig->collisionBoundingBoxes.size());
2619  }
2620 
2621  m_rig->collisionBoundingBoxes.resize(m_rig->collisionBoundingBoxes.size() + 1);
2622 }
2623 
2624 bool RigSpawner::AssignWheelToAxle(int & _out_axle_wheel, node_t *axis_node_1, node_t *axis_node_2)
2625 {
2626  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2627 
2628  for (int i = 0; i < m_rig->free_wheel; i++)
2629  {
2630  wheel_t & wheel = m_rig->wheels[i];
2631  if ( (wheel.refnode0 == axis_node_1 && wheel.refnode1 == axis_node_2)
2632  || (wheel.refnode0 == axis_node_2 && wheel.refnode1 == axis_node_1)
2633  )
2634  {
2635  _out_axle_wheel = i;
2636  return true;
2637  }
2638  }
2639  return false;
2640 }
2641 
2642 void RigSpawner::ProcessAxle(RigDef::Axle & def)
2643 {
2644  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2645 
2646  if (! CheckAxleLimit(1))
2647  {
2648  return;
2649  }
2650 
2651  node_t *wheel_1_node_1 = GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.wheels[0][0]);
2652  node_t *wheel_1_node_2 = GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.wheels[0][1]);
2653  node_t *wheel_2_node_1 = GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.wheels[1][0]);
2654  node_t *wheel_2_node_2 = GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.wheels[1][1]);
2655  Axle *axle = new Axle();
2656 
2657  if (! AssignWheelToAxle(axle->wheel_1, wheel_1_node_1, wheel_1_node_2))
2658  {
2659  std::stringstream msg;
2660  msg << "Couldn't find wheel with axis nodes '" << def.wheels[0][0].ToString()
2661  << "' and '" << def.wheels[0][1].ToString() << "'";
2662  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, msg.str());
2663  }
2664 
2665  if (! AssignWheelToAxle(axle->wheel_2, wheel_2_node_1, wheel_2_node_2))
2666  {
2667  std::stringstream msg;
2668  msg << "Couldn't find wheel with axis nodes '" << def.wheels[1][0].ToString()
2669  << "' and '" << def.wheels[1][1].ToString() << "'";
2670  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, msg.str());
2671  }
2672 
2673  if (def.options.size() == 0)
2674  {
2675  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, "No differential defined, defaulting to Open & Locked");
2676  axle->addDiffType(OPEN_DIFF);
2677  axle->addDiffType(LOCKED_DIFF);
2678  }
2679  else
2680  {
2681  auto end = def.options.end();
2682  for (auto itor = def.options.begin(); itor != end; ++itor)
2683  {
2684  switch (*itor)
2685  {
2686  case RigDef::Axle::OPTION_l_LOCKED:
2687  axle->addDiffType(LOCKED_DIFF);
2688  break;
2689  case RigDef::Axle::OPTION_o_OPEN:
2690  axle->addDiffType(OPEN_DIFF);
2691  break;
2692  case RigDef::Axle::OPTION_s_SPLIT:
2693  axle->addDiffType(SPLIT_DIFF);
2694  break;
2695  default:
2696  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, "Unknown differential type: " + *itor);
2697  break;
2698  }
2699  }
2700  }
2701 
2702  m_rig->axles[m_rig->free_axle] = axle;
2703  m_rig->free_axle++;
2704 }
2705 
2706 void RigSpawner::ProcessSpeedLimiter(RigDef::SpeedLimiter & def)
2707 {
2708  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2709 
2710  m_rig->sl_enabled = def.is_enabled;
2711  m_rig->sl_speed_limit = def.max_speed;
2712 }
2713 
2714 void RigSpawner::ProcessCruiseControl(RigDef::CruiseControl & def)
2715 {
2716  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2717 
2718  m_rig->cc_target_speed_lower_limit = def.min_speed;
2719  if (m_rig->cc_target_speed_lower_limit <= 0.f)
2720  {
2721  std::stringstream msg;
2722  msg << "Invalid parameter 'lower_limit' (" << m_rig->cc_target_speed_lower_limit
2723  << ") must be positive nonzero number. Using it anyway (compatibility)";
2724  }
2725  m_rig->cc_can_brake = def.autobrake != 0;
2726 }
2727 
2728 void RigSpawner::ProcessTorqueCurve(RigDef::TorqueCurve & def)
2729 {
2730  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2731 
2732  if (m_rig->engine == nullptr)
2733  {
2734  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, "Section 'torquecurve' found but no 'engine' defined, skipping...");
2735  return;
2736  }
2737 
2738  TorqueCurve *target_torque_curve = m_rig->engine->getTorqueCurve();
2739 
2740  if (def.predefined_func_name.length() != 0)
2741  {
2742  target_torque_curve->setTorqueModel(def.predefined_func_name);
2743  }
2744  else
2745  {
2746  target_torque_curve->CreateNewCurve(); /* Use default name for custom curve */
2747  std::vector<RigDef::TorqueCurve::Sample>::iterator itor = def.samples.begin();
2748  for ( ; itor != def.samples.end(); itor++)
2749  {
2750  target_torque_curve->AddCurveSample(itor->power, itor->torque_percent);
2751  }
2752  }
2753 }
2754 
2755 void RigSpawner::ProcessParticle(RigDef::Particle & def)
2756 {
2757  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2758 
2759  if (! m_rig->cparticle_enabled)
2760  {
2761  return;
2762  }
2763 
2764  unsigned int particle_index = m_rig->free_cparticle;
2765  m_rig->free_cparticle++;
2766  cparticle_t & particle = m_rig->cparticles[particle_index];
2767 
2768  particle.emitterNode = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.emitter_node);
2769  particle.directionNode = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.reference_node);
2770 
2771  /* Setup visuals */
2772  std::stringstream name;
2773  name << "cparticle-" << particle_index << "-" << m_rig->truckname;
2774  particle.snode = m_parent_scene_node->createChildSceneNode();
2775  particle.psys = gEnv->sceneManager->createParticleSystem(name.str(), def.particle_system_name);
2776  if (particle.psys == nullptr)
2777  {
2778  std::stringstream msg;
2779  msg << "Failed to create particle system '" << def.particle_system_name << "'";
2780  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
2781  return;
2782  }
2783  particle.psys->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
2784  particle.snode->attachObject(particle.psys);
2785  particle.snode->setPosition(GetNode(particle.emitterNode).AbsPosition);
2786 
2787  /* Shut down the emitters */
2788  particle.active = false;
2789  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < particle.psys->getNumEmitters(); i++)
2790  {
2791  particle.psys->getEmitter(i)->setEnabled(false);
2792  }
2793 }
2794 
2795 void RigSpawner::ProcessRopable(RigDef::Ropable & def)
2796 {
2797  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2798 
2799  ropable_t ropable;
2800  ropable.node = GetNodePointerOrThrow(def.node);
2801  ropable.group = def.group;
2802  ropable.in_use = false;
2803  ropable.multilock = def.has_multilock;
2804  m_rig->ropables.push_back(ropable);
2805 }
2806 
2807 void RigSpawner::ProcessTie(RigDef::Tie & def)
2808 {
2809  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2810 
2811  node_t & node_1 = GetNodeOrThrow(def.root_node);
2812  node_t & node_2 = GetNode( (node_1.pos == 0) ? 1 : 0 );
2813 
2814  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
2815  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(node_1, node_2, def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
2816  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledBreakingThreshold());
2817  beam.k = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledSpringiness();
2818  beam.d = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledDamping();
2819  beam.type = (def.is_invisible) ? BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO : BEAM_HYDRO;
2820  beam.L = def.max_reach_length;
2821  beam.refL = def.max_reach_length;
2822  beam.Lhydro = def.max_reach_length;
2823  beam.bounded = ROPE;
2824  beam.disabled = true;
2825  beam.commandRatioLong = def.auto_shorten_rate;
2826  beam.commandRatioShort = def.auto_shorten_rate;
2827  beam.commandShort = def.min_length;
2828  beam.commandLong = def.max_length;
2829  beam.maxtiestress = def.max_stress;
2830  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
2831 
2832  /* Register tie */
2833  tie_t tie;
2834  tie.group = def.group;
2835  tie.tying = false;
2836  tie.tied = false;
2837  tie.beam = & beam;
2838  tie.commandValue = -1.f;
2839  m_rig->ties.push_back(tie);
2840 
2841  m_rig->hascommands = 1;
2842 }
2843 
2844 void RigSpawner::ProcessRope(RigDef::Rope & def)
2845 {
2846  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2847 
2848  node_t & root_node = GetNodeOrThrow(def.root_node);
2849  node_t & end_node = GetNodeOrThrow(def.end_node);
2850 
2851  /* Add beam */
2852  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(root_node, end_node, def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
2853  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledBreakingThreshold());
2854  beam.k = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledSpringiness();
2855  beam.d = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledDamping();
2856  beam.bounded = ROPE;
2857  beam.type = (def.invisible) ? BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO : BEAM_HYDRO;
2858 
2859  /* Register rope */
2860  rope_t rope;
2861  rope.beam = & beam;
2862  rope.locked = UNLOCKED;
2863  rope.lockedto = & m_rig->nodes[0]; // Orig: hardcoded in BTS_ROPES
2864  rope.lockedto_ropable = nullptr;
2865  rope.group = 0; // Orig: hardcoded in BTS_ROPES. TODO: To be used.
2866  m_rig->ropes.push_back(rope);
2867 }
2868 
2869 void RigSpawner::ProcessRailGroup(RigDef::RailGroup & def)
2870 {
2871  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2872 
2873  Rail *rail = CreateRail(def.node_list);
2874  if (rail == nullptr)
2875  {
2876  return;
2877  }
2878  RailGroup *rail_group = new RailGroup(rail, def.id);
2879  m_rig->mRailGroups.push_back(rail_group);
2880 }
2881 
2882 void RigSpawner::ProcessSlidenode(RigDef::SlideNode & def)
2883 {
2884  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2885 
2886  node_t & node = GetNodeOrThrow(def.slide_node);
2887  SlideNode slide_node(& node, nullptr);
2888  slide_node.setThreshold(def.tolerance);
2889  slide_node.setSpringRate(def.spring_rate);
2890  slide_node.setAttachmentRate(def.attachment_rate);
2891  if (def._break_force_set)
2892  {
2893  slide_node.setBreakForce(def.break_force);
2894  }
2895  slide_node.setAttachmentDistance(def.max_attachment_distance);
2896 
2897  /* Constraints */
2898  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.constraint_flags, RigDef::SlideNode::CONSTRAINT_ATTACH_ALL))
2899  {
2900  slide_node.setAttachRule( ATTACH_ALL );
2901  }
2902  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.constraint_flags, RigDef::SlideNode::CONSTRAINT_ATTACH_SELF))
2903  {
2904  slide_node.setAttachRule( ATTACH_SELF );
2905  }
2906  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.constraint_flags, RigDef::SlideNode::CONSTRAINT_ATTACH_FOREIGN))
2907  {
2908  slide_node.setAttachRule( ATTACH_FOREIGN );
2909  }
2910  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.constraint_flags, RigDef::SlideNode::CONSTRAINT_ATTACH_NONE))
2911  {
2912  slide_node.setAttachRule( ATTACH_NONE );
2913  }
2914 
2915  /* RailGroup */
2916  RailGroup *rail_group = nullptr;
2917  if (def._railgroup_id_set)
2918  {
2919  std::vector<RailGroup*>::iterator itor = m_rig->mRailGroups.begin();
2920  for ( ; itor != m_rig->mRailGroups.end(); itor++)
2921  {
2922  if ((*itor)->getID() == def.railgroup_id)
2923  {
2924  rail_group = *itor;
2925  break;
2926  }
2927  }
2928 
2929  if (rail_group == nullptr)
2930  {
2931  std::stringstream msg;
2932  msg << "Specified rail group id '" << def.railgroup_id << "' not found. Ignoring slidenode...";
2933  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
2934  return;
2935  }
2936  }
2937  else if (def.rail_node_ranges.size() > 0)
2938  {
2939  Rail *rail = CreateRail(def.rail_node_ranges);
2940  if (rail == nullptr)
2941  {
2942  return;
2943  }
2944  rail_group = new RailGroup(rail);
2945  m_rig->mRailGroups.push_back(rail_group);
2946  }
2947  else
2948  {
2949  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "No RailGroup available for SlideNode, skipping...");
2950  }
2951 
2952  slide_node.setDefaultRail(rail_group);
2953  m_rig->mSlideNodes.push_back(slide_node);
2954 }
2955 
2956 int RigSpawner::FindNodeIndex(RigDef::Node::Ref & node_ref, bool silent /* Default: false */)
2957 {
2958  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2959 
2960  std::pair<unsigned int, bool> result = GetNodeIndex(node_ref, /* quiet */ true);
2961  if (result.second)
2962  {
2963  return static_cast<int>(result.first);
2964  }
2965  else
2966  {
2967  if (! silent)
2968  {
2969  std::stringstream msg;
2970  msg << "Failed to find node by reference: " << node_ref.ToString();
2971  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
2972  }
2973  return -1; /* Node not found */
2974  }
2975 }
2976 
2977 bool RigSpawner::CollectNodesFromRanges(
2978  std::vector<RigDef::Node::Range> & node_ranges,
2979  std::vector<unsigned int> & out_node_indices
2980  )
2981 {
2982  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
2983 
2984  std::vector<RigDef::Node::Range>::iterator itor = node_ranges.begin();
2985  for ( ; itor != node_ranges.end(); itor++)
2986  {
2987  if (itor->IsRange())
2988  {
2989 
2990  int result_a = FindNodeIndex(itor->start, /* silent */ false);
2991  int result_b = FindNodeIndex(itor->end, /* silent */ true);
2992 
2993  unsigned int start = 0;
2994  unsigned int end = 0;
2995 
2996  if (result_a == -1)
2997  {
2998  return false;
2999  }
3000  else
3001  {
3002  start = static_cast<unsigned int>(result_a);
3003  }
3004 
3005  if (result_b == -1)
3006  {
3007  std::stringstream msg;
3008  msg << "Encountered non-existent node '" << itor->end.ToString() << "' in range [" << itor->start.ToString() << " - " << itor->end.ToString() << "], "
3009  << "highest node index is '" << m_rig->free_node - 1 << "'.";
3010 
3011  if (itor->end.Str().empty()) /* If the node is numeric... */
3012  {
3013  msg << " However, this node must be accepted anyway for backwards compatibility."
3014  << " Please fix this as soon as possible.";
3015  end = itor->end.Num();
3016  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
3017  }
3018  else
3019  {
3020  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
3021  return false;
3022  }
3023  }
3024  else
3025  {
3026  end = static_cast<unsigned int>(result_b);
3027  }
3028 
3029  if (end < start)
3030  {
3031  unsigned int swap = start;
3032  start = end;
3033  end = swap;
3034  }
3035 
3036  for (unsigned int i = start; i <= end; i++)
3037  {
3038  out_node_indices.push_back(i);
3039  }
3040  }
3041  else
3042  {
3043  out_node_indices.push_back(GetNodeIndexOrThrow(itor->start));
3044  }
3045  }
3046  return true;
3047 }
3048 
3049 Rail *RigSpawner::CreateRail(std::vector<RigDef::Node::Range> & node_ranges)
3050 {
3051  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3052 
3053  /* Collect nodes */
3054  std::vector<unsigned int> node_indices;
3055  node_indices.reserve(100);
3056 
3057  CollectNodesFromRanges(node_ranges, node_indices);
3058 
3059  /* Find beams &build rail */
3060  RailBuilder rail_builder; /* rail builder allocates the memory for each rail, it will not free it */
3061  if (node_indices.front() == node_indices.back())
3062  {
3063  rail_builder.loopRail();
3064  }
3065 
3066  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < node_indices.size() - 1; i++)
3067  {
3068  beam_t *beam = FindBeamInRig(node_indices[i], node_indices[i + 1]);
3069  if (beam == nullptr)
3070  {
3071  std::stringstream msg;
3072  msg << "No beam between nodes indexed '" << node_indices[i] << "' and '" << node_indices[i + 1] << "'";
3073  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
3074  return nullptr;
3075  }
3076  rail_builder.pushBack(beam);
3077  }
3078 
3079  return rail_builder.getCompletedRail(); /* Transfers memory ownership */
3080 }
3081 
3082 beam_t *RigSpawner::FindBeamInRig(unsigned int node_a_index, unsigned int node_b_index)
3083 {
3084  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3085 
3086  node_t *node_a = & m_rig->nodes[node_a_index];
3087  node_t *node_b = & m_rig->nodes[node_b_index];
3088 
3089  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_beam); i++)
3090  {
3091  if (
3092  (GetBeam(i).p1 == node_a && GetBeam(i).p2 == node_b)
3093  || (GetBeam(i).p2 == node_a && GetBeam(i).p1 == node_b)
3094  )
3095  {
3096  return & GetBeam(i);
3097  }
3098  }
3099  return nullptr;
3100 }
3101 
3102 void RigSpawner::ProcessHook(RigDef::Hook & def)
3103 {
3104  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3105 
3106  /* Find the node */
3107  node_t *node = GetNodePointer(def.node);
3108  if (node == nullptr)
3109  {
3110  return;
3111  }
3112 
3113  /* Find the hook */
3114  hook_t *hook = nullptr;
3115  std::vector <hook_t>::iterator itor = m_rig->hooks.begin();
3116  for (; itor != m_rig->hooks.end(); itor++)
3117  {
3118  if (itor->hookNode == node)
3119  {
3120  hook = &*itor;
3121  break;
3122  }
3123  }
3124 
3125  if (hook == nullptr)
3126  {
3127  std::stringstream msg;
3128  msg << "Node '" << def.node.ToString() << "' is not a hook-node (not marked with flag 'h'), ignoring...";
3129  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
3130  return;
3131  }
3132 
3133  /* Process options */
3134  hook->lockrange = def.option_hook_range;
3135  hook->lockspeed = def.option_speed_coef * HOOK_SPEED_DEFAULT;
3136  hook->maxforce = def.option_max_force;
3137  hook->group = def.option_hookgroup;
3138  hook->lockgroup = def.option_lockgroup;
3139  hook->timer = 0.f; // Hardcoded in BTS_HOOKS
3140  hook->timer_preset = def.option_timer;
3141  hook->beam->commandShort = def.option_min_range_meters;
3142  hook->selflock = BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Hook::FLAG_SELF_LOCK);
3143  hook->nodisable = BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Hook::FLAG_NO_DISABLE);
3144  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Hook::FLAG_AUTO_LOCK))
3145  {
3146  hook->autolock = true;
3147  if (hook->group == -1)
3148  {
3149  hook->group = -2; /* only overwrite hgroup when its still default (-1) */
3150  }
3151  }
3152  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Hook::FLAG_NO_ROPE))
3153  {
3154  hook->beam->bounded = NOSHOCK;
3155  }
3156  if (!BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Hook::FLAG_VISIBLE))
3157  {
3158  hook->beam->type = BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO;
3159  }
3160 }
3161 
3162 void RigSpawner::ProcessLockgroup(RigDef::Lockgroup & lockgroup)
3163 {
3164  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3165 
3166  auto itor = lockgroup.nodes.begin();
3167  auto end = lockgroup.nodes.end();
3168  for (; itor != end; ++itor)
3169  {
3170  GetNodeOrThrow(*itor).lockgroup = lockgroup.number;
3171  }
3172 }
3173 
3174 void RigSpawner::ProcessTrigger(RigDef::Trigger & def)
3175 {
3176  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3177 
3178  shock_t & shock = this->GetFreeShock();
3179 
3180  // Disable trigger on startup? (default enabled)
3181  shock.trigger_enabled = !def.HasFlag_x_StartDisabled();
3182 
3183  m_rig->commandkey[def.shortbound_trigger_action].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state = false;
3184  if (def.longbound_trigger_action != -1)
3185  {
3186  m_rig->commandkey[def.longbound_trigger_action].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state = false;
3187  }
3188 
3189  unsigned int hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3190  unsigned int shock_flags = SHOCK_FLAG_NORMAL | SHOCK_FLAG_ISTRIGGER;
3191  float short_limit = def.contraction_trigger_limit;
3192  float long_limit = def.expansion_trigger_limit;
3193 
3194  if (def.HasFlag_i_Invisible())
3195  {
3196  hydro_type = BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO;
3197  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_INVISIBLE);
3198  }
3199  if (def.HasFlag_B_TriggerBlocker())
3200  {
3201  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER);
3202  }
3203  if (def.HasFlag_s_CmdNumSwitch()) // switch that exchanges cmdshort/cmdshort for all triggers with the same commandnumbers, default false
3204  {
3205  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CMD_SWITCH);
3206  }
3207  if (def.HasFlag_c_CommandStyle()) // // trigger is set with commandstyle boundaries instead of shocksytle
3208  {
3209  short_limit = fabs(short_limit - 1);
3210  long_limit = long_limit - 1;
3211  }
3212  if (def.HasFlag_A_InvTriggerBlocker()) // Blocker that enable/disable other triggers, reversed activation method (inverted Blocker style, auto-ON)
3213  {
3214  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER_A);
3215  }
3216  if (def.HasFlag_h_UnlocksHookGroup())
3217  {
3218  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_HOOK_UNLOCK);
3219  }
3220  if (def.HasFlag_H_LocksHookGroup())
3221  {
3222  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_HOOK_LOCK);
3223  }
3224  if (def.HasFlag_t_Continuous())
3225  {
3226  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CONTINUOUS); // this trigger sends values between 0 and 1
3227  }
3228  if (def.HasFlag_E_EngineTrigger())
3229  {
3230  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_ENGINE);
3231  }
3232 
3233  // Checks
3234  if (!def.IsTriggerBlockerAnyType() && !def.IsHookToggleTrigger() && !def.HasFlag_E_EngineTrigger())
3235  {
3236  if (def.shortbound_trigger_action < 1 || def.shortbound_trigger_action > MAX_COMMANDS)
3237  {
3238  std::stringstream msg;
3239  msg << "Invalid value of 'shortbound_trigger_action': '" << def.shortbound_trigger_action << "'. Must be between 1 and "<<MAX_COMMANDS<<". Ignoring trigger.";
3240  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
3241  return;
3242  }
3243  }
3244  else if (!def.IsHookToggleTrigger() && !def.HasFlag_E_EngineTrigger())
3245  {
3246  // this is a Trigger-Blocker, make special check
3247  if (def.shortbound_trigger_action < 0 || def.longbound_trigger_action < 0)
3248  {
3249  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Wrong command-eventnumber (Triggers). Trigger-Blocker deactivated.");
3250  return;
3251  }
3252  }
3253  else if (def.HasFlag_E_EngineTrigger())
3254  {
3255  if (def.IsTriggerBlockerAnyType() || def.IsHookToggleTrigger() || def.HasFlag_s_CmdNumSwitch())
3256  {
3257  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Wrong command-eventnumber (Triggers). Engine trigger deactivated.");
3258  return;
3259  }
3260  }
3261 
3262  int node_1_index = FindNodeIndex(def.nodes[0]);
3263  int node_2_index = FindNodeIndex(def.nodes[1]);
3264  if (node_1_index == -1 || node_2_index == -1 )
3265  {
3266  return;
3267  }
3268  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
3269  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(GetNode(node_1_index), GetNode(node_2_index), def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
3270  beam.type = hydro_type;
3271  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->breaking_threshold);
3272  SetBeamSpring(beam, 0.f);
3273  SetBeamDamping(beam, 0.f);
3274  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
3275  beam.shortbound = short_limit;
3276  beam.longbound = long_limit;
3277  beam.bounded = SHOCK2;
3278  beam.shock = &shock;
3279 
3280  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
3281 
3282  if (m_rig->triggerdebug)
3283  {
3284  LOG("Trigger added. BeamID " + TOSTRING(beam_index));
3285  }
3286 
3287  shock.beamid = beam_index;
3288  shock.trigger_switch_state = 0.0f; // used as bool and countdowntimer, dont touch!
3289 
3290  if (!def.IsTriggerBlockerAnyType())
3291  {
3292  shock.trigger_cmdshort = def.shortbound_trigger_action;
3293  if (def.longbound_trigger_action != -1 || (def.longbound_trigger_action == -1 && def.IsHookToggleTrigger()))
3294  {
3295  // this is a trigger or a hook_toggle
3296  shock.trigger_cmdlong = def.longbound_trigger_action;
3297  }
3298  else
3299  {
3300  // this is a commandkeyblocker
3301  shock_flags |= SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CMD_BLOCKER;
3302  }
3303  }
3304  else
3305  {
3306  // this is a trigger_blocker
3307  if (!def.HasFlag_A_InvTriggerBlocker())
3308  {
3309  //normal BLOCKER
3310  shock_flags |= SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER;
3311  shock.trigger_cmdshort = def.shortbound_trigger_action;
3312  shock.trigger_cmdlong = def.longbound_trigger_action;
3313  }
3314  else
3315  {
3316  //inverted BLOCKER
3317  shock_flags |= SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER_A;
3318  shock.trigger_cmdshort = def.shortbound_trigger_action;
3319  shock.trigger_cmdlong = def.longbound_trigger_action;
3320  }
3321  }
3322 
3323  if (def.HasFlag_b_KeyBlocker() && !def.HasFlag_B_TriggerBlocker())
3324  {
3325  m_rig->commandkey[def.shortbound_trigger_action].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state = true;
3326  if (def.longbound_trigger_action != -1)
3327  {
3328  m_rig->commandkey[def.longbound_trigger_action].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state = true;
3329  }
3330  }
3331 
3332  shock.trigger_boundary_t = def.boundary_timer;
3333  shock.flags = shock_flags;
3334  shock.sbd_spring = def.beam_defaults->springiness;
3335  shock.sbd_damp = def.beam_defaults->damping_constant;
3336  shock.last_debug_state = 0;
3337 
3338 }
3339 
3340 void RigSpawner::ProcessContacter(RigDef::Node::Ref & node_ref)
3341 {
3342  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3343 
3344  unsigned int node_index = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(node_ref);
3345  m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter].nodeid = node_index;
3346  m_rig->free_contacter++;
3347 };
3348 
3349 void RigSpawner::ProcessRotator(RigDef::Rotator & def)
3350 {
3351  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3352 
3353  rotator_t & rotator = m_rig->rotators[m_rig->free_rotator];
3354 
3355  rotator.angle = 0;
3356  rotator.rate = def.rate;
3357  rotator.axis1 = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.axis_nodes[0]);
3358  rotator.axis2 = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.axis_nodes[1]);
3359  rotator.force = ROTATOR_FORCE_DEFAULT;
3360  rotator.tolerance = ROTATOR_TOLERANCE_DEFAULT;
3361  rotator.rotatorEngineCoupling = def.engine_coupling;
3362  rotator.rotatorNeedsEngine = def.needs_engine;
3363  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
3364  {
3365  rotator.nodes1[i] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.base_plate_nodes[i]);
3366  rotator.nodes2[i] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.rotating_plate_nodes[i]);
3367  }
3368 
3369  // Rotate left key
3370  m_rig->commandkey[def.spin_left_key].rotators.push_back(- (m_rig->free_rotator + 1));
3371  m_rig->commandkey[def.spin_left_key].description = "Rotate_Left/Right";
3372 
3373  // Rotate right key
3374  m_rig->commandkey[def.spin_right_key].rotators.push_back(m_rig->free_rotator + 1);
3375 
3376  _ProcessKeyInertia(m_rig->rotaInertia, def.inertia, *def.inertia_defaults, def.spin_left_key, def.spin_right_key);
3377 
3378  m_rig->free_rotator++;
3379  m_rig->hascommands = 1;
3380 }
3381 
3382 void RigSpawner::ProcessRotator2(RigDef::Rotator2 & def)
3383 {
3384  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3385 
3386  rotator_t & rotator = m_rig->rotators[m_rig->free_rotator];
3387 
3388  rotator.angle = 0;
3389  rotator.rate = def.rate;
3390  rotator.axis1 = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.axis_nodes[0]);
3391  rotator.axis2 = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.axis_nodes[1]);
3392  rotator.force = def.rotating_force; // Default value is set in constructor
3393  rotator.tolerance = def.tolerance; // Default value is set in constructor
3394  rotator.rotatorEngineCoupling = def.engine_coupling;
3395  rotator.rotatorNeedsEngine = def.needs_engine;
3396  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
3397  {
3398  rotator.nodes1[i] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.base_plate_nodes[i]);
3399  rotator.nodes2[i] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.rotating_plate_nodes[i]);
3400  }
3401 
3402  // Rotate left key
3403  m_rig->commandkey[def.spin_left_key].rotators.push_back(- (m_rig->free_rotator + 1));
3404  if (! def.description.empty())
3405  {
3406  m_rig->commandkey[def.spin_left_key].description = def.description;
3407  }
3408  else
3409  {
3410  m_rig->commandkey[def.spin_left_key].description = "Rotate_Left/Right";
3411  }
3412 
3413  // Rotate right key
3414  m_rig->commandkey[def.spin_right_key].rotators.push_back(m_rig->free_rotator + 1);
3415 
3416  _ProcessKeyInertia(m_rig->rotaInertia, def.inertia, *def.inertia_defaults, def.spin_left_key, def.spin_right_key);
3417 
3418  m_rig->free_rotator++;
3419  m_rig->hascommands = 1;
3420 }
3421 
3422 void RigSpawner::_ProcessKeyInertia(
3423  CmdKeyInertia * key_inertia,
3424  RigDef::Inertia & inertia,
3425  RigDef::Inertia & inertia_defaults,
3426  int contract_key,
3427  int extend_key
3428 )
3429 {
3430  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3431 
3432  if (key_inertia != nullptr)
3433  {
3434  /* Handle placeholders */
3435  Ogre::String start_function;
3436  Ogre::String stop_function;
3437  if (! inertia.start_function.empty() && inertia.start_function != "/" && inertia.start_function != "-")
3438  {
3439  start_function = inertia.start_function;
3440  }
3441  if (! inertia.stop_function.empty() && inertia.stop_function != "/" && inertia.stop_function != "-")
3442  {
3443  stop_function = inertia.stop_function;
3444  }
3445  if (inertia.start_delay_factor != 0.f && inertia.stop_delay_factor != 0.f)
3446  {
3447  key_inertia->setCmdKeyDelay(
3448  contract_key,
3449  inertia.start_delay_factor,
3450  inertia.stop_delay_factor,
3451  start_function,
3452  stop_function
3453  );
3454 
3455  key_inertia->setCmdKeyDelay(
3456  extend_key,
3457  inertia.start_delay_factor,
3458  inertia.stop_delay_factor,
3459  start_function,
3460  stop_function
3461  );
3462  }
3463  else if (inertia_defaults.start_delay_factor > 0 || inertia_defaults.stop_delay_factor > 0)
3464  {
3465  key_inertia->setCmdKeyDelay(
3466  contract_key,
3467  inertia_defaults.start_delay_factor,
3468  inertia_defaults.stop_delay_factor,
3469  inertia_defaults.start_function,
3470  inertia_defaults.stop_function
3471  );
3472 
3473  key_inertia->setCmdKeyDelay(
3474  extend_key,
3475  inertia_defaults.start_delay_factor,
3476  inertia_defaults.stop_delay_factor,
3477  inertia_defaults.start_function,
3478  inertia_defaults.stop_function
3479  );
3480  }
3481  }
3482 }
3483 
3484 void RigSpawner::ProcessCommand(RigDef::Command2 & def)
3485 {
3486  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3487 
3488  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
3489  int node_1_index = FindNodeIndex(def.nodes[0]);
3490  int node_2_index = FindNodeIndex(def.nodes[1]);
3491  if (node_1_index == -1 || node_2_index == -1)
3492  {
3493  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to fetch node");
3494  return;
3495  }
3496  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(m_rig->nodes[node_1_index], m_rig->nodes[node_2_index], def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
3497  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
3498  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledBreakingThreshold()); /* Override settings from AddBeam() */
3499  SetBeamSpring(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledSpringiness());
3500  SetBeamDamping(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledDamping());
3501  beam.type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3502 
3503  /* Options */
3504  if (def.option_i_invisible) { beam.type = BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO; }
3505  if (def.option_r_rope) { beam.bounded = ROPE; }
3506  if (def.option_p_1press) { beam.isOnePressMode = 1; }
3507  if (def.option_o_1press_center) { beam.isOnePressMode = 2; }
3508  if (def.option_f_not_faster) { beam.isForceRestricted = true; }
3509  if (def.option_c_auto_center) { beam.isCentering = true; }
3510 
3511  beam.commandRatioShort = def.shorten_rate;
3512  beam.commandRatioLong = def.lengthen_rate;
3513  beam.commandShort = def.max_contraction;
3514  beam.commandLong = def.max_extension;
3515  beam.commandEngineCoupling = def.affect_engine;
3516  beam.commandNeedsEngine = def.needs_engine;
3517  beam.playsSound = def.plays_sound;
3518 
3519  /* set the middle of the command, so its not required to recalculate this everytime ... */
3520  if (def.max_extension > def.max_contraction)
3521  {
3522  beam.centerLength = (def.max_extension - def.max_contraction) / 2 + def.max_contraction;
3523  }
3524  else
3525  {
3526  beam.centerLength = (def.max_contraction - def.max_extension) / 2 + def.max_extension;
3527  }
3528 
3529  _ProcessKeyInertia(m_rig->cmdInertia, def.inertia, *def.inertia_defaults, def.contract_key, def.extend_key);
3530 
3531  /* Add keys */
3532  command_t* contract_command = &m_rig->commandkey[def.contract_key];
3533  contract_command->beams.push_back(-beam_index);
3534  if (contract_command->description.empty())
3535  {
3536  contract_command->description = def.description;
3537  }
3538 
3539  command_t* extend_command = &m_rig->commandkey[def.extend_key];
3540  extend_command->beams.push_back(beam_index);
3541  if (extend_command->description.empty())
3542  {
3543  extend_command->description = def.description;
3544  }
3545 
3546  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
3547 
3548  m_rig->free_commands++;
3549  m_rig->hascommands = 1;
3550 }
3551 
3552 void RigSpawner::ProcessAnimator(RigDef::Animator & def)
3553 {
3554  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3555 
3556  if (! CheckHydroLimit(1)) // TODO: remove the limit! See `RigSpawner::CalcMemoryRequirements()` ~ only_a_ptr, 06/2017
3557  {
3558  return;
3559  }
3560 
3561  if (m_rig->hydroInertia != nullptr)
3562  {
3563  if (def.inertia_defaults->start_delay_factor > 0 && def.inertia_defaults->stop_delay_factor > 0)
3564  {
3565  m_rig->hydroInertia->setCmdKeyDelay(
3566  m_rig->free_hydro,
3567  def.inertia_defaults->start_delay_factor,
3568  def.inertia_defaults->stop_delay_factor,
3569  def.inertia_defaults->start_function,
3570  def.inertia_defaults->stop_function
3571  );
3572  }
3573  }
3574 
3575  unsigned int hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3576  unsigned int anim_flags = 0;
3577  float anim_option = 0;
3578 
3579  /* Options. '{' intentionally misplaced. */
3580 
3581  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_VISIBLE)) {
3582  hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3583  }
3584  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_INVISIBLE)) {
3585  hydro_type = BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO;
3586  }
3587  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_AIRSPEED)) {
3588  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_AIRSPEED);
3589  }
3590  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_VERTICAL_VELOCITY)) {
3591  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_VVI);
3592  }
3593  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK)) {
3594  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_AOA);
3595  }
3596  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_FLAP)) {
3597  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_FLAP);
3598  }
3599  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_AIR_BRAKE)) {
3600  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_AIRBRAKE);
3601  }
3602  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_ROLL)) {
3603  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_ROLL);
3604  }
3605  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_PITCH)) {
3606  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_PITCH);
3607  }
3608  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_BRAKES)) {
3609  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_BRAKE);
3610  }
3611  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_ACCEL)) {
3612  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_ACCEL);
3613  }
3614  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_CLUTCH)) {
3615  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_CLUTCH);
3616  }
3617  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_SPEEDO)) {
3618  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_SPEEDO);
3619  }
3620  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_TACHO)) {
3621  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_TACHO);
3622  }
3623  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_TURBO)) {
3624  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_TURBO);
3625  }
3626  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_PARKING)) {
3627  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_PBRAKE);
3628  }
3629  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_TORQUE)) {
3630  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_TORQUE);
3631  }
3632  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_BOAT_THROTTLE)) {
3633  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_BTHROTTLE);
3634  }
3635  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_BOAT_RUDDER)) {
3636  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_BRUDDER);
3637  }
3638  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_SHIFT_LEFT_RIGHT)) {
3639  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
3640  anim_option = 1.f;
3641  }
3642  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_SHIFT_BACK_FORTH)) {
3643  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
3644  anim_option = 2.f;
3645  }
3646  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_SEQUENTIAL_SHIFT)) {
3647  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
3648  anim_option = 3.f;
3649  }
3650  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_GEAR_SELECT)) {
3651  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER);
3652  anim_option = 4.f;
3653  }
3654  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_ALTIMETER_100K)) {
3655  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_ALTIMETER);
3656  anim_option = 1.f;
3657  }
3658  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_ALTIMETER_10K)) {
3659  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_ALTIMETER);
3660  anim_option = 2.f;
3661  }
3662  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_ALTIMETER_1K)) {
3663  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_ALTIMETER);
3664  anim_option = 3.f;
3665  }
3666 
3667  /* Aerial */
3668  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.aero_animator.flags, RigDef::AeroAnimator::OPTION_THROTTLE)) {
3669  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_THROTTLE);
3670  anim_option = static_cast<float>(def.aero_animator.motor);
3671  }
3672  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.aero_animator.flags, RigDef::AeroAnimator::OPTION_RPM)) {
3673  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_RPM);
3674  anim_option = static_cast<float>(def.aero_animator.motor);
3675  }
3676  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.aero_animator.flags, RigDef::AeroAnimator::OPTION_TORQUE)) {
3677  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_AETORQUE);
3678  anim_option = static_cast<float>(def.aero_animator.motor);
3679  }
3680  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.aero_animator.flags, RigDef::AeroAnimator::OPTION_PITCH)) {
3681  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_AEPITCH);
3682  anim_option = static_cast<float>(def.aero_animator.motor);
3683  }
3684  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.aero_animator.flags, RigDef::AeroAnimator::OPTION_STATUS)) {
3685  BITMASK_SET_1(anim_flags, ANIM_FLAG_AESTATUS);
3686  anim_option = static_cast<float>(def.aero_animator.motor);
3687  }
3688 
3689  unsigned int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
3690  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(GetNode(def.nodes[0]), GetNode(def.nodes[1]), def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
3691  /* set the limits to something with sense by default */
3692  beam.shortbound = 0.99999f;
3693  beam.longbound = 1000000.0f;
3694  beam.type = hydro_type;
3695  beam.hydroRatio = def.lenghtening_factor;
3696  beam.animFlags = anim_flags;
3697  beam.animOption = anim_option;
3698  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
3699  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledBreakingThreshold());
3700  SetBeamSpring(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledSpringiness());
3701  SetBeamDamping(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledDamping());
3702  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
3703 
3704  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_SHORT_LIMIT))
3705  {
3706  beam.shortbound = def.short_limit;
3707  }
3708  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.flags, RigDef::Animator::OPTION_LONG_LIMIT))
3709  {
3710  beam.longbound = def.long_limit;
3711  }
3712 
3713  m_rig->hydro[m_rig->free_hydro] = beam_index;
3714  m_rig->free_hydro++;
3715 }
3716 
3717 beam_t & RigSpawner::AddBeam(
3718  node_t & node_1,
3719  node_t & node_2,
3720  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::BeamDefaults> & beam_defaults,
3721  int detacher_group
3722 )
3723 {
3724  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3725 
3726  /* Init */
3727  beam_t & beam = GetAndInitFreeBeam(node_1, node_2);
3728  beam.detacher_group = detacher_group;
3729  beam.diameter = beam_defaults->visual_beam_diameter;
3730  beam.disabled = false;
3731 
3732  /* Breaking threshold (strength) */
3733  float strength = beam_defaults->breaking_threshold;
3734  beam.strength = strength;
3735 
3736  /* Deformation */
3737  SetBeamDeformationThreshold(beam, beam_defaults);
3738 
3739  float plastic_coef = beam_defaults->plastic_deform_coef;
3740  beam.plastic_coef = plastic_coef;
3741 
3742  return beam;
3743 }
3744 
3745 void RigSpawner::SetBeamStrength(beam_t & beam, float strength)
3746 {
3747  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3748 
3749  beam.strength = strength;
3750 }
3751 
3752 void RigSpawner::ProcessHydro(RigDef::Hydro & def)
3753 {
3754  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3755 
3756  if (! CheckHydroLimit(1)) // TODO: remove the limit! See `RigSpawner::CalcMemoryRequirements()` ~ only_a_ptr, 06/2017
3757  {
3758  return;
3759  }
3760 
3761  unsigned int hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3762  unsigned int hydro_flags = 0;
3763 
3764  // Parse options
3765  if (def.options.empty()) // Parse as if option 'n' (OPTION_n_NORMAL) was present
3766  {
3767  hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3768  hydro_flags |= HYDRO_FLAG_DIR;
3769  }
3770  else
3771  {
3772  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < def.options.length(); ++i)
3773  {
3774  const char c = def.options[i];
3775  switch (c)
3776  {
3777  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_i_INVISIBLE: // i
3778  hydro_type = BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO;
3779  break;
3780  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_n_NORMAL: // n
3781  hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3782  hydro_flags |= HYDRO_FLAG_DIR;
3783  break;
3784  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_s_DISABLE_ON_HIGH_SPEED: // 's': // speed changing hydro
3785  hydro_flags |= HYDRO_FLAG_SPEED;
3786  break;
3787  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_a_INPUT_AILERON: // 'a':
3788  hydro_flags |= HYDRO_FLAG_AILERON;
3789  break;
3790  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_r_INPUT_RUDDER: // 'r':
3791  hydro_flags |= HYDRO_FLAG_RUDDER;
3792  break;
3793  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_e_INPUT_ELEVATOR: // 'e':
3794  hydro_flags |= HYDRO_FLAG_ELEVATOR;
3795  break;
3796  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_u_INPUT_AILERON_ELEVATOR: // 'u':
3797  hydro_flags |= (HYDRO_FLAG_AILERON | HYDRO_FLAG_ELEVATOR);
3798  break;
3799  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_v_INPUT_InvAILERON_ELEVATOR: // 'v':
3800  hydro_flags |= (HYDRO_FLAG_REV_AILERON | HYDRO_FLAG_ELEVATOR);
3801  break;
3802  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_x_INPUT_AILERON_RUDDER: // 'x':
3803  hydro_flags |= (HYDRO_FLAG_AILERON | HYDRO_FLAG_RUDDER);
3804  break;
3805  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_y_INPUT_InvAILERON_RUDDER: // 'y':
3806  hydro_flags |= (HYDRO_FLAG_REV_AILERON | HYDRO_FLAG_RUDDER);
3807  break;
3808  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_g_INPUT_ELEVATOR_RUDDER: // 'g':
3809  hydro_flags |= (HYDRO_FLAG_ELEVATOR | HYDRO_FLAG_RUDDER);
3810  break;
3811  case RigDef::Hydro::OPTION_h_INPUT_InvELEVATOR_RUDDER: // 'h':
3812  hydro_flags |= (HYDRO_FLAG_REV_ELEVATOR | HYDRO_FLAG_RUDDER);
3813  break;
3814  default:
3815  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, std::string("Ignoring invalid flag:") + c);
3816  break;
3817  }
3818 
3819  // NOTE: This is a quirk ported from v0.4.0.7 spawner (for compatibility)
3820  // This code obviously belongs after the options-loop.
3821  // However, since it's inside the loop, it only works correctly if the 'i' flag is last.
3822  //
3823  // ORIGINAL COMMENT: if you use the i flag on its own, add the direction to it
3824  if (hydro_type == BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO && !hydro_flags)
3825  {
3826  hydro_flags |= HYDRO_FLAG_DIR;
3827  }
3828  }
3829  }
3830 
3831  _ProcessKeyInertia(m_rig->hydroInertia, def.inertia, *def.inertia_defaults, m_rig->free_hydro, m_rig->free_hydro);
3832 
3833  node_t & node_1 = GetNode(def.nodes[0]);
3834  node_t & node_2 = GetNode(def.nodes[1]);
3835 
3836  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
3837  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(node_1, node_2, def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
3838  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledBreakingThreshold());
3839  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
3840  beam.type = hydro_type;
3841  beam.k = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledSpringiness();
3842  beam.d = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledDamping();
3843  beam.hydroFlags = hydro_flags;
3844  beam.hydroRatio = def.lenghtening_factor;
3845 
3846  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
3847 
3848  m_rig->hydro[m_rig->free_hydro] = beam_index;
3849  m_rig->free_hydro++;
3850 }
3851 
3852 void RigSpawner::ProcessShock2(RigDef::Shock2 & def)
3853 {
3854  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3855 
3856  node_t & node_1 = GetNode(def.nodes[0]);
3857  node_t & node_2 = GetNode(def.nodes[1]);
3858  float short_bound = def.short_bound;
3859  float long_bound = def.long_bound;
3860  unsigned int hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3861  unsigned int shock_flags = SHOCK_FLAG_NORMAL | SHOCK_FLAG_ISSHOCK2;
3862 
3863  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock2::OPTION_i_INVISIBLE))
3864  {
3865  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_INVISIBLE);
3866  hydro_type = BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO;
3867  }
3868  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock2::OPTION_s_SOFT_BUMP_BOUNDS))
3869  {
3870  BITMASK_SET_0(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_NORMAL); /* Not normal anymore */
3871  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_SOFTBUMP);
3872  }
3873  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock2::OPTION_m_METRIC))
3874  {
3875  float beam_length = node_1.AbsPosition.distance(node_2.AbsPosition);
3876  short_bound /= beam_length;
3877  long_bound /= beam_length;
3878  }
3879  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock2::OPTION_M_ABSOLUTE_METRIC))
3880  {
3881  float beam_length = node_1.AbsPosition.distance(node_2.AbsPosition);
3882  short_bound = (beam_length - short_bound) / beam_length;
3883  long_bound = (long_bound - beam_length) / beam_length;
3884 
3885  if (long_bound < 0.f)
3886  {
3887  AddMessage(
3888  Message::TYPE_WARNING,
3889  "Metric shock length calculation failed, 'short_bound' less than beams spawn length. Resetting to beam's spawn length (short_bound = 0)"
3890  );
3891  long_bound = 0.f;
3892  }
3893 
3894  if (short_bound > 1.f)
3895  {
3896  AddMessage(
3897  Message::TYPE_WARNING,
3898  "Metric shock length calculation failed, 'short_bound' less than 0 meters. Resetting to 0 meters (short_bound = 1)"
3899  );
3900  short_bound = 1.f;
3901  }
3902  }
3903 
3904  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
3905  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(node_1, node_2, def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
3906  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->breaking_threshold * 4.f);
3907  beam.type = hydro_type;
3908  beam.bounded = SHOCK2;
3909  beam.k = def.spring_in;
3910  beam.d = def.damp_in;
3911  beam.shortbound = short_bound;
3912  beam.longbound = long_bound;
3913 
3914  /* Length + pre-compression */
3915  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
3916  beam.L *= def.precompression;
3917  beam.refL *= def.precompression;
3918  beam.Lhydro *= def.precompression;
3919 
3920  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
3921 
3922  shock_t & shock = GetFreeShock();
3923  shock.flags = shock_flags;
3924  shock.sbd_spring = def.beam_defaults->springiness;
3925  shock.sbd_damp = def.beam_defaults->damping_constant;
3926  shock.springin = def.spring_in;
3927  shock.dampin = def.damp_in;
3928  shock.springout = def.spring_out;
3929  shock.dampout = def.damp_out;
3930  shock.sprogin = def.progress_factor_spring_in;
3931  shock.dprogin = def.progress_factor_damp_in;
3932  shock.sprogout = def.progress_factor_spring_out;
3933  shock.dprogout = def.progress_factor_damp_out;
3934 
3935  beam.shock = & shock;
3936  shock.beamid = beam_index;
3937 }
3938 
3939 void RigSpawner::ProcessShock(RigDef::Shock & def)
3940 {
3941  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
3942 
3943  node_t & node_1 = GetNode(def.nodes[0]);
3944  node_t & node_2 = GetNode(def.nodes[1]);
3945  float short_bound = def.short_bound;
3946  float long_bound = def.long_bound;
3947  unsigned int hydro_type = BEAM_HYDRO;
3948  unsigned int shock_flags = SHOCK_FLAG_NORMAL;
3949 
3950  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock::OPTION_i_INVISIBLE))
3951  {
3952  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_INVISIBLE);
3953  hydro_type = BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO;
3954  }
3955  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock::OPTION_L_ACTIVE_LEFT))
3956  {
3957  BITMASK_SET_0(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_NORMAL); /* Not normal anymore */
3958  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_LACTIVE);
3959  m_rig->has_active_shocks = true;
3960  }
3961  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock::OPTION_R_ACTIVE_RIGHT))
3962  {
3963  BITMASK_SET_0(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_NORMAL); /* Not normal anymore */
3964  BITMASK_SET_1(shock_flags, SHOCK_FLAG_RACTIVE);
3965  m_rig->has_active_shocks = true;
3966  }
3967  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Shock::OPTION_m_METRIC))
3968  {
3969  float beam_length = node_1.AbsPosition.distance(node_2.AbsPosition);
3970  short_bound /= beam_length;
3971  long_bound /= beam_length;
3972  }
3973 
3974  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
3975  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(node_1, node_2, def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
3976  beam.shortbound = short_bound;
3977  beam.longbound = long_bound;
3978  beam.bounded = SHOCK1;
3979  beam.type = hydro_type;
3980  beam.k = def.spring_rate;
3981  beam.d = def.damping;
3982  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->breaking_threshold * 4.f);
3983 
3984  /* Length + pre-compression */
3985  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
3986  beam.L *= def.precompression;
3987  beam.refL *= def.precompression;
3988  beam.Lhydro *= def.precompression;
3989 
3990  shock_t & shock = GetFreeShock();
3991  shock.flags = shock_flags;
3992  shock.sbd_spring = def.beam_defaults->springiness;
3993  shock.sbd_damp = def.beam_defaults->damping_constant;
3994 
3995  /* Create beam visuals, but don't attach them to scene graph */
3996  /* Old parser did it like this, I don't know why ~ only_a_ptr 13-04-14 */
3997  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
3998 
3999  beam.shock = & shock;
4000  shock.beamid = beam_index;
4001 }
4002 
4003 void RigSpawner::FetchAxisNodes(
4004  node_t* & axis_node_1,
4005  node_t* & axis_node_2,
4006  RigDef::Node::Ref const & axis_node_1_id,
4007  RigDef::Node::Ref const & axis_node_2_id
4008 )
4009 {
4010  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4011 
4012  axis_node_1 = GetNodePointer(axis_node_1_id);
4013  axis_node_2 = GetNodePointer(axis_node_2_id);
4014 
4015  Ogre::Vector3 pos_1 = axis_node_1->AbsPosition;
4016  Ogre::Vector3 pos_2 = axis_node_2->AbsPosition;
4017 
4018  /* Enforce the "second node must have a larger Z coordinate than the first" constraint */
4019  if (pos_1.z > pos_2.z)
4020  {
4021  node_t *swap = axis_node_1;
4022  axis_node_1 = axis_node_2;
4023  axis_node_2 = swap;
4024  }
4025 }
4026 
4027 void RigSpawner::ProcessFlexBodyWheel(RigDef::FlexBodyWheel & def)
4028 {
4029  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4030 
4031  // Check capacities
4032  CheckFlexbodyLimit(1); // TODO: remove the limit! See `RigSpawner::CalcMemoryRequirements()` ~ only_a_ptr, 06/2017
4033 
4034  unsigned int base_node_index = m_rig->free_node;
4035  wheel_t & wheel = m_rig->wheels[m_rig->free_wheel];
4036 
4037  node_t *axis_node_1 = nullptr;
4038  node_t *axis_node_2 = nullptr;
4039  FetchAxisNodes(axis_node_1, axis_node_2, def.nodes[0], def.nodes[1]);
4040 
4041  // Rigidity node
4042  node_t *rigidity_node = nullptr;
4043  node_t *axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node = nullptr;
4044  if (def.rigidity_node.IsValidAnyState())
4045  {
4046  rigidity_node = GetNodePointer(def.rigidity_node);
4047  Ogre::Real distance_1 = (rigidity_node->RelPosition - axis_node_1->RelPosition).length();
4048  Ogre::Real distance_2 = (rigidity_node->RelPosition - axis_node_2->RelPosition).length();
4049  axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node = ((distance_1 < distance_2)) ? axis_node_1 : axis_node_2;
4050  }
4051 
4052  // Node&beam generation
4053  Ogre::Vector3 axis_vector = axis_node_2->RelPosition - axis_node_1->RelPosition;
4054  wheel.width = axis_vector.length(); /* wheel_def.width is ignored. */
4055  axis_vector.normalise();
4056  Ogre::Vector3 rim_ray_vector = axis_vector.perpendicular() * def.rim_radius;
4057  Ogre::Quaternion rim_ray_rotator = Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(-360.f / (def.num_rays * 2)), axis_vector);
4058 
4059  // Rim nodes
4060  // NOTE: node.iswheel is not used for rim nodes
4061  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < def.num_rays; i++)
4062  {
4063  float node_mass = def.mass / (4.f * def.num_rays);
4064 
4065  // Outer ring
4066  Ogre::Vector3 ray_point = axis_node_1->RelPosition + rim_ray_vector;
4067  rim_ray_vector = rim_ray_rotator * rim_ray_vector;
4068 
4069  node_t & outer_node = GetFreeNode();
4070  InitNode(outer_node, ray_point, def.node_defaults);
4071 
4072  outer_node.mass = node_mass;
4073  outer_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel2)
4074  outer_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4075  outer_node.friction_coef = def.node_defaults->friction;
4076  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(outer_node, def.node_defaults);
4077 
4078  // Inner ring
4079  ray_point = axis_node_2->RelPosition + rim_ray_vector;
4080  rim_ray_vector = rim_ray_rotator * rim_ray_vector;
4081 
4082  node_t & inner_node = GetFreeNode();
4083  InitNode(inner_node, ray_point, def.node_defaults);
4084 
4085  inner_node.mass = node_mass;
4086  inner_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel2)
4087  inner_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4088  inner_node.friction_coef = def.node_defaults->friction;
4089  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(inner_node, def.node_defaults);
4090 
4091  // Wheel object
4092  wheel.nodes[i * 2] = & outer_node;
4093  wheel.nodes[(i * 2) + 1] = & inner_node;
4094  }
4095 
4096  Ogre::Vector3 tyre_ray_vector = axis_vector.perpendicular() * def.tyre_radius;
4097  Ogre::Quaternion& tyre_ray_rotator = rim_ray_rotator;
4098  tyre_ray_vector = tyre_ray_rotator * tyre_ray_vector;
4099 
4100  // Tyre nodes
4101  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < def.num_rays; i++)
4102  {
4103  /* Outer ring */
4104  float node_mass = def.mass / (4.f * def.num_rays);
4105  Ogre::Vector3 ray_point = axis_node_1->RelPosition + tyre_ray_vector;
4106  tyre_ray_vector = tyre_ray_rotator * tyre_ray_vector;
4107 
4108  node_t & outer_node = GetFreeNode();
4109  InitNode(outer_node, ray_point);
4110  outer_node.mass = node_mass;
4111  outer_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel3)
4112  outer_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4113  outer_node.friction_coef = def.node_defaults->friction;
4114  outer_node.volume_coef = def.node_defaults->volume;
4115  outer_node.surface_coef = def.node_defaults->surface;
4116  outer_node.iswheel = WHEEL_FLEXBODY;
4117  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(outer_node, def.node_defaults);
4118 
4119  contacter_t & outer_contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
4120  outer_contacter.nodeid = outer_node.pos; /* Node index */
4121  m_rig->free_contacter++;
4122 
4123  // Inner ring
4124  ray_point = axis_node_2->RelPosition + tyre_ray_vector;
4125  tyre_ray_vector = tyre_ray_rotator * tyre_ray_vector;
4126 
4127  node_t & inner_node = GetFreeNode();
4128  InitNode(inner_node, ray_point);
4129  inner_node.mass = node_mass;
4130  inner_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel3)
4131  inner_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4132  inner_node.friction_coef = def.node_defaults->friction;
4133  inner_node.volume_coef = def.node_defaults->volume;
4134  inner_node.surface_coef = def.node_defaults->surface;
4135  inner_node.iswheel = WHEEL_FLEXBODY;
4136  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(inner_node, def.node_defaults);
4137 
4138  contacter_t & inner_contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
4139  inner_contacter.nodeid = inner_node.pos; // Node index
4140  m_rig->free_contacter++;
4141 
4142  // Wheel object
4143  wheel.nodes[i * 2] = & outer_node;
4144  wheel.nodes[(i * 2) + 1] = & inner_node;
4145  }
4146 
4147  // Beams
4148  float rim_spring = def.rim_springiness;
4149  float rim_damp = def.rim_damping;
4150  float tyre_spring = def.tyre_springiness;
4151  float tyre_damp = def.tyre_damping;
4152  float tread_spring = def.beam_defaults->springiness;
4153  float tread_damp = def.beam_defaults->damping_constant;
4154 
4155  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < def.num_rays; i++)
4156  {
4157  // --- Rim ---
4158 
4159  // Rim axis to rim ring
4160  unsigned int rim_outer_node_index = base_node_index + (i * 2);
4161  node_t *rim_outer_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_outer_node_index];
4162  node_t *rim_inner_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_outer_node_index + 1];
4163 
4164  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_1, rim_outer_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4165  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_2, rim_inner_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4166  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_2, rim_outer_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4167  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_1, rim_inner_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4168 
4169  // Reinforcement rim ring
4170  unsigned int rim_next_outer_node_index = base_node_index + (((i + 1) % def.num_rays) * 2);
4171  node_t *rim_next_outer_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_next_outer_node_index];
4172  node_t *rim_next_inner_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_next_outer_node_index + 1];
4173 
4174  AddWheelBeam(rim_outer_node, rim_inner_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4175  AddWheelBeam(rim_outer_node, rim_next_outer_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4176  AddWheelBeam(rim_inner_node, rim_next_inner_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4177  AddWheelBeam(rim_inner_node, rim_next_outer_node, rim_spring, rim_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4178  }
4179 
4180  // Tyre beams
4181  // Quick&dirty port from original SerializedRig::addWheel3()
4182  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < def.num_rays; i++)
4183  {
4184  int rim_node_index = base_node_index + i*2;
4185  int tyre_node_index = base_node_index + i*2 + def.num_rays*2;
4186  node_t * rim_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_node_index];
4187 
4188  AddWheelBeam(rim_node, & m_rig->nodes[tyre_node_index], tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4189 
4190  int tyre_base_index = (i == 0) ? tyre_node_index + (def.num_rays * 2) : tyre_node_index;
4191  AddWheelBeam(rim_node, & m_rig->nodes[tyre_base_index - 1], tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4192  AddWheelBeam(rim_node, & m_rig->nodes[tyre_base_index - 2], tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4193 
4194  node_t * next_rim_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_node_index + 1];
4195  AddWheelBeam(next_rim_node, & m_rig->nodes[tyre_node_index], tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4196  AddWheelBeam(next_rim_node, & m_rig->nodes[tyre_node_index + 1], tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4197 
4198  {
4199  int index = (i == 0) ? tyre_node_index + (def.num_rays * 2) - 1 : tyre_node_index - 1;
4200  node_t * tyre_node = & m_rig->nodes[index];
4201  AddWheelBeam(next_rim_node, tyre_node, tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4202  }
4203 
4204  //reinforcement (tire tread)
4205  {
4206  // Very messy port :(
4207  // Aliases
4208  int rimnode = rim_node_index;
4209  int rays = def.num_rays;
4210 
4211  AddWheelBeam(&m_rig->nodes[rimnode+rays*2], &m_rig->nodes[base_node_index+i*2+1+rays*2], tread_spring, tread_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4212  AddWheelBeam(&m_rig->nodes[rimnode+rays*2], &m_rig->nodes[base_node_index+((i+1)%rays)*2+rays*2], tread_spring, tread_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4213  AddWheelBeam(&m_rig->nodes[base_node_index+i*2+1+rays*2], &m_rig->nodes[base_node_index+((i+1)%rays)*2+1+rays*2], tread_spring, tread_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4214  AddWheelBeam(&m_rig->nodes[rimnode+1+rays*2], &m_rig->nodes[base_node_index+((i+1)%rays)*2+rays*2], tread_spring, tread_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4215 
4216  if (rigidity_node != nullptr)
4217  {
4218  if (axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node == axis_node_1)
4219  {
4220  axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node = & m_rig->nodes[base_node_index+i*2+rays*2];
4221  } else
4222  {
4223  axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node = & m_rig->nodes[base_node_index+i*2+1+rays*2];
4224  };
4225  unsigned int beam_index = AddWheelBeam(rigidity_node, axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node, tyre_spring, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4226  GetBeam(beam_index).type = BEAM_VIRTUAL;
4227  }
4228  }
4229  }
4230 
4231  // Calculate the point where the support beams get stiff and prevent the tire tread nodes
4232  // bounce into the rim rimradius / tire radius and add 5%, this is a shortbound calc in % !
4233 
4234  float support_beams_short_bound = 1.0f - ((def.rim_radius / def.tyre_radius) * 0.95f);
4235 
4236  for (unsigned int i=0; i<def.num_rays; i++)
4237  {
4238  // tiretread anti collapse reinforcements, using precalced support beams
4239  unsigned int tirenode = base_node_index + i*2 + def.num_rays*2;
4240  unsigned int beam_index;
4241 
4242  beam_index = AddWheelBeam(axis_node_1, &m_rig->nodes[tirenode], tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4243  GetBeam(beam_index).shortbound = support_beams_short_bound;
4244  GetBeam(beam_index).longbound = 0.f;
4245  GetBeam(beam_index).bounded = SHOCK1;
4246 
4247  beam_index = AddWheelBeam(axis_node_2, &m_rig->nodes[tirenode + 1], tyre_spring/2.f, tyre_damp, def.beam_defaults);
4248  GetBeam(beam_index).shortbound = support_beams_short_bound;
4249  GetBeam(beam_index).longbound = 0.f;
4250  GetBeam(beam_index).bounded = SHOCK1;
4251  }
4252 
4253  // Wheel object
4254  wheel.braked = def.braking;
4255  wheel.propulsed = def.propulsion;
4256  wheel.nbnodes = 2 * def.num_rays;
4257  wheel.refnode0 = axis_node_1;
4258  wheel.refnode1 = axis_node_2;
4259  wheel.radius = def.tyre_radius;
4260  wheel.arm = GetNodePointer(def.reference_arm_node);
4261 
4262  if (def.propulsion != RigDef::Wheels::PROPULSION_NONE)
4263  {
4264  // for inter-differential locking
4265  m_rig->proped_wheels++;
4266  m_rig->proppairs[m_rig->proped_wheels] = m_rig->free_wheel;
4267  m_rig->propwheelcount++;
4268  }
4269  if (def.braking != RigDef::Wheels::BRAKING_NO)
4270  {
4271  m_rig->braked_wheels++;
4272  }
4273 
4274  // Find near attach
4275  Ogre::Real length_1 = (axis_node_1->RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
4276  Ogre::Real length_2 = (axis_node_2->RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
4277  wheel.near_attach = (length_1 < length_2) ? axis_node_1 : axis_node_2;
4278 
4279  // Commit the wheel
4280  ++m_rig->free_wheel;
4281 
4282  // Create visuals
4283  BuildMeshWheelVisuals(
4284  m_rig->free_wheel,
4285  base_node_index,
4286  axis_node_1->pos,
4287  axis_node_2->pos,
4288  def.num_rays,
4289  def.rim_mesh_name,
4290  "tracks/trans", // Rim material name. Original parser: was hardcoded in BTS_FLEXBODYWHEELS
4291  def.rim_radius,
4292  def.side != RigDef::MeshWheel::SIDE_RIGHT
4293  );
4294 
4295  const std::string flexwheel_name = this->ComposeName("FlexBodyWheel", m_rig->free_flexbody);
4296 
4297  int num_nodes = def.num_rays * 4;
4298  std::vector<unsigned int> node_indices;
4299  node_indices.reserve(num_nodes);
4300  for (int i = 0; i < num_nodes; ++i)
4301  {
4302  node_indices.push_back( base_node_index + i );
4303  }
4304 
4305  RigDef::Flexbody flexbody_def;
4306  flexbody_def.mesh_name = def.tyre_mesh_name;
4307  flexbody_def.offset = Ogre::Vector3(0.5,0,0);
4308 
4309  try
4310  {
4311  auto* flexbody = m_flex_factory.CreateFlexBody(
4312  &flexbody_def,
4313  axis_node_1->pos,
4314  axis_node_2->pos,
4315  static_cast<int>(base_node_index),
4316  Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(90), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y),
4317  node_indices
4318  );
4319 
4320  if (flexbody == nullptr)
4321  return; // Error already logged
4322 
4323  this->CreateWheelSkidmarks(static_cast<unsigned>(m_rig->free_wheel));
4324 
4325  m_rig->flexbodies[m_rig->free_flexbody] = flexbody;
4326  m_rig->free_flexbody++;
4327  }
4328  catch (Ogre::Exception& e)
4329  {
4330  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR,
4331  "Failed to create flexbodywheel '" + def.tyre_mesh_name + "', reason:" + e.getFullDescription());
4332  }
4333 }
4334 
4335 void RigSpawner::ProcessMeshWheel(RigDef::MeshWheel & meshwheel_def)
4336 {
4337  if (meshwheel_def._is_meshwheel2)
4338  {
4339  this->ProcessMeshWheel2(meshwheel_def);
4340  return;
4341  }
4342 
4343  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4344 
4345  unsigned int base_node_index = m_rig->free_node;
4346  node_t *axis_node_1 = GetNodePointer(meshwheel_def.nodes[0]);
4347  node_t *axis_node_2 = GetNodePointer(meshwheel_def.nodes[1]);
4348 
4349  Ogre::Vector3 pos_1 = axis_node_1->AbsPosition;
4350  Ogre::Vector3 pos_2 = axis_node_2->AbsPosition;
4351 
4352  /* Enforce the "second node must have a larger Z coordinate than the first" constraint */
4353  if (pos_1.z > pos_2.z)
4354  {
4355  node_t *swap = axis_node_1;
4356  axis_node_1 = axis_node_2;
4357  axis_node_2 = swap;
4358  }
4359 
4360  unsigned int wheel_index = BuildWheelObjectAndNodes(
4361  meshwheel_def.num_rays,
4362  axis_node_1,
4363  axis_node_2,
4364  GetNodePointer(meshwheel_def.reference_arm_node),
4365  meshwheel_def.num_rays * 2,
4366  meshwheel_def.num_rays * 8,
4367  meshwheel_def.tyre_radius,
4368  meshwheel_def.propulsion,
4369  meshwheel_def.braking,
4370  meshwheel_def.node_defaults,
4371  meshwheel_def.mass
4372  );
4373 
4374  BuildWheelBeams(
4375  meshwheel_def.num_rays,
4376  base_node_index,
4377  axis_node_1,
4378  axis_node_2,
4379  meshwheel_def.spring, /* Tyre */
4380  meshwheel_def.damping, /* Tyre */
4381  meshwheel_def.spring, /* Rim */
4382  meshwheel_def.damping, /* Rim */
4383  meshwheel_def.beam_defaults,
4384  meshwheel_def.rigidity_node
4385  );
4386 
4387  BuildMeshWheelVisuals(
