4388  wheel_index,
4389  base_node_index,
4390  axis_node_1->pos,
4391  axis_node_2->pos,
4392  meshwheel_def.num_rays,
4393  meshwheel_def.mesh_name,
4394  meshwheel_def.material_name,
4395  meshwheel_def.rim_radius,
4396  meshwheel_def.side != RigDef::MeshWheel::SIDE_RIGHT
4397  );
4398 
4399  CreateWheelSkidmarks(wheel_index);
4400 }
4401 
4402 void RigSpawner::ProcessMeshWheel2(RigDef::MeshWheel & def)
4403 {
4404  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4405 
4406  unsigned int base_node_index = m_rig->free_node;
4407  node_t *axis_node_1 = GetNodePointer(def.nodes[0]);
4408  node_t *axis_node_2 = GetNodePointer(def.nodes[1]);
4409 
4410  if (axis_node_1 == nullptr || axis_node_2 == nullptr)
4411  {
4412  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to find axis nodes, skipping meshwheel2...");
4413  return;
4414  }
4415 
4416  Ogre::Vector3 pos_1 = axis_node_1->AbsPosition;
4417  Ogre::Vector3 pos_2 = axis_node_2->AbsPosition;
4418 
4419  /* Enforce the "second node must have a larger Z coordinate than the first" constraint */
4420  if (pos_1.z > pos_2.z)
4421  {
4422  node_t *swap = axis_node_1;
4423  axis_node_1 = axis_node_2;
4424  axis_node_2 = swap;
4425  }
4426 
4427  unsigned int wheel_index = BuildWheelObjectAndNodes(
4428  def.num_rays,
4429  axis_node_1,
4430  axis_node_2,
4431  GetNodePointer(def.reference_arm_node),
4432  def.num_rays * 2,
4433  def.num_rays * 8,
4434  def.tyre_radius,
4435  def.propulsion,
4436  def.braking,
4437  def.node_defaults,
4438  def.mass
4439  );
4440 
4441  /* --- Beams --- */
4442  /* Use data from directive 'set_beam_defaults' for the tiretread beams */
4443  float tyre_spring = def.spring;
4444  float tyre_damp = def.damping;
4445  float rim_spring = def.beam_defaults->springiness;
4446  float rim_damp = def.beam_defaults->damping_constant;
4447 
4448  BuildWheelBeams(
4449  def.num_rays,
4450  base_node_index,
4451  axis_node_1,
4452  axis_node_2,
4453  tyre_spring,
4454  tyre_damp,
4455  rim_spring,
4456  rim_damp,
4457  def.beam_defaults,
4458  def.rigidity_node,
4459  0.15 // max_extension
4460  );
4461 
4462  /* --- Visuals --- */
4463  BuildMeshWheelVisuals(
4464  wheel_index,
4465  base_node_index,
4466  axis_node_1->pos,
4467  axis_node_2->pos,
4468  def.num_rays,
4469  def.mesh_name,
4470  def.material_name,
4471  def.rim_radius,
4472  def.side != RigDef::MeshWheel::SIDE_RIGHT
4473  );
4474 
4475  CreateWheelSkidmarks(wheel_index);
4476 }
4477 
4478 void RigSpawner::BuildMeshWheelVisuals(
4479  unsigned int wheel_index,
4480  unsigned int base_node_index,
4481  unsigned int axis_node_1_index,
4482  unsigned int axis_node_2_index,
4483  unsigned int num_rays,
4484  Ogre::String mesh_name,
4485  Ogre::String material_name,
4486  float rim_radius,
4487  bool rim_reverse
4488 )
4489 {
4490  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4491 
4492  try
4493  {
4494  FlexMeshWheel* flexmesh_wheel = m_flex_factory.CreateFlexMeshWheel(
4495  wheel_index,
4496  axis_node_1_index,
4497  axis_node_2_index,
4498  base_node_index,
4499  num_rays,
4500  rim_radius,
4501  rim_reverse,
4502  mesh_name,
4503  material_name);
4504  Ogre::SceneNode* scene_node = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
4505  scene_node->attachObject(flexmesh_wheel->GetTireEntity());
4506 
4507  m_rig->deletion_Entities.emplace_back(flexmesh_wheel->GetTireEntity());
4508  m_rig->vwheels[wheel_index].fm = flexmesh_wheel;
4509  m_rig->vwheels[wheel_index].cnode = scene_node;
4510  }
4511  catch (Ogre::Exception& e)
4512  {
4513  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to create meshwheel visuals, message: " + e.getFullDescription());
4514  return;
4515  }
4516 }
4517 
4518 unsigned int RigSpawner::BuildWheelObjectAndNodes(
4519  unsigned int num_rays,
4520  node_t *axis_node_1,
4521  node_t *axis_node_2,
4522  node_t *reference_arm_node,
4523  unsigned int reserve_nodes,
4524  unsigned int reserve_beams,
4525  float wheel_radius,
4526  RigDef::Wheels::Propulsion propulsion,
4527  RigDef::Wheels::Braking braking,
4528  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::NodeDefaults> node_defaults,
4529  float wheel_mass,
4530  bool set_param_iswheel, /* Default: true */
4531  float wheel_width /* Default: -1.f */
4532 )
4533 {
4534  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4535 
4536  wheel_t & wheel = m_rig->wheels[m_rig->free_wheel];
4537 
4538  /* Axis */
4539  Ogre::Vector3 axis_vector = axis_node_2->RelPosition - axis_node_1->RelPosition;
4540  float axis_length = axis_vector.length();
4541  axis_vector.normalise();
4542 
4543  /* Wheel object */
4544  wheel.braked = braking;
4545  wheel.propulsed = propulsion;
4546  wheel.nbnodes = 2 * num_rays;
4547  wheel.refnode0 = axis_node_1;
4548  wheel.refnode1 = axis_node_2;
4549  wheel.radius = wheel_radius;
4550  wheel.width = (wheel_width < 0) ? axis_length : wheel_width;
4551  wheel.arm = reference_arm_node;
4552 
4553  /* Find near attach */
4554  Ogre::Real length_1 = (axis_node_1->RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
4555  Ogre::Real length_2 = (axis_node_2->RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
4556  wheel.near_attach = (length_1 < length_2) ? axis_node_1 : axis_node_2;
4557 
4558  if (propulsion != RigDef::Wheels::PROPULSION_NONE)
4559  {
4560  m_rig->propwheelcount++;
4561  /* for inter-differential locking */
4562  m_rig->proped_wheels++;
4563  m_rig->proppairs[m_rig->proped_wheels] = m_rig->free_wheel;
4564  }
4565  if (braking != RigDef::Wheels::BRAKING_NO)
4566  {
4567  m_rig->braked_wheels++;
4568  }
4569 
4570  /* Nodes */
4571  Ogre::Vector3 ray_vector = axis_vector.perpendicular() * wheel_radius;
4572  Ogre::Quaternion ray_rotator = Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(-360.0 / (num_rays * 2)), axis_vector);
4573 
4574 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
4575  // TRUCK PARSER 2013 DEBUG
4576  std::stringstream msg;
4577  msg << "\nDBG RigSpawner::BuildWheelObjectAndNodes()\nDBG nodebase:" << m_rig->free_node <<", axis-node-0:"<<axis_node_1->pos <<", axis-node-1:"<<axis_node_2->pos<<"\n";
4578  msg << "DBG ==== Adding nodes ====";
4579  // END
4580 #endif
4581 
4582  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < num_rays; i++)
4583  {
4584  /* Outer ring */
4585  Ogre::Vector3 ray_point = axis_node_1->RelPosition + ray_vector;
4586  ray_vector = ray_rotator * ray_vector;
4587 
4588  node_t & outer_node = GetFreeNode();
4589  InitNode(outer_node, ray_point, node_defaults);
4590  outer_node.mass = wheel_mass / (2.f * num_rays);
4591  outer_node.iswheel = (set_param_iswheel) ? WHEEL_DEFAULT : NOWHEEL;
4592  outer_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (BTS_WHEELS)
4593  outer_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4594  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(outer_node, node_defaults);
4595 
4596  contacter_t & outer_contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
4597  outer_contacter.nodeid = outer_node.pos; /* Node index */
4598  m_rig->free_contacter++;
4599 
4600  /* Inner ring */
4601  ray_point = axis_node_2->RelPosition + ray_vector;
4602  ray_vector = ray_rotator * ray_vector;
4603 
4604  node_t & inner_node = GetFreeNode();
4605  InitNode(inner_node, ray_point, node_defaults);
4606  inner_node.mass = wheel_mass / (2.f * num_rays);
4607  inner_node.iswheel = (set_param_iswheel) ? WHEEL_DEFAULT : NOWHEEL;
4608  inner_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (BTS_WHEELS)
4609  inner_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4610  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(inner_node, node_defaults);
4611 
4612  contacter_t & contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
4613  contacter.nodeid = inner_node.pos; /* Node index */
4614  m_rig->free_contacter++;
4615 
4616  /* Wheel object */
4617  wheel.nodes[i * 2] = & outer_node;
4618  wheel.nodes[(i * 2) + 1] = & inner_node;
4619 
4620 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
4621  // TRUCK PARSER 2013 DEBUG
4622  int modifier = 0;
4623  msg << "\nDBG\tN1: index=" << outer_node.pos + modifier <<", wheelid=" << outer_node.wheelid << ", iswheel=" << outer_node.iswheel
4624  <<", X=" << outer_node.AbsPosition.x <<", Y=" << outer_node.AbsPosition.y <<", Z=" << outer_node.AbsPosition.z << std::endl
4625  << "DBG\tN2: index=" << inner_node.pos + modifier <<", wheelid=" << inner_node.wheelid << ", iswheel=" << inner_node.iswheel
4626  <<", X=" << inner_node.AbsPosition.x <<", Y=" << inner_node.AbsPosition.y <<", Z=" << inner_node.AbsPosition.z;
4627  // END
4628 #endif
4629  }
4630 
4631 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
4632  // TRUCK PARSER 2013 DEBUG
4633  LOG(msg.str());
4634  // END
4635 #endif
4636 
4637  /* Advance */
4638  unsigned int wheel_index = m_rig->free_wheel;
4639  m_rig->free_wheel++;
4640  return wheel_index;
4641 }
4642 
4643 void RigSpawner::AdjustNodeBuoyancy(node_t & node, RigDef::Node & node_def, std::shared_ptr<RigDef::NodeDefaults> defaults)
4644 {
4645  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4646 
4647  unsigned int options = (defaults->options | node_def.options); // Merge flags
4648  node.buoyancy = BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_b_EXTRA_BUOYANCY) ? 10000.f : m_rig->truckmass/15.f;
4649 }
4650 
4651 void RigSpawner::AdjustNodeBuoyancy(node_t & node, std::shared_ptr<RigDef::NodeDefaults> defaults)
4652 {
4653  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4654 
4655  node.buoyancy = BITMASK_IS_1(defaults->options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_b_EXTRA_BUOYANCY) ? 10000.f : m_rig->truckmass/15.f;
4656 }
4657 
4658 int RigSpawner::FindLowestNodeInRig()
4659 {
4660  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4661 
4662  int lowest_node_index = 0;
4663  float lowest_y = m_rig->nodes[0].AbsPosition.y;
4664 
4665  for (int i = 0; i < m_rig->free_node; i++)
4666  {
4667  float y = m_rig->nodes[i].AbsPosition.y;
4668  if (y < lowest_y)
4669  {
4670  lowest_y = y;
4671  lowest_node_index = i;
4672  }
4673  }
4674 
4675  return lowest_node_index;
4676 }
4677 
4678 int RigSpawner::FindLowestContactingNodeInRig()
4679 {
4680  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4681 
4682  int lowest_node_index = FindLowestNodeInRig();
4683  float lowest_y = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
4684 
4685  for (int i = 0; i < m_rig->free_node; i++)
4686  {
4687  if (m_rig->nodes[i].contactless) continue;
4688  float y = m_rig->nodes[i].AbsPosition.y;
4689  if (y < lowest_y)
4690  {
4691  lowest_y = y;
4692  lowest_node_index = i;
4693  }
4694  }
4695 
4696  return lowest_node_index;
4697 }
4698 
4699 void RigSpawner::BuildWheelBeams(
4700  unsigned int num_rays,
4701  unsigned int base_node_index,
4702  node_t *axis_node_1,
4703  node_t *axis_node_2,
4704  float tyre_spring,
4705  float tyre_damping,
4706  float rim_spring,
4707  float rim_damping,
4708  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::BeamDefaults> beam_defaults,
4709  RigDef::Node::Ref const & rigidity_node_id,
4710  float max_extension // = 0.f
4711 )
4712 {
4713  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4714 
4715 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
4716  // DEBUG
4717  std::stringstream msg;
4718  msg << "==== BEAMS ====";
4719  // END DEBUG
4720 #endif
4721 
4722  /* Find out where to connect rigidity node */
4723  bool rigidity_beam_side_1 = false;
4724  node_t *rigidity_node = nullptr;
4725  if (rigidity_node_id.IsValidAnyState())
4726  {
4727  rigidity_node = GetNodePointerOrThrow(rigidity_node_id);
4728  float distance_1 = rigidity_node->RelPosition.distance(axis_node_1->RelPosition);
4729  float distance_2 = rigidity_node->RelPosition.distance(axis_node_2->RelPosition);
4730  rigidity_beam_side_1 = distance_1 < distance_2;
4731  }
4732 
4733  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < num_rays; i++)
4734  {
4735  /* Bounded */
4736  unsigned int outer_ring_node_index = base_node_index + (i * 2);
4737  node_t *outer_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[outer_ring_node_index];
4738  node_t *inner_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[outer_ring_node_index + 1];
4739 
4740  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_1, outer_ring_node, tyre_spring, tyre_damping, beam_defaults, 0.66f, max_extension);
4741  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_2, inner_ring_node, tyre_spring, tyre_damping, beam_defaults, 0.66f, max_extension);
4742  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_2, outer_ring_node, tyre_spring, tyre_damping, beam_defaults);
4743  AddWheelBeam(axis_node_1, inner_ring_node, tyre_spring, tyre_damping, beam_defaults);
4744 
4745  /* Reinforcement */
4746  unsigned int next_outer_ring_node_index = base_node_index + (((i + 1) % num_rays) * 2);
4747  node_t *next_outer_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[next_outer_ring_node_index];
4748  node_t *next_inner_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[next_outer_ring_node_index + 1];
4749 
4750  AddWheelBeam(outer_ring_node, inner_ring_node, rim_spring, rim_damping, beam_defaults);
4751  AddWheelBeam(outer_ring_node, next_outer_ring_node, rim_spring, rim_damping, beam_defaults);
4752  AddWheelBeam(inner_ring_node, next_inner_ring_node, rim_spring, rim_damping, beam_defaults);
4753  AddWheelBeam(inner_ring_node, next_outer_ring_node, rim_spring, rim_damping, beam_defaults);
4754 
4755 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
4756  // TRUCK PARSER 2013 DEBUG
4757  int modifier = 0;
4758  msg<<"\nDBG\tBounded: ";
4759  msg<<"["<<axis_node_1->pos + modifier<<" "<<outer_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4760  msg<<"["<<axis_node_2->pos + modifier<<" "<<inner_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4761  msg<<"["<<axis_node_2->pos + modifier<<" "<<outer_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4762  msg<<"["<<axis_node_1->pos + modifier<<" "<<inner_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"]";
4763  //reinforcement
4764  msg<<"\nDBG\tReinforcement: ";
4765  msg<<"["<<outer_ring_node->pos + modifier<<" "<<inner_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4766  msg<<"["<<outer_ring_node->pos + modifier<<" "<<next_outer_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4767  msg<<"["<<inner_ring_node->pos + modifier<<" "<<next_inner_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4768  msg<<"["<<inner_ring_node->pos + modifier<<" "<<next_outer_ring_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4769  // END
4770 #endif
4771 
4772  /* Rigidity beams */
4773  if (rigidity_node != nullptr)
4774  {
4775  node_t *target_node = (rigidity_beam_side_1) ? outer_ring_node : inner_ring_node;
4776  unsigned int beam_index = AddWheelBeam(rigidity_node, target_node, tyre_spring, tyre_damping, beam_defaults, -1.f, -1.f, BEAM_VIRTUAL);
4777  m_rig->beams[beam_index].type = BEAM_VIRTUAL;
4778 
4779 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
4780  // DEBUG
4781  msg<<"\nDBG\tRigidityBeam: ["<<rigidity_node->pos + modifier<<" "<<target_node->pos + modifier<<"] ";
4782  msg<<((rigidity_beam_side_1) ? "(outer)" : "(inner)");
4783  // END
4784 #endif
4785  }
4786  }
4787 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
4788  // TRUCK PARSER 2013 DEBUG
4789  LOG(msg.str());
4790  // END
4791 #endif
4792 }
4793 
4794 unsigned int RigSpawner::AddWheel(RigDef::Wheel & wheel_def)
4795 {
4796  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4797 
4798  unsigned int base_node_index = m_rig->free_node;
4799  node_t *axis_node_1 = GetNodePointer(wheel_def.nodes[0]);
4800  node_t *axis_node_2 = GetNodePointer(wheel_def.nodes[1]);
4801 
4802  if (axis_node_1 == nullptr || axis_node_2 == nullptr)
4803  {
4804  std::stringstream msg;
4805  msg << "Error creating 'wheel': Some axis nodes were not found";
4806  msg << " (Node1: " << wheel_def.nodes[0].ToString() << " => " << (axis_node_1 == nullptr) ? "NOT FOUND)" : "found)";
4807  msg << " (Node2: " << wheel_def.nodes[1].ToString() << " => " << (axis_node_2 == nullptr) ? "NOT FOUND)" : "found)";
4808  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
4809  return -1;
4810  }
4811 
4812  Ogre::Vector3 pos_1 = axis_node_1->AbsPosition;
4813  Ogre::Vector3 pos_2 = axis_node_2->AbsPosition;
4814 
4815  /* Enforce the "second node must have a larger Z coordinate than the first" constraint */
4816  if (pos_1.z > pos_2.z)
4817  {
4818  node_t *swap = axis_node_1;
4819  axis_node_1 = axis_node_2;
4820  axis_node_2 = swap;
4821  }
4822 
4823  unsigned int wheel_index = BuildWheelObjectAndNodes(
4824  wheel_def.num_rays,
4825  axis_node_1,
4826  axis_node_2,
4827  GetNodePointer(wheel_def.reference_arm_node),
4828  wheel_def.num_rays * 2,
4829  wheel_def.num_rays * 8,
4830  wheel_def.radius,
4831  wheel_def.propulsion,
4832  wheel_def.braking,
4833  wheel_def.node_defaults,
4834  wheel_def.mass,
4835  true,
4836  -1.f // Set width to axis length (width in definition is ignored)
4837  );
4838 
4839  BuildWheelBeams(
4840  wheel_def.num_rays,
4841  base_node_index,
4842  axis_node_1,
4843  axis_node_2,
4844  wheel_def.springiness, /* Tyre */
4845  wheel_def.damping, /* Tyre */
4846  wheel_def.springiness, /* Rim */
4847  wheel_def.damping, /* Rim */
4848  wheel_def.beam_defaults,
4849  wheel_def.rigidity_node
4850  );
4851 
4852  CreateWheelVisuals(wheel_index, wheel_def, base_node_index);
4853 
4854  CreateWheelSkidmarks(wheel_index);
4855 
4856  return wheel_index;
4857 }
4858 
4859 void RigSpawner::CreateWheelSkidmarks(unsigned int wheel_index)
4860 {
4861  // Always create, even if disabled by config
4862  m_rig->skidtrails[wheel_index] = new RoR::Skidmark(
4863  m_sim_controller->GetSkidmarkConf(), m_sim_controller, &m_rig->wheels[wheel_index], m_rig->beamsRoot, 300, 20);
4864 }
4865 
4866 #if 0 // refactored into pieces
4867 unsigned int RigSpawner::AddWheel(RigDef::Wheel & wheel_def)
4868 {
4869  /* Check capacity */
4870  CheckNodeLimit(wheel_def.num_rays * 2);
4871  CheckBeamLimit(wheel_def.num_rays * 8);
4872 
4873  unsigned int base_node_index = m_rig->free_node;
4874  wheel_t & wheel = m_rig->wheels[m_rig->free_wheel];
4875 
4876  /* Enforce the "second node must have a larger Z coordinate than the first" constraint */
4877  unsigned int axis_nodes[2];
4878  if (GetNode(wheel_def.nodes[0]).RelPosition.z < GetNode(wheel_def.nodes[1]).RelPosition.z)
4879  {
4880  axis_nodes[0] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(wheel_def.nodes[0]);
4881  axis_nodes[1] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(wheel_def.nodes[1]);
4882  }
4883  else
4884  {
4885  axis_nodes[0] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(wheel_def.nodes[1]);
4886  axis_nodes[1] = GetNodeIndexOrThrow(wheel_def.nodes[0]);
4887  }
4888  node_t & axis_node_1 = m_rig->nodes[axis_nodes[0]];
4889  node_t & axis_node_2 = m_rig->nodes[axis_nodes[1]];
4890 
4891  Ogre::Vector3 axis_vector = axis_node_2.RelPosition - axis_node_1.RelPosition;
4892  axis_vector.normalise();
4893  Ogre::Vector3 ray_vector = axis_vector.perpendicular() * wheel_def.radius;
4894  Ogre::Quaternion ray_rotator = Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(-360.f / wheel_def.num_rays * 2), axis_vector);
4895 
4896  /* Nodes */
4897  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wheel_def.num_rays; i++)
4898  {
4899  /* Outer ring */
4900  Ogre::Vector3 ray_point = axis_node_1.RelPosition + ray_vector;
4901  ray_vector = ray_rotator * ray_vector;
4902 
4903  node_t & outer_node = GetFreeNode();
4904  InitNode(outer_node, ray_point, wheel_def.node_defaults);
4905  outer_node.mass = wheel_def.mass / (2.f * wheel_def.num_rays);
4906  outer_node.iswheel = (m_rig->free_wheel * 2) + 1;
4907  outer_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (BTS_WHEELS)
4908  outer_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4909 
4910  contacter_t & contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
4911  contacter.nodeid = outer_node.pos; /* Node index */
4912  m_rig->free_contacter++;
4913 
4914  /* Inner ring */
4915  ray_point = axis_node_2.RelPosition + ray_vector;
4916  ray_vector = ray_rotator * ray_vector;
4917 
4918  node_t & inner_node = GetFreeNode();
4919  InitNode(inner_node, ray_point, wheel_def.node_defaults);
4920  inner_node.mass = wheel_def.mass / (2.f * wheel_def.num_rays);
4921  inner_node.iswheel = (m_rig->free_wheel * 2) + 2;
4922  inner_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (BTS_WHEELS)
4923  inner_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
4924 
4925  contacter_t & contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
4926  contacter.nodeid = inner_node.pos; /* Node index */
4927  m_rig->free_contacter++;
4928 
4929  /* Wheel object */
4930  wheel.nodes[i * 2] = & outer_node;
4931  wheel.nodes[(i * 2) + 1] = & inner_node;
4932  }
4933 
4934  /* Beams */
4935  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wheel_def.num_rays; i++)
4936  {
4937  /* Bounded */
4938  unsigned int outer_ring_node_index = base_node_index + (i * 2);
4939  node_t *outer_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[outer_ring_node_index];
4940  node_t *inner_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[outer_ring_node_index + 1];
4941 
4942  unsigned int beam_index = SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, & axis_node_1, outer_ring_node);
4943  GetBeam(beam_index).shortbound = 0.66f;
4944  GetBeam(beam_index).longbound = 0.0f;
4945  beam_index = SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, & axis_node_2, inner_ring_node);
4946  GetBeam(beam_index).shortbound = 0.66f;
4947  GetBeam(beam_index).longbound = 0.0f;
4948  SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, & axis_node_2, outer_ring_node);
4949  SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, & axis_node_1, inner_ring_node);
4950 
4951  /* Reinforcement */
4952  unsigned int next_outer_ring_node_index = base_node_index + (((i + 1) % wheel_def.num_rays) * 2);
4953  node_t *next_outer_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[next_outer_ring_node_index];
4954  node_t *next_inner_ring_node = & m_rig->nodes[next_outer_ring_node_index + 1];
4955 
4956  SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, outer_ring_node, inner_ring_node);
4957  SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, outer_ring_node, next_outer_ring_node);
4958  SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, inner_ring_node, next_inner_ring_node);
4959  SectionWheelsAddBeam(wheel_def, inner_ring_node, next_outer_ring_node);
4960  }
4961 
4962  /* Wheel object */
4963  wheel.braked = wheel_def.braking;
4964  wheel.propulsed = wheel_def.propulsion;
4965  wheel.nbnodes = 2 * wheel_def.num_rays;
4966  wheel.refnode0 = & axis_node_1;
4967  wheel.refnode1 = & axis_node_2;
4968  wheel.radius = wheel_def.radius;
4969  wheel.width = axis_vector.length(); /* wheel_def.width is ignored. */
4970  wheel.arm = GetNodePointer(wheel_def.reference_arm_node);
4971 
4972  if (wheel_def.propulsion != RigDef::Wheels::PROPULSION_NONE)
4973  {
4974  m_rig->propwheelcount++;
4975  /* for inter-differential locking */
4976  m_rig->proped_wheels++;
4977  m_rig->proppairs[m_rig->proped_wheels] = m_rig->free_wheel;
4978  }
4979  if (wheel_def.braking != RigDef::Wheels::BRAKING_NO)
4980  {
4981  m_rig->braked_wheels++;
4982  }
4983 
4984  /* Find near attach */
4985  Ogre::Real length_1 = (axis_node_1.RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
4986  Ogre::Real length_2 = (axis_node_2.RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
4987  wheel.near_attach = & ((length_1 < length_2) ? axis_node_1 : axis_node_2);
4988 
4989  /* Advance */
4990  unsigned int wheel_index = m_rig->free_wheel;
4991  m_rig->free_wheel++;
4992  return wheel_index;
4993 }
4994 #endif
4995 
4996 unsigned int RigSpawner::AddWheel2(RigDef::Wheel2 & wheel_2_def)
4997 {
4998  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
4999 
5000  unsigned int base_node_index = m_rig->free_node;
5001  wheel_t & wheel = m_rig->wheels[m_rig->free_wheel];
5002  node_t *axis_node_1 = GetNodePointer(wheel_2_def.nodes[0]);
5003  node_t *axis_node_2 = GetNodePointer(wheel_2_def.nodes[1]);
5004 
5005  if (axis_node_1 == nullptr || axis_node_2 == nullptr)
5006  {
5007  std::stringstream msg;
5008  msg << "Error creating 'wheel2': Some axis nodes were not found";
5009  msg << " (Node1: " << wheel_2_def.nodes[0].ToString() << " => " << (axis_node_1 == nullptr) ? "NOT FOUND)" : "found)";
5010  msg << " (Node2: " << wheel_2_def.nodes[1].ToString() << " => " << (axis_node_2 == nullptr) ? "NOT FOUND)" : "found)";
5011  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
5012  return -1;
5013  }
5014 
5015  Ogre::Vector3 pos_1 = axis_node_1->AbsPosition;
5016  Ogre::Vector3 pos_2 = axis_node_2->AbsPosition;
5017 
5018  /* Enforce the "second node must have a larger Z coordinate than the first" constraint */
5019  if (pos_1.z > pos_2.z)
5020  {
5021  node_t *swap = axis_node_1;
5022  axis_node_1 = axis_node_2;
5023  axis_node_2 = swap;
5024  }
5025 
5026  /* Rigidity node */
5027  node_t *axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node = nullptr;
5028  if (wheel_2_def.rigidity_node.IsValidAnyState())
5029  {
5030  node_t & rigidity_node = GetNode(wheel_2_def.rigidity_node);
5031  Ogre::Real distance_1 = (rigidity_node.RelPosition - axis_node_1->RelPosition).length();
5032  Ogre::Real distance_2 = (rigidity_node.RelPosition - axis_node_2->RelPosition).length();
5033  axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node = ((distance_1 < distance_2)) ? axis_node_1 : axis_node_2;
5034  }
5035 
5036  /* Node&beam generation */
5037  Ogre::Vector3 axis_vector = axis_node_2->RelPosition - axis_node_1->RelPosition;
5038  axis_vector.normalise();
5039  Ogre::Vector3 rim_ray_vector = Ogre::Vector3(0, wheel_2_def.rim_radius, 0);
5040  Ogre::Quaternion rim_ray_rotator = Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(-360.f / wheel_2_def.num_rays), axis_vector);
5041 
5042  /* Width */
5043  wheel.width = axis_vector.length(); /* wheel_def.width is ignored. */
5044 
5045  /* Rim nodes */
5046  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wheel_2_def.num_rays; i++)
5047  {
5048  float node_mass = wheel_2_def.mass / (4.f * wheel_2_def.num_rays);
5049 
5050  /* Outer ring */
5051  Ogre::Vector3 ray_point = axis_node_1->RelPosition + rim_ray_vector;
5052 
5053  node_t & outer_node = GetFreeNode();
5054  InitNode(outer_node, ray_point, wheel_2_def.node_defaults);
5055  outer_node.mass = node_mass;
5056  outer_node.iswheel = WHEEL_2;
5057  outer_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel2)
5058  outer_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
5059 
5060  /* Inner ring */
5061  ray_point = axis_node_2->RelPosition + rim_ray_vector;
5062 
5063  node_t & inner_node = GetFreeNode();
5064  InitNode(inner_node, ray_point, wheel_2_def.node_defaults);
5065  inner_node.mass = node_mass;
5066  inner_node.iswheel = WHEEL_2;
5067  inner_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel2)
5068  inner_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
5069 
5070  /* Wheel object */
5071  wheel.nodes[i * 2] = & outer_node;
5072  wheel.nodes[(i * 2) + 1] = & inner_node;
5073 
5074  rim_ray_vector = rim_ray_rotator * rim_ray_vector;
5075  }
5076 
5077  Ogre::Vector3 tyre_ray_vector = Ogre::Vector3(0, wheel_2_def.tyre_radius, 0);
5078  Ogre::Quaternion tyre_ray_rotator = Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(-180.f / wheel_2_def.num_rays), axis_vector);
5079  tyre_ray_vector = tyre_ray_rotator * tyre_ray_vector;
5080 
5081  /* Tyre nodes */
5082  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wheel_2_def.num_rays; i++)
5083  {
5084  /* Outer ring */
5085  Ogre::Vector3 ray_point = axis_node_1->RelPosition + tyre_ray_vector;
5086 
5087  node_t & outer_node = GetFreeNode();
5088  InitNode(outer_node, ray_point);
5089  outer_node.mass = (0.67f * wheel_2_def.mass) / (2.f * wheel_2_def.num_rays);
5090  outer_node.iswheel = WHEEL_2;
5091  outer_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel2)
5092  outer_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
5093  outer_node.friction_coef = wheel.width * WHEEL_FRICTION_COEF;
5094  outer_node.volume_coef = wheel_2_def.node_defaults->volume;
5095  outer_node.surface_coef = wheel_2_def.node_defaults->surface;
5096 
5097  contacter_t & contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
5098  contacter.nodeid = outer_node.pos; /* Node index */
5099  m_rig->free_contacter++;
5100 
5101  /* Inner ring */
5102  ray_point = axis_node_2->RelPosition + tyre_ray_vector;
5103 
5104  node_t & inner_node = GetFreeNode();
5105  InitNode(inner_node, ray_point);
5106  inner_node.mass = (0.33f * wheel_2_def.mass) / (2.f * wheel_2_def.num_rays);
5107  inner_node.iswheel = WHEEL_2;
5108  inner_node.id = -1; // Orig: hardcoded (addWheel2)
5109  inner_node.wheelid = m_rig->free_wheel;
5110  inner_node.friction_coef = wheel.width * WHEEL_FRICTION_COEF;
5111  inner_node.volume_coef = wheel_2_def.node_defaults->volume;
5112  inner_node.surface_coef = wheel_2_def.node_defaults->surface;
5113 
5114  contacter_t & inner_contacter = m_rig->contacters[m_rig->free_contacter];
5115  inner_contacter.nodeid = inner_node.pos; /* Node index */
5116  m_rig->free_contacter++;
5117 
5118  /* Wheel object */
5119  wheel.nodes[i * 2] = & outer_node;
5120  wheel.nodes[(i * 2) + 1] = & inner_node;
5121 
5122  tyre_ray_vector = rim_ray_rotator * tyre_ray_vector; // This is OK
5123  }
5124 
5125  /* Beams */
5126  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wheel_2_def.num_rays; i++)
5127  {
5128  /* --- Rim --- */
5129 
5130  /* Bounded */
5131  unsigned int rim_outer_node_index = base_node_index + (i * 2);
5132  node_t *rim_outer_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_outer_node_index];
5133  node_t *rim_inner_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_outer_node_index + 1];
5134 
5135  unsigned int beam_index;
5136  beam_index = AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, axis_node_1, rim_outer_node);
5137  GetBeam(beam_index).shortbound = 0.66;
5138  beam_index = AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, axis_node_2, rim_inner_node);
5139  GetBeam(beam_index).shortbound = 0.66;
5140  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, axis_node_2, rim_outer_node);
5141  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, axis_node_1, rim_inner_node);
5142 
5143  /* Reinforcement */
5144  unsigned int rim_next_outer_node_index = base_node_index + (((i + 1) % wheel_2_def.num_rays) * 2);
5145  node_t *rim_next_outer_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_next_outer_node_index];
5146  node_t *rim_next_inner_node = & m_rig->nodes[rim_next_outer_node_index + 1];
5147 
5148  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, axis_node_1, rim_outer_node);
5149  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, rim_outer_node, rim_inner_node);
5150  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, rim_outer_node, rim_next_outer_node);
5151  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, rim_inner_node, rim_next_inner_node);
5152  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, rim_outer_node, rim_next_inner_node);
5153  AddWheelRimBeam(wheel_2_def, rim_inner_node, rim_next_outer_node);
5154  if (axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node != nullptr)
5155  {
5156  beam_t & beam = GetFreeBeam();
5157  InitBeam(beam, GetNodePointer(wheel_2_def.rigidity_node), axis_node_closest_to_rigidity_node);
5158  beam.type = BEAM_VIRTUAL;
5159  beam.k = wheel_2_def.rim_springiness;
5160  beam.d = wheel_2_def.rim_damping;
5161  SetBeamStrength(beam, wheel_2_def.beam_defaults->breaking_threshold);
5162  }
5163 
5164  /* --- Tyre --- */
5165 
5166  unsigned int tyre_node_index = rim_outer_node_index + (2 * wheel_2_def.num_rays);
5167  node_t *tyre_outer_node = & m_rig->nodes[tyre_node_index];
5168  node_t *tyre_inner_node = & m_rig->nodes[tyre_node_index + 1];
5169  unsigned int tyre_next_node_index = rim_next_outer_node_index + (2 * wheel_2_def.num_rays);
5170  node_t *tyre_next_outer_node = & m_rig->nodes[tyre_next_node_index];
5171  node_t *tyre_next_inner_node = & m_rig->nodes[tyre_next_node_index + 1];
5172 
5173  /* Tyre band */
5174  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_outer_node, tyre_next_outer_node);
5175  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_outer_node, tyre_next_inner_node);
5176  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_inner_node, tyre_next_outer_node);
5177  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_inner_node, tyre_next_inner_node);
5178  /* Tyre sidewalls */
5179  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_outer_node, rim_outer_node);
5180  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_outer_node, rim_next_outer_node);
5181  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_inner_node, rim_inner_node);
5182  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_inner_node, rim_next_inner_node);
5183  /* Reinforcement */
5184  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_outer_node, rim_inner_node);
5185  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_outer_node, rim_next_inner_node);
5186  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_inner_node, rim_outer_node);
5187  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, tyre_inner_node, rim_next_outer_node);
5188  /* Backpressure, bounded */
5189  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, axis_node_1, tyre_outer_node);
5190  AddTyreBeam(wheel_2_def, axis_node_2, tyre_inner_node);
5191  }
5192 
5193  /* Wheel object */
5194  wheel.braked = wheel_2_def.braking;
5195  wheel.propulsed = wheel_2_def.propulsion;
5196  wheel.nbnodes = 2 * wheel_2_def.num_rays;
5197  wheel.refnode0 = axis_node_1;
5198  wheel.refnode1 = axis_node_2;
5199  wheel.radius = wheel_2_def.tyre_radius;
5200  wheel.arm = GetNodePointer(wheel_2_def.reference_arm_node);
5201 
5202  if (wheel_2_def.propulsion != RigDef::Wheels::PROPULSION_NONE)
5203  {
5204  /* for inter-differential locking */
5205  m_rig->proped_wheels++;
5206  m_rig->proppairs[m_rig->proped_wheels] = m_rig->free_wheel;
5207  }
5208  if (wheel_2_def.braking != RigDef::Wheels::BRAKING_NO)
5209  {
5210  m_rig->braked_wheels++;
5211  }
5212 
5213  /* Find near attach */
5214  Ogre::Real length_1 = (axis_node_1->RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
5215  Ogre::Real length_2 = (axis_node_2->RelPosition - wheel.arm->RelPosition).length();
5216  wheel.near_attach = (length_1 < length_2) ? axis_node_1 : axis_node_2;
5217 
5218  CreateWheelSkidmarks(static_cast<unsigned>(m_rig->free_wheel));
5219 
5220  /* Advance */
5221  unsigned int wheel_index = m_rig->free_wheel;
5222  m_rig->free_wheel++;
5223  return wheel_index;
5224 }
5225 
5226 void RigSpawner::CreateWheelVisuals(unsigned int wheel_index, RigDef::Wheel & wheel_def, unsigned int node_base_index)
5227 {
5228  // Wrapper, not profiling
5229 
5230  CreateWheelVisuals(
5231  wheel_index,
5232  node_base_index,
5233  wheel_def.num_rays,
5234  wheel_def.face_material_name,
5235  wheel_def.band_material_name,
5236  false
5237  );
5238 }
5239 
5240 void RigSpawner::CreateWheelVisuals(unsigned int wheel_index, RigDef::Wheel2 & wheel_2_def, unsigned int node_base_index)
5241 {
5242  // Wrapper, not profiling
5243 
5244  CreateWheelVisuals(
5245  wheel_index,
5246  node_base_index,
5247  wheel_2_def.num_rays,
5248  wheel_2_def.face_material_name,
5249  wheel_2_def.band_material_name,
5250  true,
5251  wheel_2_def.rim_radius / wheel_2_def.tyre_radius
5252  );
5253 }
5254 
5255 void RigSpawner::CreateWheelVisuals(
5256  unsigned int wheel_index,
5257  unsigned int node_base_index,
5258  unsigned int num_rays,
5259  Ogre::String const & rim_material_name,
5260  Ogre::String const & band_material_name,
5261  bool separate_rim,
5262  float rim_ratio
5263 )
5264 {
5265  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5266 
5267  wheel_t & wheel = m_rig->wheels[wheel_index];
5268  vwheel_t & visual_wheel = m_rig->vwheels[wheel_index];
5269 
5270  try
5271  {
5272  const std::string wheel_mesh_name = this->ComposeName("WheelMesh", wheel_index);
5273  visual_wheel.meshwheel = false;
5274  visual_wheel.fm = new FlexMesh(
5275  wheel_mesh_name,
5276  m_rig->nodes,
5277  wheel.refnode0->pos,
5278  wheel.refnode1->pos,
5279  node_base_index,
5280  num_rays,
5281  rim_material_name,
5282  band_material_name,
5283  separate_rim,
5284  rim_ratio
5285  );
5286 
5287  const std::string instance_name = this->ComposeName("WheelEntity", wheel_index);
5288  Ogre::Entity *ec = gEnv->sceneManager->createEntity(instance_name, wheel_mesh_name);
5289  this->SetupNewEntity(ec, Ogre::ColourValue(0, 0.5, 0.5));
5290  visual_wheel.cnode = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
5291  m_rig->deletion_Entities.emplace_back(ec);
5292  visual_wheel.cnode->attachObject(ec);
5293  }
5294  catch (Ogre::Exception& e)
5295  {
5296  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to create wheel visuals: " + e.getFullDescription());
5297  }
5298 }
5299 
5300 unsigned int RigSpawner::AddWheelBeam(
5301  node_t *node_1,
5302  node_t *node_2,
5303  float spring,
5304  float damping,
5305  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::BeamDefaults> beam_defaults,
5306  float max_contraction, /* Default: -1.f */
5307  float max_extension, /* Default: -1.f */
5308  int type /* Default: BEAM_INVISIBLE */
5309 )
5310 {
5311  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5312 
5313  unsigned int index = m_rig->free_beam;
5314  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(*node_1, *node_2, beam_defaults, DEFAULT_DETACHER_GROUP);
5315  beam.type = type;
5316  beam.k = spring;
5317  beam.d = damping;
5318  if (max_contraction > 0.f)
5319  {
5320  beam.shortbound = max_contraction;
5321  beam.longbound = max_extension;
5322  beam.bounded = SHOCK1;
5323  }
5324  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
5325 
5326  if (type != BEAM_VIRTUAL)
5327  {
5328  /* Create visuals, but don't attach to scene-graph (compatibility with show-skeleton function) */
5329  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, index, beam_defaults);
5330  }
5331 
5332  return index;
5333 }
5334 
5335 unsigned int RigSpawner::AddWheelRimBeam(RigDef::Wheel2 & wheel_2_def, node_t *node_1, node_t *node_2)
5336 {
5337  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5338 
5339  unsigned int beam_index = _SectionWheels2AddBeam(wheel_2_def, node_1, node_2);
5340  beam_t & beam = GetBeam(beam_index);
5341  beam.k = wheel_2_def.rim_springiness;
5342  beam.d = wheel_2_def.rim_damping;
5343  return beam_index;
5344 }
5345 
5346 unsigned int RigSpawner::AddTyreBeam(RigDef::Wheel2 & wheel_2_def, node_t *node_1, node_t *node_2)
5347 {
5348  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5349 
5350  unsigned int beam_index = _SectionWheels2AddBeam(wheel_2_def, node_1, node_2);
5351  beam_t & beam = GetBeam(beam_index);
5352  beam.k = wheel_2_def.tyre_springiness;
5353  beam.d = wheel_2_def.tyre_damping;
5354 
5355  m_rig->pressure_beams[m_rig->free_pressure_beam] = beam_index;
5356  m_rig->free_pressure_beam++;
5357 
5358  return beam_index;
5359 }
5360 
5361 unsigned int RigSpawner::_SectionWheels2AddBeam(RigDef::Wheel2 & wheel_2_def, node_t *node_1, node_t *node_2)
5362 {
5363  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5364 
5365  unsigned int index = m_rig->free_beam;
5366  beam_t & beam = GetFreeBeam();
5367  InitBeam(beam, node_1, node_2);
5368  beam.type = BEAM_INVISIBLE;
5369  SetBeamStrength(beam, wheel_2_def.beam_defaults->breaking_threshold);
5370  SetBeamDeformationThreshold(beam, wheel_2_def.beam_defaults);
5371  return index;
5372 }
5373 
5374 void RigSpawner::ProcessWheel2(RigDef::Wheel2 & def)
5375 {
5376  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5377 
5378  unsigned int node_base_index = m_rig->free_node;
5379  unsigned int wheel_index = AddWheel2(def);
5380  CreateWheelVisuals(wheel_index, def, node_base_index);
5381 };
5382 
5383 void RigSpawner::ProcessWheel(RigDef::Wheel & def)
5384 {
5385  AddWheel(def);
5386 };
5387 
5388 void RigSpawner::ProcessWheelDetacher(RigDef::WheelDetacher & def)
5389 {
5390  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5391 
5392  if (def.wheel_id > m_rig->free_wheel - 1)
5393  {
5394  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, std::string("Invalid wheel_id: ") + TOSTRING(def.wheel_id));
5395  return;
5396  }
5397 
5398  m_rig->wheels[def.wheel_id].detacher_group = def.detacher_group;
5399 };
5400 
5401 void RigSpawner::ProcessSlopeBrake(RigDef::SlopeBrake & def)
5402 {
5403  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5404 
5405  // #1: regulating_force
5406  float force = def.regulating_force;
5407  if (force < 0.f || force > 20.f)
5408  {
5409  std::stringstream msg;
5410  msg << "Clamping 'regulating_force' value '" << force << "' to allowed range <0 - 20>";
5411  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, msg.str());
5412  force = (force < 0.f) ? 0.f : 20.f;
5413  }
5414  m_rig->slopeBrakeFactor = force;
5415 
5416  // #2: attach_angle
5417  float attach_angle = def.attach_angle;
5418  if (attach_angle < 1.f || attach_angle > 45.f)
5419  {
5420  std::stringstream msg;
5421  msg << "Clamping 'attach_angle' value '" << force << "' to allowed range <1 - 45>";
5422  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, msg.str());
5423  attach_angle = (attach_angle < 1.f) ? 1.f : 45.f;
5424  }
5425  m_rig->slopeBrakeAttAngle = attach_angle;
5426 
5427  // #3: release_angle
5428  float release_angle = def.release_angle;
5429  if (release_angle < 1.f || release_angle > 45.f)
5430  {
5431  std::stringstream msg;
5432  msg << "Clamping 'release_angle' value '" << force << "' to allowed range <1 - 45>";
5433  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, msg.str());
5434  release_angle = (release_angle < 1.f) ? 1.f : 45.f;
5435  }
5436  m_rig->slopeBrakeRelAngle = release_angle + attach_angle;
5437 
5438  // Flag
5439  m_rig->has_slope_brake = true;
5440 };
5441 
5442 void RigSpawner::ProcessTractionControl(RigDef::TractionControl & def)
5443 {
5444  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5445 
5446  /* #1: regulating_force */
5447  float force = def.regulation_force;
5448  if (force < 0.f || force > 20.f)
5449  {
5450  std::stringstream msg;
5451  msg << "Clamping 'regulating_force' value '" << force << "' to allowed range <0 - 20>";
5452  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, msg.str());
5453  force = (force < 0.f) ? 0.f : 20.f;
5454  }
5455  m_rig->tc_ratio = force;
5456 
5457  /* #2: wheelslip */
5458  m_rig->tc_wheelslip = (def.wheel_slip < 0.f) ? 0.f : def.wheel_slip;
5459 
5460  /* #3: fade_speed */
5461  m_rig->tc_fade = (def.fade_speed < 0.1f) ? 0.1f : def.fade_speed;
5462 
5463  /* #4: pulse/sec */
5464  float pulse = def.pulse_per_sec;
5465  if (pulse <= 1.0f || pulse >= 2000.0f)
5466  {
5467  pulse = 2000.0f;
5468  }
5469  m_rig->tc_pulse_time = 1 / pulse;
5470 
5471  /* #4: mode */
5472  m_rig->tc_mode = static_cast<int>(def.attr_is_on);
5473  m_rig->tc_present = def.attr_is_on;
5474  m_rig->tc_notoggle = def.attr_no_toggle;
5475  if (def.attr_no_dashboard) { m_rig->tc_present = false; } // Override
5476 };
5477 
5478 void RigSpawner::ProcessAntiLockBrakes(RigDef::AntiLockBrakes & def)
5479 {
5480  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5481 
5482  /* #1: regulating_force */
5483  float force = def.regulation_force;
5484  if (force < 0.f || force > 20.f)
5485  {
5486  std::stringstream msg;
5487  msg << "Clamping 'regulating_force' value '" << force << "' to allowed range <0 - 20>";
5488  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INFO, msg.str());
5489  force = (force < 0.f) ? 0.f : 20.f;
5490  }
5491  m_rig->alb_ratio = force;
5492 
5493  /* #2: min_speed */
5494  /* Wheelspeed adaption: 60 sec * 60 mins / 1000(kilometer) = 3.6 to get meter per sec */
5495  float min_speed = def.min_speed / 3.6f;
5496  m_rig->alb_minspeed = std::max(0.5f, min_speed);
5497 
5498  /* #3: pulse_per_sec */
5499  float pulse = def.pulse_per_sec;
5500  if (pulse <= 1.0f || pulse >= 2000.0f)
5501  {
5502  pulse = 2000.0f;
5503  }
5504  m_rig->alb_pulse_time = 1 / pulse;
5505 
5506  /* #4: mode */
5507  m_rig->alb_mode = static_cast<int>(def.attr_is_on);
5508  m_rig->alb_present = def.attr_is_on;
5509  m_rig->alb_notoggle = def.attr_no_toggle;
5510  if (def.attr_no_dashboard) { m_rig->alb_present = false; } // Override
5511 }
5512 
5513 void RigSpawner::ProcessBrakes(RigDef::Brakes & def)
5514 {
5515  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5516 
5517  m_rig->brakeforce = def.default_braking_force;
5518  m_rig->hbrakeforce = 2.f * m_rig->brakeforce;
5519  if (def.parking_brake_force != -1.f)
5520  {
5521  m_rig->hbrakeforce = def.parking_brake_force;
5522  }
5523 };
5524 
5525 void RigSpawner::ProcessEngturbo(RigDef::Engturbo & def)
5526 {
5527  /* Is this a land vehicle? */
5528  if (m_rig->engine == nullptr)
5529  {
5530  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, "Section 'engturbo' found but no engine defined. Skipping ...");
5531  return;
5532  }
5533 
5534  /* Find it */
5535  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::Engturbo> engturbo;
5536  std::list<std::shared_ptr<RigDef::File::Module>>::iterator module_itor = m_selected_modules.begin();
5537  for (; module_itor != m_selected_modules.end(); module_itor++)
5538  {
5539  if (module_itor->get()->engturbo != nullptr)
5540  {
5541  engturbo = module_itor->get()->engturbo;
5542  }
5543  }
5544 
5545  /* Process it */
5546  m_rig->engine->setTurboOptions(engturbo->version, engturbo->tinertiaFactor, engturbo->nturbos, engturbo->param1, engturbo->param2, engturbo->param3, engturbo->param4, engturbo->param5, engturbo->param6, engturbo->param7, engturbo->param8, engturbo->param9, engturbo->param10, engturbo->param11);
5547 };
5548 
5549 void RigSpawner::ProcessEngoption(RigDef::Engoption & def)
5550 {
5551  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5552 
5553  /* Is this a land vehicle? */
5554  if (m_rig->engine == nullptr)
5555  {
5556  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, "Section 'engoption' found but no engine defined. Skipping ...");
5557  return;
5558  }
5559 
5560  /* Find it */
5561  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::Engoption> engoption;
5562  std::list<std::shared_ptr<RigDef::File::Module>>::iterator module_itor = m_selected_modules.begin();
5563  for (; module_itor != m_selected_modules.end(); module_itor++)
5564  {
5565  if (module_itor->get()->engoption != nullptr)
5566  {
5567  engoption = module_itor->get()->engoption;
5568  }
5569  }
5570 
5571  /* Process it */
5572  m_rig->engine->setOptions(
5573  engoption->inertia,
5574  engoption->type,
5575  engoption->clutch_force,
5576  engoption->shift_time,
5577  engoption->clutch_time,
5578  engoption->post_shift_time,
5579  engoption->idle_rpm,
5580  engoption->stall_rpm,
5581  engoption->max_idle_mixture,
5582  engoption->min_idle_mixture
5583  );
5584 };
5585 
5586 void RigSpawner::ProcessEngine(RigDef::Engine & def)
5587 {
5588  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5589 
5590  /* Process it */
5591  m_rig->driveable = TRUCK;
5592 
5593  /* Process gear list to BeamEngine-compatible format */
5594  /* TODO: Move this to BeamEngine::BeamEngine() */
5595  std::vector<float> gears_compat;
5596  gears_compat.reserve(2 + def.gear_ratios.size());
5597  gears_compat.push_back(def.reverse_gear_ratio);
5598  gears_compat.push_back(def.neutral_gear_ratio);
5599  std::vector<float>::iterator itor = def.gear_ratios.begin();
5600  for (; itor < def.gear_ratios.end(); itor++)
5601  {
5602  gears_compat.push_back(*itor);
5603  }
5604 
5605  m_rig->engine = new BeamEngine(
5606  def.shift_down_rpm,
5607  def.shift_up_rpm,
5608  def.torque,
5609  gears_compat,
5610  def.global_gear_ratio,
5611  m_rig
5612  );
5613 
5614  m_rig->engine->setAutoMode(App::GetSimGearboxMode());
5615 };
5616 
5617 void RigSpawner::ProcessHelp()
5618 {
5619  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5620 
5621  SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_HELP);
5622  unsigned int material_count = 0;
5623 
5624  std::list<std::shared_ptr<RigDef::File::Module>>::iterator module_itor = m_selected_modules.begin();
5625  for (; module_itor != m_selected_modules.end(); module_itor++)
5626  {
5627  auto module = module_itor->get();
5628  if (! module->help_panel_material_name.empty())
5629  {
5630  strncpy(m_rig->helpmat, module->help_panel_material_name.c_str(), sizeof(m_rig->helpmat) - 1);
5631  m_rig->hashelp = 1;
5632  material_count++;
5633  }
5634  }
5635 
5636  if (material_count > 1)
5637  {
5638  std::stringstream msg;
5639  msg << "Multiple (" << material_count << ") 'help' sections found. Using the last one...";
5640  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, msg.str());
5641  }
5642 
5643  SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_INVALID);
5644 };
5645 
5646 void RigSpawner::ProcessFileInfo()
5647 {
5648  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5649 
5650  if (m_file->file_info != nullptr)
5651  {
5652  // Do it the 0.3x way ... no error check!
5653  // NOTE: UniqueID was removed for being useless
5654  m_rig->categoryid = m_file->file_info->category_id;
5655  m_rig->truckversion = m_file->file_info->file_version;
5656  }
5657 }
5658 
5659 void RigSpawner::ProcessAuthors()
5660 {
5661  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5662 
5663  SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_FILEFORMATVERSION);
5664 
5665  std::vector<RigDef::Author>::iterator author_itor = m_file->authors.begin();
5666  for (; author_itor != m_file->authors.end(); author_itor++)
5667  {
5668  authorinfo_t author;
5669  author.type = author_itor->type;
5670  author.name = author_itor->name;
5671  author.email = author_itor->email;
5672  if (author_itor->_has_forum_account)
5673  {
5674  author.id = author_itor->forum_account_id;
5675  }
5676  m_rig->authors.push_back(author);
5677  }
5678 
5679  SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_INVALID);
5680 };
5681 
5682 unsigned int RigSpawner::GetNodeIndexOrThrow(RigDef::Node::Ref const & node_ref)
5683 {
5684  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5685 
5686  std::pair<unsigned int, bool> result = GetNodeIndex(node_ref);
5687  if (! result.second)
5688  {
5689  std::stringstream msg;
5690  msg << "Failed to retrieve required node: " << node_ref.ToString();
5691  throw Exception(msg.str());
5692  }
5693  return result.first;
5694 }
5695 
5696 node_t & RigSpawner::GetNodeOrThrow(RigDef::Node::Ref const & node_ref)
5697 {
5698  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5699 
5700  return m_rig->nodes[GetNodeIndexOrThrow(node_ref)];
5701 }
5702 
5703 void RigSpawner::ProcessCamera(RigDef::Camera & def)
5704 {
5705  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5706 
5707  /* Center node */
5708  if (def.center_node.IsValidAnyState())
5709  {
5710  m_rig->cameranodepos[m_rig->freecamera]
5711  = static_cast<int>(GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.center_node));
5712  }
5713  else
5714  {
5715  m_rig->cameranodepos[m_rig->freecamera] = -1;
5716  }
5717 
5718  /* Direction node */
5719  if (def.back_node.IsValidAnyState())
5720  {
5721  m_rig->cameranodedir[m_rig->freecamera]
5722  = static_cast<int>(GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.back_node));
5723  }
5724  else
5725  {
5726  m_rig->cameranodedir[m_rig->freecamera] = -1;
5727  }
5728 
5729  /* Roll node */
5730  if (def.left_node.IsValidAnyState())
5731  {
5732  m_rig->cameranoderoll[m_rig->freecamera]
5733  = static_cast<int>(GetNodeIndexOrThrow(def.left_node));
5734  }
5735  else
5736  {
5737  m_rig->cameranoderoll[m_rig->freecamera] = -1;
5738  }
5739 
5740  /* Advance */
5741  m_rig->freecamera++;
5742 };
5743 
5744 node_t* RigSpawner::GetBeamNodePointer(RigDef::Node::Ref const & node_ref)
5745 {
5746  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5747 
5748  node_t* node = GetNodePointer(node_ref);
5749  if (node != nullptr)
5750  {
5751  return node;
5752  }
5753  return nullptr;
5754 }
5755 
5756 void RigSpawner::ProcessBeam(RigDef::Beam & def)
5757 {
5758  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5759 
5760  // Nodes
5761  node_t* nodes[] = {nullptr, nullptr};
5762  nodes[0] = GetBeamNodePointer(def.nodes[0]);
5763  if (nodes[0] == nullptr)
5764  {
5765  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, std::string("Ignoring beam, could not find node: ") + def.nodes[0].ToString());
5766  return;
5767  }
5768  nodes[1] = GetBeamNodePointer(def.nodes[1]);
5769  if (nodes[1] == nullptr)
5770  {
5771  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, std::string("Ignoring beam, could not find node: ") + def.nodes[1].ToString());
5772  return;
5773  }
5774 
5775  // Beam
5776  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
5777  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(*nodes[0], *nodes[1], def.defaults, def.detacher_group);
5778  beam.type = BEAM_NORMAL;
5779  beam.k = def.defaults->GetScaledSpringiness();
5780  beam.d = def.defaults->GetScaledDamping();
5781  beam.bounded = NOSHOCK; // Orig: if (shortbound) ... hardcoded in BTS_BEAMS
5782 
5783  /* Calculate length */
5784  // orig = precompression hardcoded to 1
5785  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
5786 
5787  /* Strength */
5788  float beam_strength = def.defaults->GetScaledBreakingThreshold();
5789  beam.strength = beam_strength;
5790 
5791  /* Options */
5792  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Beam::OPTION_i_INVISIBLE))
5793  {
5794  beam.type = BEAM_INVISIBLE;
5795  }
5796  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Beam::OPTION_r_ROPE))
5797  {
5798  beam.bounded = ROPE;
5799  }
5800  if (BITMASK_IS_1(def.options, RigDef::Beam::OPTION_s_SUPPORT))
5801  {
5802  beam.bounded = SUPPORTBEAM;
5803  beam.longbound = def.extension_break_limit;
5804  }
5805 
5806  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.defaults);
5807 }
5808 
5809 void RigSpawner::SetBeamDeformationThreshold(beam_t & beam, std::shared_ptr<RigDef::BeamDefaults> beam_defaults)
5810 {
5811  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5812 
5813  /*
5814  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
5815  Old parser logic
5816  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
5817 
5818  VAR default_deform = BEAM_DEFORM (400,000)
5819  VAR default_deform_scale = 1
5820  VAR beam_creak = BEAM_CREAK_DEFAULT (100,000)
5821  VAR enable_advanced_deformation = false
5822 
5823 
5824  add_beam()
5825  IF default_deform < beam_creak
5826  default_deform = beam_creak
5827  END IF
5828 
5829  VAR beam;
5830  beam.default_deform = default_deform * default_deform_scale
5831  END
5832 
5833 
5834  enable_advanced_deformation:
5835  READ enable_advanced_deformation
5836 
5837 
5838  set_beam_defaults:
5839  READ default_deform
5840  VAR default_deform_user_defined
5841  READ default_deform_scale
5842  VAR plastic_coef_user_defined
5843 
5844  IF (!enable_advanced_deformation && default_deform < BEAM_DEFORM)
5845  default_deform = BEAM_DEFORM;
5846  END IF
5847 
5848  IF (plastic_coef_user_defined)
5849  beam_creak = 0
5850  END IF
5851 
5852  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
5853  TruckParser2013
5854  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
5855 
5856  VAR beam_defaults
5857  {
5858  default_deform = BEAM_DEFORM
5859  scale.default_deform = 1
5860  _enable_advanced_deformation = false
5861  _user_defined = false
5862  _default_deform_set = false
5863  _plastic_coef_user_defined = false
5864  }
5865 
5866 
5867  set_beam_defaults:
5868  READ beam_defaults
5869 
5870 
5871  add_beam:
5872 
5873  // Init
5874 
5875  VAR default_deform = BEAM_DEFORM;
5876  VAR beam_creak = BEAM_CREAK_DEFAULT;
5877 
5878  // Old 'set_beam_defaults'
5879 
5880  IF (beam_defaults._is_user_defined)
5881 
5882  default_deform = beam_defaults.default_deform
5883  IF (!beam_defaults._enable_advanced_deformation && default_deform < BEAM_DEFORM)
5884  default_deform = BEAM_DEFORM;
5885  END IF
5886 
5887  IF (beam_defaults._plastic_coef_user_defined && beam_defaults.plastic_coef >= 0)
5888  beam_creak = 0
5889  END IF
5890 
5891  END IF
5892 
5893  // Old 'add_beam'
5894 
5895  IF default_deform < beam_creak
5896  default_deform = beam_creak
5897  END IF
5898 
5899  VAR beam;
5900  beam.default_deform = default_deform * beam_defaults.scale.default_deform
5901 
5902  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
5903  */
5904 
5905  // Old init
5906  float default_deform = BEAM_DEFORM;
5907  float beam_creak = BEAM_CREAK_DEFAULT;
5908 
5909  // Old 'set_beam_defaults'
5910  if (beam_defaults->_is_user_defined)
5911  {
5912  default_deform = beam_defaults->deformation_threshold;
5913  if (!beam_defaults->_enable_advanced_deformation && default_deform < BEAM_DEFORM)
5914  {
5915  default_deform = BEAM_DEFORM;
5916  }
5917 
5918  if (beam_defaults->_is_plastic_deform_coef_user_defined && beam_defaults->plastic_deform_coef >= 0.f)
5919  {
5920  beam_creak = 0.f;
5921  }
5922  }
5923 
5924  // Old 'add_beam'
5925  if (default_deform < beam_creak)
5926  {
5927  default_deform = beam_creak;
5928  }
5929 
5930  float deformation_threshold = default_deform * beam_defaults->scale.deformation_threshold_constant;
5931 
5932  beam.minmaxposnegstress = deformation_threshold;
5933  beam.maxposstress = deformation_threshold;
5934  beam.maxnegstress = -(deformation_threshold);
5935 }
5936 
5937 void RigSpawner::CreateBeamVisuals(beam_t & beam, int beam_index, std::shared_ptr<RigDef::BeamDefaults> beam_defaults)
5938 {
5939  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5940 
5941  std::stringstream beam_name;
5942  beam_name << "beam-" << m_rig->truckname << "-" << beam_index;
5943  try
5944  {
5945  beam.mEntity = gEnv->sceneManager->createEntity(beam_name.str(), "beam.mesh");
5946  }
5947  catch (...)
5948  {
5949  throw Exception("Failed to load file 'beam.mesh' (should come with RoR installation)");
5950  }
5951  m_rig->deletion_Entities.push_back(beam.mEntity);
5952  beam.mSceneNode = m_rig->beamsRoot->createChildSceneNode();
5953  beam.mSceneNode->setScale(beam.diameter, -1, beam.diameter);
5954  if (beam.type == BEAM_HYDRO || beam.type == BEAM_MARKED)
5955  {
5956  beam.mEntity->setMaterialName("tracks/Chrome");
5957  }
5958  else
5959  {
5960  beam.mEntity->setMaterialName(beam_defaults->beam_material_name);
5961  }
5962 }
5963 
5964 void RigSpawner::CalculateBeamLength(beam_t & beam)
5965 {
5966  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5967 
5968  float beam_length = (beam.p1->RelPosition - beam.p2->RelPosition).length();
5969  beam.L = beam_length;
5970  beam.Lhydro = beam_length;
5971  beam.refL = beam_length;
5972 }
5973 
5974 void RigSpawner::InitBeam(beam_t & beam, node_t *node_1, node_t *node_2)
5975 {
5976  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5977 
5978  beam.p1 = node_1;
5979  beam.p2 = node_2;
5980 
5981  /* Length */
5982  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
5983 }
5984 
5985 void RigSpawner::AddMessage(RigSpawner::Message::Type type, Ogre::String const & text)
5986 {
5987  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
5988 
5989  /* Add message to report */
5990  m_messages.push_back(Message(type, text, m_current_keyword));
5991 
5992  /* Log message immediately (to put other log messages in context) */
5993  std::stringstream report;
5994  report << " == RigSpawner: ";
5995  switch (type)
5996  {
5997  case (RigSpawner::Message::TYPE_INTERNAL_ERROR):
5998  report << "INTERNAL ERROR";
5999  ++m_messages_num_errors;
6000  break;
6001 
6002  case (RigSpawner::Message::TYPE_ERROR):
6003  report << "ERROR";
6004  ++m_messages_num_errors;
6005  break;
6006 
6007  case (RigSpawner::Message::TYPE_WARNING):
6008  report << "WARNING";
6009  ++m_messages_num_warnings;
6010  break;
6011 
6012  default:
6013  report << "INFO";
6014  ++m_messages_num_other;
6015  break;
6016  }
6017  report << " (Keyword " << RigDef::File::KeywordToString(m_current_keyword) << ") " << text;
6018  Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(report.str());
6019 }
6020 
6021 std::pair<unsigned int, bool> RigSpawner::GetNodeIndex(RigDef::Node::Ref const & node_ref, bool quiet /* Default: false */)
6022 {
6023  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6024 
6025  if (!node_ref.IsValidAnyState())
6026  {
6027  if (! quiet)
6028  {
6029  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, std::string("Attempt to resolve invalid node reference: ") + node_ref.ToString());
6030  }
6031  return std::make_pair(0, false);
6032  }
6033  bool is_imported = node_ref.GetImportState_IsValid();
6034  bool is_named = (is_imported ? node_ref.GetImportState_IsResolvedNamed() : node_ref.GetRegularState_IsNamed());
6035  if (is_named)
6036  {
6037  auto result = m_named_nodes.find(node_ref.Str());
6038  if (result != m_named_nodes.end())
6039  {
6040  return std::make_pair(result->second, true);
6041  }
6042  else if (! quiet)
6043  {
6044  std::stringstream msg;
6045  msg << "Failed to resolve node-ref (node not found):" << node_ref.ToString();
6046  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
6047  }
6048  return std::make_pair(0, false);
6049  }
6050  else
6051  {
6052  // Imported nodes pass without check
6053  if (!is_imported && (node_ref.Num() >= static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_node)))
6054  {
6055  if (! quiet)
6056  {
6057  std::stringstream msg;
6058  msg << "Failed to resolve node-ref (node index too big, node count is: "<<m_rig->free_node<<"): " << node_ref.ToString();
6059  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
6060  }
6061  return std::make_pair(0, false);
6062  }
6063  return std::make_pair(node_ref.Num(), true);
6064  }
6065 }
6066 
6067 node_t* RigSpawner::GetNodePointer(RigDef::Node::Ref const & node_ref)
6068 {
6069  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6070 
6071  std::pair<unsigned int, bool> result = GetNodeIndex(node_ref);
6072  if (result.second)
6073  {
6074  return & m_rig->nodes[result.first];
6075  }
6076  else
6077  {
6078  return nullptr;
6079  }
6080 }
6081 
6082 node_t* RigSpawner::GetNodePointerOrThrow(RigDef::Node::Ref const & node_ref)
6083 {
6084  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6085 
6086  node_t *node = GetNodePointer(node_ref);
6087  if (node == nullptr)
6088  {
6089  std::stringstream msg;
6090  msg << "Required node not found: " << node_ref.ToString();
6091  throw Exception(msg.str());
6092  }
6093  return node;
6094 }
6095 
6096 std::pair<unsigned int, bool> RigSpawner::AddNode(RigDef::Node::Id & id)
6097 {
6098  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6099 
6100  if (!id.IsValid())
6101  {
6102  std::stringstream msg;
6103  msg << "Attempt to add node with 'INVALID' flag: " << id.ToString() << " (number of nodes at this point: " << m_rig->free_node << ")";
6104  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
6105  return std::make_pair(0, false);
6106  }
6107 
6108  if (id.IsTypeNamed())
6109  {
6110  unsigned int new_index = static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_node);
6111  auto insert_result = m_named_nodes.insert(std::make_pair(id.Str(), new_index));
6112  if (! insert_result.second)
6113  {
6114  std::stringstream msg;
6115  msg << "Ignoring named node! Duplicate name: " << id.Str() << " (number of nodes at this point: " << m_rig->free_node << ")";
6116  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
6117  return std::make_pair(0, false);
6118  }
6119  m_rig->free_node++;
6120  return std::make_pair(new_index, true);
6121  }
6122  if (id.IsTypeNumbered())
6123  {
6124  if (id.Num() < static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_node))
6125  {
6126  std::stringstream msg;
6127  msg << "Duplicate node number, previous definition will be overriden! - " << id.ToString() << " (number of nodes at this point: " << m_rig->free_node << ")";
6128  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, msg.str());
6129  }
6130  unsigned int new_index = static_cast<unsigned int>(m_rig->free_node);
6131  m_rig->free_node++;
6132  return std::make_pair(new_index, true);
6133  }
6134  // Invalid node ID without type flag!
6135  throw Exception("Invalid Node::Id without type flags!");
6136 }
6137 
6138 void RigSpawner::ProcessNode(RigDef::Node & def)
6139 {
6140  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6141 
6142  std::pair<unsigned int, bool> inserted_node = AddNode(def.id);
6143  if (! inserted_node.second)
6144  {
6145  return;
6146  }
6147 
6148  node_t & node = m_rig->nodes[inserted_node.first];
6149  node.pos = inserted_node.first; /* Node index */
6150  node.id = static_cast<int>(def.id.Num());
6151 
6152  /* Positioning */
6153  Ogre::Vector3 node_position = m_spawn_position + def.position;
6154  node.AbsPosition = node_position;
6155  node.RelPosition = node_position - m_rig->origin;
6156 
6157  node.wetstate = DRY; // orig = hardcoded (init_node)
6158  node.iswheel = NOWHEEL;
6159  node.wheelid = -1; // Hardcoded in orig (bts_nodes, call to init_node())
6160  node.friction_coef = def.node_defaults->friction;
6161  node.volume_coef = def.node_defaults->volume;
6162  node.surface_coef = def.node_defaults->surface;
6163  node.collisionBoundingBoxID = -1; // orig = hardcoded (init_node)
6164 
6165  /* Mass */
6166  if (def.node_defaults->load_weight >= 0.f) // The >= operator is in orig.
6167  {
6168  // orig = further override of hardcoded default.
6169  node.mass = def.node_defaults->load_weight;
6170  node.overrideMass = true;
6171  node.loadedMass = true;
6172  }
6173  else
6174  {
6175  node.mass = 10; // Hardcoded in original (bts_nodes, call to init_node())
6176  node.loadedMass = false;
6177  }
6178 
6179  /* Lockgroup */
6180  node.lockgroup = (m_file->lockgroup_default_nolock) ? RigDef::Lockgroup::LOCKGROUP_NOLOCK : RigDef::Lockgroup::LOCKGROUP_DEFAULT;
6181 
6182  /* Options */
6183  unsigned int options = def.options | def.node_defaults->options; /* Merge bit flags */
6184  if (BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_l_LOAD_WEIGHT))
6185  {
6186  node.loadedMass = true;
6187  if (def._has_load_weight_override)
6188  {
6189  node.overrideMass = true;
6190  node.mass = def.load_weight_override;
6191  }
6192  else
6193  {
6194  m_rig->masscount++;
6195  }
6196  }
6197  if (BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_e_TERRAIN_EDIT_POINT))
6198  {
6199  if(! m_rig->networking)
6200  {
6201  m_rig->editorId = node.pos;
6202  }
6203  }
6204  if (BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_h_HOOK_POINT))
6205  {
6206  /* Link [current-node] -> [node-0] */
6207  /* If current node is 0, link [node-0] -> [node-1] */
6208  node_t & node_2 = (node.pos == 0) ? GetNode(1) : GetNode(0);
6209  unsigned int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
6210 
6211  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(node, node_2, def.beam_defaults, def.detacher_group);
6212  SetBeamStrength(beam, def.beam_defaults->GetScaledBreakingThreshold() * 100.f);
6213  beam.type = BEAM_HYDRO;
6214  beam.d = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledDamping() * 0.1f;
6215  beam.k = def.beam_defaults->GetScaledSpringiness();
6216  beam.bounded = ROPE;
6217  beam.disabled = true;
6218  beam.L = HOOK_RANGE_DEFAULT;
6219  beam.Lhydro = HOOK_RANGE_DEFAULT;
6220  beam.refL = HOOK_RANGE_DEFAULT;
6221  beam.commandRatioShort = HOOK_SPEED_DEFAULT;
6222  beam.commandRatioLong = HOOK_SPEED_DEFAULT;
6223  beam.commandShort = 0.0f;
6224  beam.commandLong = 1.0f;
6225  beam.maxtiestress = HOOK_FORCE_DEFAULT;
6226  SetBeamDeformationThreshold(beam, def.beam_defaults);
6227  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
6228 
6229  // Logic cloned from SerializedRig.cpp, section BTS_NODES
6230  hook_t hook;
6231  hook.hookNode = & node;
6232  hook.group = -1;
6233  hook.locked = UNLOCKED;
6234  hook.lockNode = 0;
6235  hook.lockTruck = 0;
6236  hook.lockNodes = true;
6237  hook.lockgroup = -1;
6238  hook.beam = & beam;
6239  hook.maxforce = HOOK_FORCE_DEFAULT;
6240  hook.lockrange = HOOK_RANGE_DEFAULT;
6241  hook.lockspeed = HOOK_SPEED_DEFAULT;
6242  hook.selflock = false;
6243  hook.nodisable = false;
6244  hook.timer = 0.0f;
6245  hook.timer_preset = HOOK_LOCK_TIMER_DEFAULT;
6246  hook.autolock = false;
6247  m_rig->hooks.push_back(hook);
6248  }
6249  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(node, def, def.node_defaults);
6250  node.contactless = BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_c_NO_GROUND_CONTACT);
6251  node.disable_particles = BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_p_NO_PARTICLES);
6252  node.disable_sparks = BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_f_NO_SPARKS);
6253  node.no_mouse_grab = BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_m_NO_MOUSE_GRAB);
6254 
6255  m_rig->smokeRef = BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_y_EXHAUST_DIRECTION) ? node.pos : 0;
6256  m_rig->smokeId = BITMASK_IS_1(options, RigDef::Node::OPTION_x_EXHAUST_POINT) ? node.pos : 0;
6257 
6258  // Update "fusedrag" autocalc y & z span
6259  if (def.position.z < m_fuse_z_min) { m_fuse_z_min = def.position.z; }
6260  if (def.position.z > m_fuse_z_max) { m_fuse_z_max = def.position.z; }
6261  if (def.position.y < m_fuse_y_min) { m_fuse_y_min = def.position.y; }
6262  if (def.position.y > m_fuse_y_max) { m_fuse_y_max = def.position.y; }
6263 
6264 #ifdef DEBUG_TRUCKPARSER2013
6265  // DEBUG
6266  std::stringstream msg;
6267  msg<<"DBG ProcessNode() pos="<<node.pos<<", id="<<node.id << ", X=" << node.AbsPosition.x << ", Y=" << node.AbsPosition.y << ", Z=" << node.AbsPosition.z;
6268  LOG(msg.str());
6269  // END
6270 #endif
6271 }
6272 
6273 void RigSpawner::AddExhaust(
6274  unsigned int emitter_node_idx,
6275  unsigned int direction_node_idx,
6276  bool old_format,
6277  Ogre::String *user_material_name
6278  )
6279 {
6280  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6281 
6282  if (m_rig->disable_smoke)
6283  {
6284  return;
6285  }
6286  exhaust_t exhaust;
6287  exhaust.emitterNode = emitter_node_idx;
6288  exhaust.directionNode = direction_node_idx;
6289  exhaust.isOldFormat = old_format;
6290 
6291  Ogre::String material_name;
6292  if (user_material_name != nullptr)
6293  {
6294  material_name = *user_material_name;
6295  }
6296  else
6297  {
6298  material_name = "tracks/Smoke";
6299  }
6300 
6301  if (m_rig->usedSkin != nullptr)
6302  {
6303  auto search = m_rig->usedSkin->replace_materials.find(material_name);
6304  if (search != m_rig->usedSkin->replace_materials.end())
6305  {
6306  material_name = search->second;
6307  }
6308  }
6309 
6310  std::stringstream particle_sys_name;
6311  particle_sys_name << "exhaust-" << m_rig->exhausts.size() << "-" << m_rig->truckname;
6312  exhaust.smoker = gEnv->sceneManager->createParticleSystem(particle_sys_name.str(), material_name);
6313  if (exhaust.smoker == nullptr)
6314  {
6315  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_INTERNAL_ERROR, "Failed to create exhaust");
6316  return;
6317  }
6318  exhaust.smoker->setVisibilityFlags(DEPTHMAP_DISABLED); // Disable particles in depthmap
6319 
6320 
6321  exhaust.smokeNode = m_parent_scene_node->createChildSceneNode();
6322  exhaust.smokeNode->attachObject(exhaust.smoker);
6323  exhaust.smokeNode->setPosition(m_rig->nodes[exhaust.emitterNode].AbsPosition);
6324 
6325  m_rig->nodes[emitter_node_idx].isHot = true;
6326  m_rig->nodes[emitter_node_idx].isHot = true;
6327 
6328  m_rig->exhausts.push_back(exhaust);
6329 }
6330 
6331 bool RigSpawner::AddModule(Ogre::String const & module_name)
6332 {
6333  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6334 
6335  auto result = m_file->user_modules.find(module_name);
6336 
6337  if (result != m_file->user_modules.end())
6338  {
6339  m_selected_modules.push_back(result->second);
6340  LOG(" == RigSpawner: Module added to configuration: " + module_name);
6341  return true;
6342  }
6343  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, "Selected module not found: " + module_name);
6344  return false;
6345 }
6346 
6347 void RigSpawner::ProcessCinecam(RigDef::Cinecam & def)
6348 {
6349  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6350 
6351  // Node
6352  Ogre::Vector3 node_pos = m_spawn_position + def.position;
6353  node_t & camera_node = GetAndInitFreeNode(node_pos);
6354  camera_node.contactless = true; // Orig: hardcoded in BTS_CINECAM
6355  camera_node.wheelid = -1;
6356  camera_node.friction_coef = NODE_FRICTION_COEF_DEFAULT; // Node defaults are ignored here.
6357  camera_node.id = -1;
6358  AdjustNodeBuoyancy(camera_node, def.node_defaults);
6359  camera_node.volume_coef = def.node_defaults->volume;
6360  camera_node.surface_coef = def.node_defaults->surface;
6361  // NOTE: Not applying the 'node_mass' value here for backwards compatibility - this node must go through initial `Beam::calc_masses2()` pass with default weight.
6362 
6363  m_rig->cinecameranodepos[m_rig->freecinecamera] = camera_node.pos;
6364  m_rig->freecinecamera++;
6365 
6366  // Beams
6367  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
6368  {
6369  int beam_index = m_rig->free_beam;
6370  beam_t & beam = AddBeam(camera_node, GetNode(def.nodes[i]), def.beam_defaults, DEFAULT_DETACHER_GROUP);
6371  beam.type = BEAM_INVISIBLE;
6372  CalculateBeamLength(beam);
6373  beam.k = def.spring;
6374  beam.d = def.damping;
6375  CreateBeamVisuals(beam, beam_index, def.beam_defaults);
6376  }
6377 };
6378 
6379 void RigSpawner::InitNode(node_t & node, Ogre::Vector3 const & position)
6380 {
6381  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6382 
6383  /* Position */
6384  node.AbsPosition = position;
6385  node.RelPosition = position - m_rig->origin;
6386 
6387  /* Misc. */
6388  node.collisionBoundingBoxID = -1; // orig = hardcoded (init_node)
6389  node.wetstate = DRY; // orig = hardcoded (init_node)
6390 }
6391 
6392 void RigSpawner::InitNode(
6393  node_t & node,
6394  Ogre::Vector3 const & position,
6395  std::shared_ptr<RigDef::NodeDefaults> node_defaults
6396 )
6397 {
6398  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6399 
6400  InitNode(node, position);
6401  node.friction_coef = node_defaults->friction;
6402  node.volume_coef = node_defaults->volume;
6403  node.surface_coef = node_defaults->surface;
6404 }
6405 
6406 void RigSpawner::ProcessGlobals(RigDef::Globals & def)
6407 {
6408  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6409 
6410  m_rig->truckmass = def.dry_mass;
6411  m_rig->loadmass = def.cargo_mass;
6412 
6413  // NOTE: Don't do any material pre-processing here; it'll be done on actual entities (via `SetupNewEntity()`).
6414  if (! def.material_name.empty())
6415  {
6416  Ogre::MaterialPtr mat = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName(def.material_name); // Check if exists (compatibility)
6417  if (!mat.isNull())
6418  {
6419  m_cab_material_name = def.material_name;
6420  }
6421  else
6422  {
6423  std::stringstream msg;
6424  msg << "Material '" << def.material_name << "' defined in section 'globals' not found. Trying material 'tracks/transred'";
6425  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
6426 
6427  m_cab_material_name = "tracks/transred";
6428  }
6429  }
6430 }
6431 
6432 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
6433 /* Limits.
6434 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
6435 
6436 bool RigSpawner::CheckHydroLimit(unsigned int count)
6437 {
6438  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6439 
6440  if ((m_rig->free_shock + count) > MAX_HYDROS)
6441  {
6442  std::stringstream msg;
6443  msg << "Hydro limit (" << MAX_HYDROS << ") exceeded";
6444  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
6445  return false;
6446  }
6447  return true;
6448 }
6449

6454  if ((m_rig->free_cparticle + count) > MAX_CPARTICLES)
6455  {
6456  std::stringstream msg;
6457  msg << "Particle limit (" << MAX_CPARTICLES << ") exceeded";
6458  AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
6459  return false;
6460  }
6461  return true;
6462 }

6544  LOG(msg.str());
6545  return false;
6546  }
6547  return true;
6548 }

6635 node_t &RigSpawner:: GetNode(unsigned int node_index)
6636 {
6637  return m_rig->nodes[node_index];
6638 }

6640 void RigSpawner::InitNode(unsigned int node_index, Ogre::Vector3 const & position)
6641 {
