6643 
6644  InitNode(m_rig->nodes[node_index], position);
6645 }
6646 
6647 beam_t & RigSpawner::GetBeam(unsigned int index)
6648 {
6649  return m_rig->beams[index];
6650 }
6651 
6652 node_t & RigSpawner::GetFreeNode()
6653 {
6654  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6655 
6656  node_t & node = m_rig->nodes[m_rig->free_node];
6657  node.pos = m_rig->free_node;
6658  m_rig->free_node++;
6659  return node;
6660 }
6661 
6662 beam_t & RigSpawner::GetFreeBeam()
6663 {
6664  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6665 
6666  beam_t & beam = m_rig->beams[m_rig->free_beam];
6667  m_rig->free_beam++;
6668  return beam;
6669 }
6670 
6671 shock_t & RigSpawner::GetFreeShock()
6672 {
6673  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6674 
6675  shock_t & shock = m_rig->shocks[m_rig->free_shock];
6676  m_rig->free_shock++;
6677  return shock;
6678 }
6679 
6680 beam_t & RigSpawner::GetAndInitFreeBeam(node_t & node_1, node_t & node_2)
6681 {
6682  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6683 
6684  beam_t & beam = GetFreeBeam();
6685  beam.p1 = & node_1;
6686  beam.p2 = & node_2;
6687  return beam;
6688 }
6689 
6690 node_t & RigSpawner::GetAndInitFreeNode(Ogre::Vector3 const & position)
6691 {
6692  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6693 
6694  node_t & node = GetFreeNode();
6695  InitNode(node, position);
6696  return node;
6697 }
6698 
6699 void RigSpawner::SetBeamSpring(beam_t & beam, float spring)
6700 {
6701  beam.k = spring;
6702 }
6703 
6704 void RigSpawner::SetBeamDamping(beam_t & beam, float damping)
6705 {
6706  beam.d = damping;
6707 }
6708 
6709 void RigSpawner::RecalculateBoundingBoxes(rig_t *rig)
6710 {
6711  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6712 
6713  Ogre::Vector3 node_0_pos = rig->nodes[0].AbsPosition;
6714  rig->boundingBox.setExtents(
6715  node_0_pos.x, node_0_pos.y, node_0_pos.z,
6716  node_0_pos.x, node_0_pos.y, node_0_pos.z
6717  );
6718  rig->collisionBoundingBoxes.clear();
6719 
6720  for (int i=0; i < rig->free_node; i++)
6721  {
6722  node_t & node = rig->nodes[i];
6723  Ogre::Vector3 node_position = node.AbsPosition;
6724  rig->boundingBox.merge(node_position);
6725  if (node.collisionBoundingBoxID >= 0)
6726  {
6727  if ((unsigned int) node.collisionBoundingBoxID >= rig->collisionBoundingBoxes.size())
6728  {
6729  rig->collisionBoundingBoxes.push_back(
6730  Ogre::AxisAlignedBox(
6731  node_position.x, node_position.y, node_position.z,
6732  node_position.x, node_position.y, node_position.z
6733  )
6734  );
6735  }
6736  else
6737  {
6738  rig->collisionBoundingBoxes[node.collisionBoundingBoxID].merge(node_position);
6739  }
6740  }
6741  }
6742 
6743  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rig->collisionBoundingBoxes.size(); i++)
6744  {
6745  rig->collisionBoundingBoxes[i].setMinimum(rig->collisionBoundingBoxes[i].getMinimum() - Ogre::Vector3(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f));
6746  rig->collisionBoundingBoxes[i].setMaximum(rig->collisionBoundingBoxes[i].getMaximum() + Ogre::Vector3(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f));
6747  }
6748 
6749  rig->boundingBox.setMinimum(rig->boundingBox.getMinimum() - Ogre::Vector3(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f));
6750  rig->boundingBox.setMaximum(rig->boundingBox.getMaximum() + Ogre::Vector3(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f));
6751 
6752  rig->predictedBoundingBox = rig->boundingBox;
6753  rig->predictedCollisionBoundingBoxes = rig->collisionBoundingBoxes;
6754 }
6755 
6756 
6757 void RigSpawner::SetupDefaultSoundSources(Beam *vehicle)
6758 {
6759  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6760 
6761  int trucknum = vehicle->trucknum;
6762  int smokeId = vehicle->smokeId;
6763 
6764 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
6765  if (SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().isDisabled())
6766  {
6767  return;
6768  }
6769 
6770  //engine
6771  if (vehicle->engine != nullptr) /* Land vehicle */
6772  {
6773  if (vehicle->engine->type=='t')
6774  {
6775  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_diesel", smokeId);
6776  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_force", smokeId);
6777  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_brakes", 0);
6778  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_parkbrakes", 0);
6779  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_reverse_beep", 0);
6780  }
6781  if (vehicle->engine->type=='c')
6782  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_car", smokeId);
6783  if (vehicle->engine->hasTurbo())
6784  {
6785  if (vehicle->engine->turboInertiaFactor >= 3)
6786  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbo_big", smokeId);
6787  else if (vehicle->engine->turboInertiaFactor <= 0.5)
6788  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbo_small", smokeId);
6789  else
6790  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbo_mid", smokeId);
6791 
6792  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbo_bov", smokeId);
6793  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_wastegate_flutter", smokeId);
6794  }
6795 
6796  if (vehicle->engine->hasair)
6797  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_air_purge", 0);
6798  //starter
6799  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_starter", 0);
6800  // turn signals
6801  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turn_signal", 0);
6802  }
6803  if (vehicle->driveable==TRUCK)
6804  {
6805  //horn
6806  if (vehicle->ispolice)
6807  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_police", 0);
6808  else
6809  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_horn", 0);
6810  //shift
6811  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_shift", 0);
6812  }
6813  //pump
6814  if (vehicle->hascommands)
6815  {
6816  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_pump", 0);
6817  }
6818  //antilock brake
6819  if (vehicle->alb_present)
6820  {
6821  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_antilock", 0);
6822  }
6823  //tractioncontrol
6824  if (vehicle->tc_present)
6825  {
6826  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_tractioncontrol", 0);
6827  }
6828  //screetch
6829  if ((vehicle->driveable==TRUCK || vehicle->driveable==AIRPLANE) && vehicle->free_wheel != 0)
6830  {
6831  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_screetch", 0);
6832  }
6833  //break & creak
6834  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_break", 0);
6835  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_creak", 0);
6836  //boat engine
6837  if (vehicle->driveable==BOAT)
6838  {
6839  if (vehicle->totalmass>50000.0)
6840  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_marine_large", smokeId);
6841  else
6842  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_marine_small", smokeId);
6843  //no start/stop engine for boats, so set sound always on!
6844  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStart(trucknum, SS_TRIG_ENGINE);
6845  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_ENGINE, 0.5);
6846  }
6847  //airplane warnings
6848  if (vehicle->driveable==AIRPLANE)
6849  {
6850  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_10", 0);
6851  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_20", 0);
6852  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_30", 0);
6853  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_40", 0);
6854  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_50", 0);
6855  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_100", 0);
6856 
6857  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_pullup", 0);
6858  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_minimums", 0);
6859  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_gpws_apdisconnect", 0);
6860  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aoa_warning", 0);
6861 
6862  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat01", 0);
6863  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat02", 0);
6864  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat03", 0);
6865  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat04", 0);
6866  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat05", 0);
6867  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat06", 0);
6868  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat07", 0);
6869  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat08", 0);
6870  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat09", 0);
6871  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat10", 0);
6872  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat11", 0);
6873  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat12", 0);
6874  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_aivionic_chat13", 0);
6875  }
6876  //airplane engines
6877  for (int i=0; i<vehicle->free_aeroengine && i<8; i++)
6878  {
6879  int turbojet_node = vehicle->aeroengines[i]->getNoderef();
6880  Ogre::String index_str = TOSTRING(i+1);
6881 
6882  if (vehicle->aeroengines[i]->getType()==AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOJET)
6883  {
6884  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbojet_start" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6885  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbojet_lopower" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6886  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbojet_hipower" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6887  if (((Turbojet*)(vehicle->aeroengines[i]))->afterburnable)
6888  {
6889  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turbojet_afterburner" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6890  }
6891  }
6892  else if (vehicle->aeroengines[i]->getType()==AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOPROP)
6893  {
6894  if (((Turboprop*)vehicle->aeroengines[i])->is_piston)
6895  {
6896  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_pistonprop_start" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6897  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_pistonprop_lopower" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6898  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_pistonprop_hipower" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6899  }
6900  else
6901  {
6902  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turboprop_start" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6903  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turboprop_lopower" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6904  AddSoundSourceInstance(vehicle, "tracks/default_turboprop_hipower" + index_str, turbojet_node);
6905  }
6906  }
6907  }
6908 
6909  // linked sounds
6910  for (int i=0; i<vehicle->free_commands; i++)
6911  {
6912  AddSoundSource(vehicle, SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().createInstance(Ogre::String("tracks/linked/default_command/extend"), trucknum, NULL, SL_COMMAND, i), 0);
6913  AddSoundSource(vehicle, SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().createInstance(Ogre::String("tracks/linked/default_command/retract"), trucknum, NULL, SL_COMMAND, -i), 0);
6914  }
6915 
6916 #endif //OPENAL
6917 }
6918 
6919 void RigSpawner::UpdateCollcabContacterNodes()
6920 {
6921  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6922 
6923  for (int i=0; i<m_rig->free_collcab; i++)
6924  {
6925  int tmpv = m_rig->collcabs[i] * 3;
6926  m_rig->nodes[m_rig->cabs[tmpv]].contacter = true;
6927  m_rig->nodes[m_rig->cabs[tmpv+1]].contacter = true;
6928  m_rig->nodes[m_rig->cabs[tmpv+2]].contacter = true;
6929  }
6930 }
6931 
6932 std::string RigSpawner::ProcessMessagesToString()
6933 {
6934  SPAWNER_PROFILE_SCOPED();
6935 
6936  std::stringstream report;
6937 
6938  auto itor = m_messages.begin();
6939  auto end = m_messages.end();
6940  for (; itor != end; ++itor)
6941  {
6942  switch (itor->type)
6943  {
6944  case (Message::TYPE_INTERNAL_ERROR):
6945  report << "#FF3300 INTERNAL ERROR #FFFFFF";
6946  break;
6947 
6948  case (Message::TYPE_ERROR):
6949  report << "#FF3300 ERROR #FFFFFF";
6950  break;
6951 
6952  case (Message::TYPE_WARNING):
6953  report << "#FFFF00 WARNING #FFFFFF";
6954  break;
6955 
6956  default:
6957  report << "INFO";
6958  break;
6959  }
6960  report << "(Keyword " << RigDef::File::KeywordToString(itor->keyword) << ")" << std::endl;
6961  report << "\t" << itor->text << std::endl;
6962  }
6963  return report.str();
6964 }
6965 
6966 RigDef::MaterialFlareBinding* RigSpawner::FindFlareBindingForMaterial(std::string const & material_name)
6967 {
6968  for (auto& module: m_selected_modules)
6969  {
6970  for (auto& def: module->material_flare_bindings)
6971  {
6972  if (def.material_name == material_name)
6973  {
6974  return &def;
6975  }
6976  }
6977  }
6978  return nullptr;
6979 }
6980 
6981 RigDef::VideoCamera* RigSpawner::FindVideoCameraByMaterial(std::string const & material_name)
6982 {
6983  for (auto& module: m_selected_modules)
6984  {
6985  for (auto& def: module->videocameras)
6986  {
6987  if (def.material_name == material_name)
6988  {
6989  return &def;
6990  }
6991  }
6992  }
6993 
6994  return nullptr;
6995 }
6996 
6997 Ogre::MaterialPtr RigSpawner::FindOrCreateCustomizedMaterial(std::string mat_lookup_name)
6998 {
6999  try
7000  {
7001  // Check for existing substitute
7002  auto lookup_res = m_material_substitutions.find(mat_lookup_name);
7003  if (lookup_res != m_material_substitutions.end())
7004  {
7005  return lookup_res->second.material;
7006  }
7007 
7008  CustomMaterial lookup_entry;
7009 
7010  // Query old-style mirrors (=special props, hardcoded material name 'mirror')
7011  if (mat_lookup_name == "mirror")
7012  {
7013  lookup_entry.mirror_prop_type = m_curr_mirror_prop_type;
7014  lookup_entry.mirror_prop_scenenode = m_curr_mirror_prop_scenenode;
7015  lookup_entry.material_flare_def = nullptr;
7016  static int mirror_counter = 0;
7017  const std::string new_mat_name = this->ComposeName("RenderMaterial", mirror_counter);
7018  ++mirror_counter;
7019  lookup_entry.material = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName("mirror")->clone(new_mat_name, true, m_custom_resource_group);
7020  // Special case - register under generated name. This is because all mirrors use the same material 'mirror'
7021  m_material_substitutions.insert(std::make_pair(new_mat_name, lookup_entry));
7022  return lookup_entry.material; // Done!
7023  }
7024 
7025  // Query 'videocameras'
7026  RigDef::VideoCamera* videocam_def = this->FindVideoCameraByMaterial(mat_lookup_name);
7027  if (videocam_def != nullptr)
7028  {
7029  Ogre::MaterialPtr video_mat_shared = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName(mat_lookup_name);
7030  if (!video_mat_shared.isNull())
7031  {
7032  lookup_entry.video_camera_def = videocam_def;
7033  const std::string video_mat_name = this->ComposeName(videocam_def->material_name.c_str(), 0);
7034  lookup_entry.material = video_mat_shared->clone(video_mat_name, true, m_custom_resource_group);
7035  m_material_substitutions.insert(std::make_pair(mat_lookup_name, lookup_entry));
7036  return lookup_entry.material; // Done!
7037  }
7038  else
7039  {
7040  std::stringstream msg;
7041  msg << "VideoCamera material '" << mat_lookup_name << "' not found! Ignoring videocamera.";
7042  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_WARNING, msg.str());
7043  }
7044  }
7045 
7046  // Resolve 'materialflarebindings'.
7047  RigDef::MaterialFlareBinding* mat_flare_def = this->FindFlareBindingForMaterial(mat_lookup_name);
7048  if (mat_flare_def != nullptr)
7049  {
7050  lookup_entry.material_flare_def = mat_flare_def;
7051  }
7052 
7053  // Query SkinZip materials
7054  if (m_rig->usedSkin != nullptr)
7055  {
7056  auto skin_res = m_rig->usedSkin->replace_materials.find(mat_lookup_name);
7057  if (skin_res != m_rig->usedSkin->replace_materials.end())
7058  {
7059  Ogre::MaterialPtr skin_mat = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName(skin_res->second);
7060  if (!skin_mat.isNull())
7061  {
7062  std::stringstream name_buf;
7063  name_buf << videocam_def->material_name << ACTOR_ID_TOKEN << m_rig->trucknum;
7064  lookup_entry.material = skin_mat->clone(name_buf.str(), true, m_custom_resource_group);
7065  m_material_substitutions.insert(std::make_pair(mat_lookup_name, lookup_entry));
7066  return lookup_entry.material;
7067  }
7068  else
7069  {
7070  std::stringstream buf;
7071  buf << "Material '" << skin_res->second << "' from skin '" << m_rig->usedSkin->name << "' not found! Ignoring it...";
7072  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, buf.str());
7073  }
7074  }
7075  }
7076 
7077  // Acquire substitute - either use managedmaterial or generate new by cloning.
7078  auto mmat_res = m_managed_materials.find(mat_lookup_name);
7079  if (mmat_res != m_managed_materials.end())
7080  {
7081  // Use managedmaterial as substitute
7082  lookup_entry.material = mmat_res->second;
7083  }
7084  else
7085  {
7086  // Generate new substitute
7087  Ogre::MaterialPtr orig_mat = RoR::OgreSubsystem::GetMaterialByName(mat_lookup_name);
7088  if (orig_mat.isNull())
7089  {
7090  std::stringstream buf;
7091  buf << "Material doesn't exist:" << mat_lookup_name;
7092  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, buf.str());
7093  return Ogre::MaterialPtr(); // NULL
7094  }
7095 
7096  std::stringstream name_buf;
7097  name_buf << orig_mat->getName() << ACTOR_ID_TOKEN << m_rig->trucknum;
7098  lookup_entry.material = orig_mat->clone(name_buf.str(), true, m_custom_resource_group);
7099  }
7100 
7101  // Finally, query SkinZip textures
7102  if (m_rig->usedSkin != nullptr)
7103  {
7104  RoR::SkinManager::ReplaceMaterialTextures(m_rig->usedSkin, lookup_entry.material->getName());
7105  }
7106 
7107  m_material_substitutions.insert(std::make_pair(mat_lookup_name, lookup_entry)); // Register the substitute
7108  return lookup_entry.material;
7109  }
7110  catch (Ogre::Exception& e)
7111  {
7112  std::stringstream msg;
7113  msg << "Exception while customizing material \"" << mat_lookup_name << "\", message: " << e.getFullDescription();
7114  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, msg.str());
7115  }
7116  return Ogre::MaterialPtr(); // NULL
7117 }
7118 
7119 Ogre::MaterialPtr RigSpawner::CreateSimpleMaterial(Ogre::ColourValue color)
7120 {
7121  assert(!m_simple_material_base.isNull());
7122 
7123  static size_t simple_mat_counter = 0;
7124  char name_buf[300];
7125  snprintf(name_buf, 300, "SimpleMaterial-%u%s%d", simple_mat_counter, ACTOR_ID_TOKEN, m_rig->trucknum);
7126  Ogre::MaterialPtr newmat = m_simple_material_base->clone(name_buf);
7127  ++simple_mat_counter;
7128  newmat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setAmbient(color);
7129 
7130  return newmat;
7131 }
7132 
7133 void RigSpawner::SetupNewEntity(Ogre::Entity* ent, Ogre::ColourValue simple_color)
7134 {
7135  // Use simple materials if applicable
7136  if (m_apply_simple_materials)
7137  {
7138  Ogre::MaterialPtr mat = this->CreateSimpleMaterial(simple_color);
7139 
7140  const unsigned short num_sub_entities = ent->getNumSubEntities();
7141  for (unsigned short i = 0; i < num_sub_entities; i++)
7142  {
7143  Ogre::SubEntity* subent = ent->getSubEntity(i);
7144  subent->setMaterial(mat);
7145  }
7146 
7147  return; // Done!
7148  }
7149 
7150  // Create unique sub-entity (=instance of submesh) materials
7151  unsigned short subent_max = ent->getNumSubEntities();
7152  for (unsigned short i = 0; i < subent_max; ++i)
7153  {
7154  Ogre::SubEntity* subent = ent->getSubEntity(i);
7155 
7156  if (!subent->getMaterial().isNull())
7157  {
7158  Ogre::MaterialPtr own_mat = this->FindOrCreateCustomizedMaterial(subent->getMaterialName());
7159  if (!own_mat.isNull())
7160  {
7161  subent->setMaterial(own_mat);
7162  }
7163  }
7164  }
7165 }
7166 
7167 void RigSpawner::FinalizeGfxSetup()
7168 {
7169  // Check and warn if there are unclaimed managed materials
7170  // TODO &*&*
7171 
7172  // Create the actor
7173  m_rig->m_gfx_actor = std::unique_ptr<RoR::GfxActor>(new RoR::GfxActor(m_rig, m_custom_resource_group));
7174 
7175  // Process special materials
7176  for (auto& entry: m_material_substitutions)
7177  {
7178  if (entry.second.material_flare_def != nullptr) // 'materialflarebindings'
7179  {
7180  m_rig->m_gfx_actor->AddMaterialFlare(
7181  entry.second.material_flare_def->flare_number, entry.second.material);
7182  }
7183  else if (entry.second.mirror_prop_type != CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_NONE) // special 'prop' - rear view mirror
7184  {
7185  this->CreateMirrorPropVideoCam(
7186  entry.second.material, entry.second.mirror_prop_type, entry.second.mirror_prop_scenenode);
7187  }
7188  else if (entry.second.video_camera_def != nullptr) // 'videocameras'
7189  {
7190  this->SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_VIDEOCAMERA); // Logging
7191  this->CreateVideoCamera(entry.second.video_camera_def);
7192  this->SetCurrentKeyword(RigDef::File::KEYWORD_INVALID); // Logging
7193  }
7194  }
7195 
7196  if (!App::GetGfxEnableVideocams())
7197  {
7198  m_rig->m_gfx_actor->SetVideoCamState(GfxActor::VideoCamState::VCSTATE_DISABLED);
7199  }
7200 
7201  // Process "emissive cab" materials
7202  if (m_rig->cabEntity != nullptr)
7203  {
7204  auto search_itor = m_material_substitutions.find(m_cab_material_name);
7205  m_rig->m_gfx_actor->RegisterCabMaterial(search_itor->second.material, m_cab_trans_material);
7206  m_rig->m_gfx_actor->SetCabLightsActive(false); // Reset emissive lights to "off" state
7207  }
7208 }
7209 
7210 Ogre::ManualObject* CreateVideocameraDebugMesh()
7211 {
7212  // Create material
7213  static size_t counter = 0;
7214  Ogre::MaterialPtr mat = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().create(
7215  "VideoCamDebugMat-" + TOSTRING(counter), Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME);
7216  ++counter;
7217  mat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->createTextureUnitState();
7218  mat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureFiltering(Ogre::TFO_ANISOTROPIC);
7219  mat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureAnisotropy(3);
7220  mat->setLightingEnabled(false);
7221  mat->setReceiveShadows(false);
7222  // Create mesh
7223  Ogre::ManualObject* mo = gEnv->sceneManager->createManualObject(); // TODO: Eliminate gEnv
7224  mo->begin(mat->getName(), Ogre::RenderOperation::OT_LINE_LIST);
7225  Ogre::ColourValue pos_mark_col(1.f, 0.82f, 0.26f);
7226  Ogre::ColourValue dir_mark_col(0.f, 1.f, 1.f); // TODO: This comes out green in simulation - why? ~ only_a_ptr, 05/2017
7227  const float pos_mark_len = 0.8f;
7228  const float dir_mark_len = 4.f;
7229  // X
7230  mo->position(pos_mark_len,0,0);
7231  mo->colour(pos_mark_col);
7232  mo->position(-pos_mark_len,0,0);
7233  mo->colour(pos_mark_col);
7234  // Y
7235  mo->position(0,pos_mark_len,0);
7236  mo->colour(pos_mark_col);
7237  mo->position(0,-pos_mark_len,0);
7238  mo->colour(pos_mark_col);
7239  // +Z
7240  mo->position(0,0,pos_mark_len);
7241  mo->colour(pos_mark_col);
7242  mo->position(0,0,0);
7243  mo->colour(pos_mark_col);
7244  // -Z = the direction
7245  mo->position(0,0,-dir_mark_len);
7246  mo->colour(dir_mark_col);
7247  mo->position(0,0,0);
7248  mo->colour(dir_mark_col);
7249  mo->end(); // Don't forget this!
7250 
7251  return mo;
7252 }
7253 
7254 void RigSpawner::CreateVideoCamera(RigDef::VideoCamera* def)
7255 {
7256  try
7257  {
7258  GfxActor::VideoCamera vcam;
7259 
7260  vcam.vcam_material = this->FindOrCreateCustomizedMaterial(def->material_name);
7261  if (vcam.vcam_material.isNull())
7262  {
7263  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Failed to create VideoCamera with material: " + def->material_name);
7264  return;
7265  }
7266 
7267  switch (def->camera_role)
7268  {
7269  case -1: vcam.vcam_type = GfxActor::VideoCamType::VCTYPE_VIDEOCAM; break;
7270  case 0: vcam.vcam_type = GfxActor::VideoCamType::VCTYPE_TRACKING_VIDEOCAM; break;
7271  case 1: vcam.vcam_type = GfxActor::VideoCamType::VCTYPE_MIRROR; break;
7272  default:
7273  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "VideoCamera (mat: " + def->material_name + ") has invalid 'role': " + TOSTRING(def->camera_role));
7274  return;
7275  }
7276 
7277  vcam.vcam_node_center = &this->GetNodeOrThrow(def->reference_node);
7278  vcam.vcam_node_dir_y = &this->GetNodeOrThrow(def->bottom_node);
7279  vcam.vcam_node_dir_z = &this->GetNodeOrThrow(def->left_node);
7280  vcam.vcam_pos_offset = def->offset;
7281 
7282  //rotate camera picture 180 degrees, skip for mirrors
7283  float rotation_z = (def->camera_role != 1) ? def->rotation.z + 180 : def->rotation.z;
7284  vcam.vcam_rotation
7285  = Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(rotation_z), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Z)
7286  * Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def->rotation.y), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y)
7287  * Ogre::Quaternion(Ogre::Degree(def->rotation.x), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_X);
7288 
7289  // set alternative camposition (optional)
7290  vcam.vcam_node_alt_pos = &this->GetNodeOrThrow(
7291  def->alt_reference_node.IsValidAnyState() ? def->alt_reference_node : def->reference_node);
7292 
7293  // set alternative lookat position (optional)
7294  vcam.vcam_node_lookat = nullptr;
7295  if (def->alt_orientation_node.IsValidAnyState())
7296  {
7297  // This is a tracker camera
7298  vcam.vcam_type = GfxActor::VideoCamType::VCTYPE_TRACKING_VIDEOCAM;
7299  vcam.vcam_node_lookat = &this->GetNodeOrThrow(def->alt_orientation_node);
7300  }
7301 
7302  // TODO: Eliminate gEnv
7303  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera = gEnv->sceneManager->createCamera(vcam.vcam_material->getName() + "_camera");
7304 
7305  bool useExternalMirrorWindow = BSETTING("UseVideocameraWindows", false);
7306  bool fullscreenRW = BSETTING("VideoCameraFullscreen", false);
7307 
7308  // check if this vidcamera is also affected
7309  static int counter = 0;
7310  if (useExternalMirrorWindow && fullscreenRW)
7311  {
7312  int monitor = ISETTING("VideoCameraMonitor_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0);
7313  if (monitor < 0)
7314  useExternalMirrorWindow = false;
7315  // < 0 = fallback to texture
7316  }
7317 
7318  if (!useExternalMirrorWindow)
7319  {
7320  vcam.vcam_render_tex = Ogre::TextureManager::getSingleton().createManual(
7321  vcam.vcam_material->getName() + "_texture",
7322  Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME,
7323  Ogre::TEX_TYPE_2D,
7324  def->texture_width,
7325  def->texture_height,
7326  0, // no mip maps
7327  Ogre::PF_R8G8B8,
7328  Ogre::TU_RENDERTARGET);
7329  vcam.vcam_render_target = vcam.vcam_render_tex->getBuffer()->getRenderTarget();
7330  vcam.vcam_render_target->setAutoUpdated(false);
7331  }
7332  else
7333  {
7334  Ogre::NameValuePairList misc;
7335  if (!SSETTING("VideoCameraFSAA", "").empty())
7336  misc["FSAA"] = SSETTING("VideoCameraFSAA", "");
7337 
7338  if (!SSETTING("VideoCameraColourDepth", "").empty())
7339  misc["colourDepth"] = SSETTING("VideoCameraColourDepth", "");
7340  else
7341  misc["colourDepth"] = "32";
7342 
7343  if (ISETTING("VideoCameraLeft_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0) > 0)
7344  misc["left"] = SSETTING("VideoCameraLeft_" + TOSTRING(counter), "");
7345 
7346  if (ISETTING("VideoCameraTop_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0) > 0)
7347  misc["top"] = SSETTING("VideoCameraTop_" + TOSTRING(counter), "");
7348  if (!SSETTING("VideoCameraWindowBorder", "").empty())
7349  misc["border"] = SSETTING("VideoCameraWindowBorder", ""); // fixes for windowed mode
7350 
7351  misc["outerDimensions"] = "true"; // fixes for windowed mode
7352 
7353  bool fullscreen = BSETTING("VideoCameraFullscreen", false);
7354  if (fullscreen)
7355  {
7356  int monitor = ISETTING("VideoCameraMonitor_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0);
7357  misc["monitorIndex"] = TOSTRING(monitor);
7358  }
7359 
7360  const std::string window_name = (!def->camera_name.empty()) ? def->camera_name : def->material_name;
7361  vcam.vcam_render_window = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().createRenderWindow(
7362  window_name, def->texture_width, def->texture_height, fullscreen, &misc);
7363 
7364  if (ISETTING("VideoCameraLeft_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0) > 0)
7365  vcam.vcam_render_window->reposition(ISETTING("VideoCameraLeft_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0), ISETTING("VideoCameraTop_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0));
7366 
7367  if (ISETTING("VideoCameraWidth_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0) > 0)
7368  vcam.vcam_render_window->resize(ISETTING("VideoCameraWidth_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0), ISETTING("VideoCameraHeight_" + TOSTRING(counter), 0));
7369 
7370  vcam.vcam_render_window->setAutoUpdated(false);
7371  fixRenderWindowIcon(vcam.vcam_render_window); // Function from 'Utils.h'
7372  vcam.vcam_render_window->setDeactivateOnFocusChange(false);
7373  // TODO: disable texture mirrors
7374  }
7375 
7376  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setNearClipDistance(def->min_clip_distance);
7377  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setFarClipDistance(def->max_clip_distance);
7378  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setFOVy(Ogre::Degree(def->field_of_view));
7379  const float aspect_ratio = static_cast<float>(def->texture_width) / static_cast<float>(def->texture_height);
7380  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setAspectRatio(aspect_ratio);
7381  vcam.vcam_material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
7382 
7383  if (vcam.vcam_type == GfxActor::VideoCamType::VCTYPE_MIRROR)
7384  {
7385  vcam.vcam_off_tex_name = "Chrome.dds"; // Built-in gray texture
7386  }
7387  else
7388  {
7389  // The default "NO SIGNAL" noisy blue screen texture
7390  vcam.vcam_off_tex_name = vcam.vcam_material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->getTextureName();
7391  }
7392 
7393  if (vcam.vcam_render_target)
7394  {
7395  Ogre::Viewport* vp = vcam.vcam_render_target->addViewport(vcam.vcam_ogre_camera);
7396  vp->setClearEveryFrame(true);
7397  vp->setBackgroundColour(gEnv->mainCamera->getViewport()->getBackgroundColour());
7398  vp->setVisibilityMask(~HIDE_MIRROR);
7399  vp->setVisibilityMask(~DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
7400  vp->setOverlaysEnabled(false);
7401 
7402  vcam.vcam_material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureName(vcam.vcam_render_tex->getName());
7403 
7404  // this is a mirror, flip the image left<>right to have a mirror and not a cameraimage
7405  if (def->camera_role == 1)
7406  vcam.vcam_material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureUScale(-1);
7407  }
7408 
7409  if (vcam.vcam_render_window)
7410  {
7411  Ogre::Viewport* vp = vcam.vcam_render_window->addViewport(vcam.vcam_ogre_camera);
7412  vp->setClearEveryFrame(true);
7413  vp->setBackgroundColour(gEnv->mainCamera->getViewport()->getBackgroundColour());
7414  vp->setVisibilityMask(~HIDE_MIRROR);
7415  vp->setVisibilityMask(~DEPTHMAP_DISABLED);
7416  vp->setOverlaysEnabled(false);
7417  vcam.vcam_material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureName(vcam.vcam_off_tex_name);
7418  }
7419 
7420  if (App::GetDiagVideoCameras())
7421  {
7422  Ogre::ManualObject* mo = CreateVideocameraDebugMesh(); // local helper function
7423  vcam.vcam_debug_node = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
7424  vcam.vcam_debug_node->attachObject(mo);
7425  }
7426 
7427  m_rig->m_gfx_actor->m_videocameras.push_back(vcam);
7428  }
7429  catch (std::exception & ex)
7430  {
7431  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, ex.what());
7432  }
7433  catch (...)
7434  {
7435  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "An unknown exception has occured");
7436  }
7437 }
7438 
7439 void RigSpawner::CreateMirrorPropVideoCam(
7440  Ogre::MaterialPtr custom_mat, CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType type, Ogre::SceneNode* prop_scenenode)
7441 {
7442  static size_t mprop_counter = 0;
7443  try
7444  {
7445  // Prepare videocamera entry
7446  GfxActor::VideoCamera vcam;
7447  vcam.vcam_off_tex_name = "mirror.dds";
7448  vcam.vcam_prop_scenenode = prop_scenenode;
7449  switch (type)
7450  {
7451  case CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_LEFT:
7452  vcam.vcam_type = GfxActor::VideoCamType::VCTYPE_MIRROR_PROP_LEFT;
7453  break;
7454 
7455  case CustomMaterial::MirrorPropType::MPROP_RIGHT:
7456  vcam.vcam_type = GfxActor::VideoCamType::VCTYPE_MIRROR_PROP_RIGHT;
7457  break;
7458 
7459  default:
7460  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "Cannot create mirror prop of type 'MPROP_NONE'");
7461  return;
7462  }
7463 
7464  // Create rendering texture
7465  const std::string mirror_tex_name = this->ComposeName("MirrorPropTexture-", mprop_counter);
7466  vcam.vcam_render_tex = Ogre::TextureManager::getSingleton().createManual(mirror_tex_name
7467  , m_custom_resource_group
7468  , Ogre::TEX_TYPE_2D
7469  , 128
7470  , 256
7471  , 0
7472  , Ogre::PF_R8G8B8
7473  , Ogre::TU_RENDERTARGET);
7474 
7475  // Create OGRE camera
7476  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera = gEnv->sceneManager->createCamera(this->ComposeName("MirrorPropCamera-", mprop_counter));
7477  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setNearClipDistance(0.2f);
7478  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setFarClipDistance(gEnv->mainCamera->getFarClipDistance());
7479  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setFOVy(Ogre::Degree(50));
7480  vcam.vcam_ogre_camera->setAspectRatio(
7481  (gEnv->mainCamera->getViewport()->getActualWidth() / gEnv->mainCamera->getViewport()->getActualHeight()) / 2.0f);
7482 
7483  // Setup rendering
7484  vcam.vcam_render_target = vcam.vcam_render_tex->getBuffer()->getRenderTarget();
7485  vcam.vcam_render_target->setActive(true);
7486  Ogre::Viewport* v = vcam.vcam_render_target->addViewport(vcam.vcam_ogre_camera);
7487  v->setClearEveryFrame(true);
7488  v->setBackgroundColour(gEnv->mainCamera->getViewport()->getBackgroundColour());
7489  v->setOverlaysEnabled(false);
7490 
7491  // Setup material
7492  vcam.vcam_material = custom_mat;
7493  vcam.vcam_material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureName(vcam.vcam_render_tex->getName());
7494  vcam.vcam_material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
7495 
7496  // Submit the videocamera
7497  m_rig->m_gfx_actor->m_videocameras.push_back(vcam);
7498  }
7499  catch (std::exception & ex)
7500  {
7501  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, ex.what());
7502  }
7503  catch (...)
7504  {
7505  this->AddMessage(Message::TYPE_ERROR, "An unknown exception has occured");
7506  }
7507  ++mprop_counter;
7508 }
